item.text: (ya) @#/ ! /gsang sngags rgyud 'bum gyi skor bzhugs so/ /
(黃) 秘密經第二十四部
@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA badzra me ru shi kha ra kU TA gA ra d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom
ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/
rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po
che'i pad mo'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ /sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen
por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin
gyi rdo rje chen po'i seng ge'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan

pa dang cho 'phrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum

phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam

par 'phrul pa/ cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyid snyan cing rgya che la zab pa dang /

spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang dbang dang / mngon par shes pa

dang ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang sa bcu dang / pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang snying rje dang / dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i

stobs dang dben pa dang / yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje mig dang rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros dang lag na

rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang rdo rje'i phung po dang / rdo rje'i nga ro dang rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba dang /

de dag la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba chad pa/

yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral

ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par sregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor

dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /

de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med gzhal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu tshangs pa

bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya

byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang / stobs can dang rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med/ grangs med

dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po dang / mtha' yas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med

grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa

rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig namakha' lding gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang

gang ba bzang dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo bdun dang / drang srong chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu

ba'i rgyu skar dang / gza'i lha thams cad dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams dang log 'dren rnams dang / yi dags rnams dang /

'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i

lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang /

tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug bcu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / ma bdun dang rdo rje lcags kyu can dang /

rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzangs dang gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par

dad pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang yi dags dang / sha za dang smyo byed dang / rjed byed dang sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang gnon po

tshad med dpag tu med grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshigs kyi lha dang / nub ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam sa'i lha rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos

kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongs su rdzogs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa brnyes pas ni shin

du yongs su gzungs skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus ni yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rnam par spras/ spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong /

bdud kyi tsher ma thams cad ni dkrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugs su chud/ spyan rnam lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/

bdud dang phas kyis rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgra ni sgrogs/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag

khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang stobs dang / smon lam dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang /

rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng ge'i khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang rin po che du ma'i

chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po che du ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las du ma'i 'od

zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas kun tu mdzes pa/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/

gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes par gyur pa/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag

par rgyas par chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su dag pa yongs su dkar ba yang dag par ston to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams

kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam

pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na

chos ston to/ /nyan thos chen po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs gcig go/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci

dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje lhun po chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de dag thams cad kyang kun tu snang ngo / /skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad

kyis tshim par gyur to/ /'on pa rnams ni sgra thos so/ /long ba rnams ni mig thob bo/ /smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do/ /nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to/ /sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas so/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med par gyur to/ /yud

tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dags kyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyi ming yang mi grags par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to/ /

der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so/ /de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste/ bde ba mchog gis tshim

par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste/ de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /

skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so/ /snang ba des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo / /bdud kyi ris kyi lha

de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar ngu zhing skrag nas byer ro/ /bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po rnyi rnyi por gyur cing lus rngul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing

'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge sbyong gau ta ma ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos ston pa 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo mtho brtsams so/ /phyogs gang du gnas gtol med do/ /longs la dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i gan du song ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar ma gyur

gyi bar du gzhom mo/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ rang rang gi gnas su dong ste/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can gos sna tshogs dgos pa cha byad dang rgyan sna tshogs can mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs

su rung ba bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba mig dang bzhin dang skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud

la ji tsam du dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du gnod pa cung zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang / bdag cag gi yul gnod par mi 'gyur ba deng nyid du phye mar brlag go/ rnam par gzhom mo/ /de nas

bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste/ shin tu dga' bas spu'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhir khyab

par byas te dung dang rnga dang rdza rnga dang 'khar rnga dang rgyud gcig pa dang / lcags kyi sil dkrol dang / rnga bo che brdung zhing hu du zhes bya ba dang / bi tsi zhes bya ba dang / zung shig zung shig /sod cig sod cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gzhol dang / gtun shing dang gtun rked

nyag dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo che dang / mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra

phyung nas bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin chen por gyur par snang ngo / /bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun

gyi sgra dang / yang dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnams su grag go/ bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcings pas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo / /de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar du gyur cing

dga' ba thob ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo / /bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i khams gyi

khyams chen por 'gyel to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang thugs rje chen pos brlan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal

to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed

pa zhes bya ba gang gis/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang yi dags dang / rjed byed dang 'byung po dang / gdon dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang sbrul 'dzin

bcas dang / gnon po dang zas su btsas pa za ba la sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pa/ de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa

dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i

rdo rje'i stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa

'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa/ /gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren pa byung / /khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal/ /'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod/ /thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam/ /ye shes ma lus khyod gcig pus/ /yang

dag brnyes nas thugs rje yis/ /brlan pa'i thugs kyis bstan pa mdzad/ /khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang / /bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / /shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis/ /bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud/ /khyod kyis chos rnams skye

med par/ /bshad cing de bzhin rnam phye yang / /'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa/ /kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad/ /'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa/ /khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/ /mu stegs can dang bdud btul te/ /chos kyi snang ba gsal bar

mdzad/ /nyon mongs brag chen rnam kun tu/ /ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas/ /sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i/ /byang chub bla na med pa brnyes/ /gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi/ /byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba/ /khyod ni 'jig rten mchog gcig pu/ /dam pa rab sbyin bdag po

lags/ /khyod ni mgon po khyod ni pha/ /khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyen lags/ /thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid/ /mya ngan 'das gnas gcig pu khyod/ /khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams/ /sems can dmyal las rnam par grol/ /rang gi sku yang yongs

btang nas/ /khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs/ /lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i/ /ye shes khyod kyis brnyes gyur nas/ /grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang 'grol/ /kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang / /mgon po khyod kyi 'od zer gyi/ /dra bas 'jig rten khams rnams

khyab/ /mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde/ /lus can kun gyis thob par mdzad/ /khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcom pas/ /gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / /gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang / /nor bu lham mer ma gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ /bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas/ yang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil

'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma

thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho

phyogs dma'/ mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' bar gyur to/ /phyogs thams cad dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag

dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag

na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te mtsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba yang dag par

ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag kun tu snang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba

rgya chen po des snang bar gyur nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen po kun tu gda' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad

ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab kyi steng na chos ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing

ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel ba gzigs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul

pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rjes rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi slabs so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshes pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par

'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa'i sprin

dang / gdugs kyi sprin dang / rgyan phreng gi sprin dang / dbu rgyan gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i

lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la logs su blta zhing / bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas/ rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan de dag la 'khod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe shar

phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i

khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs 'di nyid la brtsams te chos kyang ston to/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyur to/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i

snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus pa/ bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang yi dags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi

sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga'

ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar gda' ba 'di su yi lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i

khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to/ /bcom ldan 'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros nas

lha'i bu thams cad dang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i

bcing bas bcings pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo

rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'di ni rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o/ /rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/

byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar thob par gyur pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang so sor zhus so/ /rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus/ bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur byed pa yang mthong ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms

pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi

ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lan bdun bskor ba byas te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu

byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig smra ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa las

grub pas byin pa'i rin po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang ser po dang / dmar po dang ljang sngon dang / ljang ser dang btsod ka dang shel dang dngul dang / nor bu dang mu tig dang / gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang / rdo'i snying po dang ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an da rnyil

dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dun las dang / go mu ta ra ka dang mu tig dmar po'i kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te steng gi bar snang khyab par byas nas lha'i snang bas snang bar byas

te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa sha rgyas pa/ snum pa/ long bu gnyis

kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad ma gsar du kha bye ba lta bu dang / dung dang nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du ma bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las

pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu tshad shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / an da rnyil dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang shel dang / ke ke ru dang dung dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thon to/ /de la gser gyi rgyu

las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni dngul

gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni bye ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni shel gyi

rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /bye ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni dun las kyi rgyu las

byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni an da

rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba

ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o/ /dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi mdab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po ni an da rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /ze ba ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /chu ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las

byung ba'o/ /ze 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar rin po che du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad ma dag go/ rin po che'i pad ma re re la yang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i

spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum 'byung ngo / /'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu

dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la seng ge'i rna ba'i steng na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan spyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pas

pad ma rA ga dang / an da rnyil dang / mar gad dang / bai dUr+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing sa la gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te/ mdzes par byas pa dngul

las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mthar mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba spyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyur nas rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang / bya bang dang / ne tso dang ri skegs dang / rma bya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang

'dun khang chen po'i nyen 'khor stegs bur bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa las byas pa'i sgo khang can shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa bkra shis kyi gser gyi bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing

chen po'i 'gram gyi ne'u gsing mar gad gyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang / khrung khrung dang / ngur pa dang / ka lan da ka'i khyu gnas pa/ gser

gyi bye ma brdal ba'i btos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas kyi phreng bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung ngo / rdzing bu re re nas

kyang rin po che'i pad ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung ngo / /rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra phyung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su

spyod do/ /sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing / /de bzhin bzod dang brtson 'grus dag gi
stobs ldan pa/ /bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gis kun 'byor pa/ /ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ /bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan/ /thabs dang byang
chub yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyis dag /rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcur ldan pa yi/ /thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis/ /'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du/ /

gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa/ /'chi dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par gsal ba yi/ /rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la lta phyir dang / /gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhig

gis/ /skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing / /sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba/ /shAkya'i tog ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis/ /de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du ma nam mkha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste/ kha cig tu ni rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo / /kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni go shir sha'i tsan dan dang / spos dang byug pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni gos kyi phreng ba'i

sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni ka shi ka'i ras dang du gu la'i ras dang za 'ug gi sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang / uta pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang dri mchog dang a ti mug ta ka dang ka tsa lin da dang ma hA ka tsa lin da dang

btang gzung dang / btang gzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /me tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang

mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo/ /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dri des mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams

mi mjed de na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo / /de dag gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes bu dam pa de la phyag btsal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde

ba dang / dga' ba dang rangs pa dang / dad pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub

pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lags na rdo rje dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang

ldan pa' la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang glu dbyangs kyi

sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/ /gang slad ngan 'gro mchog du sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi/ /ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang / /bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la 'ang

rgyal ba mchog /byams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung / /bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gis bsgrubs pa yi/ /sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgyid dka' sna tshogs pa/ /de dag thub pa'i bya dgas de ring glo bur du/ /skad cig tu ni

ji ltar rnam par zhig par gyur/ /ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang / /ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang / /bser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thor ji bzhin du/ /de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis

bcom/ /bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na/ /lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrogs pa/ /'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa gzhig pa yi/ /thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur mi mnga'/ /mig dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag tshil

rnams dang / /srog dang sdug dang bu rnams rtswa ltar bor nas ni/ /mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yi dags ltogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang / /de bzhin skye bo'i nor 'dod snying dang

ldan pa la/ /thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabs su mchi/ /gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas/ /mchog tu tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba 'ang bsil bar 'gyur/ /rang bde mi gzigs

sems can don brtson thugs ldan pa/ /'jig rten mgon sras mnyam pa med de de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol/ /stong pa gsung yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhing / /ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang

thugs rjes brlan/ /spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje'i snying po bde gshegs sras/ /mtshan gyis mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i/ /dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim/ /skad cig gis ni

dmyal bas sum bcu'i lha dbang gyur/ /bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang de bzhin rgyal sras dang / /de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la/ /gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gang thob pa/ /de myur 'jig rten thams cad bde gshegs thob par shog /

de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rin po che'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med

par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das la blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la

blta'o/ /bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /dran pa'i gzhus 'phangs pa yi shes rab mda' mang gis/ /ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing / /'jig

rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas/ /bla ma sprin med zla ba bzhin du lhang nge'o/ /dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa dra ba yis/ /'dul ba'i pad ma'i gnas rnams kha bye nas/ /ye shes namakha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs/ /

nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs/ /mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing / /'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad/ /dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa/ /dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug

ltar sgrag tu gsol/ /mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing / /bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyes nas/ /ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i stobs kyis mthu mnga' ba/ /skye ba'i 'jigs las rab grol seng ge ji bzhin sgrogs/ /spyod

pa zab cing brtan la rtag tu mi dpogs pa/ /sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor bu bkram/ /dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bos rnam 'dzin pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod skye dgu mchog gtso ba/ /tshul khrims bzang po'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus

btab 'phel/ /byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pas mdzes/ /byang chub yan lag lam gyi 'bru chags 'dod byas bsten/ /bsod nams dpag bsam shing khyod de ring ga las byung / /sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan/ /

dpe byad bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing / /sa dang dbang dang dam mchog phur pa brtan btab pa/ /lhun po bzhin du mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro bar mdzes/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad

kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i

rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'byung ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te 'dun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed

'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa byang chub sems

dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i

pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba

nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad ma'i

snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan

mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba

nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du shar

lho'i phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tshom dang bral ba nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo

gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te 'dun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag

thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs

rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir

'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la

'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad ma la rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad ma bkod pa nas/ byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te 'dun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po

che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma dkrugs pa nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig

'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te 'dun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin

du rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas gzhal med khang dang / me tog gi

sprin dang rin po che'i sprin dang / phye ma'i sprin dang / spos dang byug pa dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi sprin dang / rin po che spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / bai dUr+ya dang an da rnyil dang / byi ru dang /

mar gad dang / mu tig dmar po dang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che'i pad ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjod du med par gtogs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i

sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul ba'i byin gyi brlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun tu snang ngo / /'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa

de dag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ 'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing pad ma dang yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i ngos can gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang bum

pa dang / nya dang sgo khang dang / gzhal med khang dang dung dang / rdo rje dang pad ma dang / dpal be'u dang 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu 'thun

pas mngon par grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rnam par spras pa/ sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snum zhing srab pa'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis khrig ma mdzes par gyur pa sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang yang dag par 'thun pa'i

phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir spyi bo la byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad gyi nga ro gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces/ kye rigs kyi bu gang

gi phyir bdud sdig can dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar gcad pa dang

rnam par gzhig pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'grus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bya ba nas khams gsum par

gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcad pa'i phyir khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsam

gyis mi khyab par bsags pa yongs su rdzogs pas grub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos spras pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang dbang dang gzungs dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthus grub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi

sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa nye bar zhi ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dags dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i bdud kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don par lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang

nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can dag la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu bskyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni

legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod do/ /rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskum ste/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzud pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bkye'o/ /de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de

dag la phyag 'tshal nas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi brlabs chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyi skad cig thang

cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la ji nas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /

chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gang

dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ji nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms

par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe stong

gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /chem chem rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/

'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mche ba rnon po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa gtsigs te/ mche ba mnan nas me lce chen po ltar sma ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste/ mi bzad pa rna ba

las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor ba dang / ba lang rna lta bu dang / gzar bu lta bu dang / sbrul chen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi phreng bas bzhin du me 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang zhags

pa dang / gtun shing dang gtun shing rked nyag dang ral gri dang 'khor lo dang lcags sgrog la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshon cha'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po

dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems can skrag par byed pa ri dgas kyi dbang po'i lpags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thabs su dgos pa/ sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya

gram du dam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 'chi bdag kyang skrag par byed pa/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas lus kyi tshigs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di

lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang nag po ste/ thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khro gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i rngul gyi thigs pa rtsub po

'dzag pa las dug 'chang rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang nying lag kun tu dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rje drag shul can du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha ha zhes gad mo rta gad

'byung zhing / 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char pa dang bcas pa'i sprin dkrugs pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa 'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang / rta rgod ma'i kha nas me 'byung ba lta bu'i hU~M zhes bya ba zab cing brtan pas rgyu

ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs 'jigs skrag ste 'byer zhing 'thor nas dngangs te skyabs su dong zhing 'dud pas nyi ma stong bas 'bar ba'i lus rnams mthong ba na/ sna sgar sgur can zhom pa lta bu'i bu ga zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil pa'i gtsug gi nor bu'i

'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par mdzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mig gi 'bras bu'i 'od zer gyis skra'i tshogs rtsub cing bshor la gyen du 'greng ba'i rtse mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing sbrul

rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shal dang / ska rags dang dpung brgyan dang / gdu bu dang / rna chas lus brgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing drag shul can mi bzad pa lag na thogs pa mdzub mo rnams las hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs dang log

'dren thams cad kun tu bsdigs pa dag 'thon te/ gang de dag gi mig dang kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/ des sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems

dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams tshig par byed/ rmongs par byed 'tshog par byed de/ mi bzad pa drag pa rtsub pa sdug bsngal ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do/ /de dag tshor bas nyen pas

dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ngo / /de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang log 'dren de dag tshor ba chen pos nyen te dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su dong ba mthong nas 'jigs dngang skrag ste skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i shing bzhin du 'dar

rab tu 'dar te/ ngu bar 'dod na yang ngu ma nus nas ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can 'dul bar byed de/ sdang ba dang / gdon dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams

cad dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de lta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa drag shul gyi

gzugs can/ seng ge'i sgra chen po hU~M zhes bya ba 'di gnyis phyung ste/ de gnyis skar mda' bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur te/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i shugs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'dug

ste/ yang dpral ba'i dkyil nas rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs can mche ba mi bzad pa drag pas 'jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs te/ mchu ma rungs par bsgyur ba'i kha nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i tshe rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod

pa'i sprin nag po'i tshogs rab tu sgrog pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra drag po lta bu'i hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras gang ba/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs nas 'bros shing sgyid lug nas phyogs bslad par byed pa/ lag pa dang rkang pa

dang / sen mo dang mig dang / ag tshom dang skra thams cad rdo rje 'bar bar snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzi brjid thams cad kyi gzi brjid rnams rang gi gzi brjid kyis zil du rlag par byed cing rgyang ring

du byed pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des rgyu skar dang / gza' dang skar ma dang / nor bu rnams kyi 'od lam mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ gang nyi ma dang zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che bar grags pa/ mthu che ba yang lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/

lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi 'od ma gtogs par 'od gzhan thams cad mog mog por byed pa gzhan phyung ngo / /de nas rdo rje khro bo des bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu ci

bgyi bka' stsol cig /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye skyes bu dam pa dag deng la bdud sdig can dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'dzin du chug shig /'di dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig /gzhan yang

gang dag sdang ba gdon dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang /

mi rtogs pa dang / yid mi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par gyis shig dang / des sems can thams cad kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis

gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i tshig mnyan nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang bzung ste/ dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu seng ge'i sgra chen po hU~M zhes bya bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing gsang

sngags kyi bzhi dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gnam lcags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i shugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rdo rje be con la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje yan lag dmar la phyag 'tshal lo/ /stobs po che la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'gro lding ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i khro

bo rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+phu Ta ya s+phu Ta ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya Ta ya/ mo Ta mo Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na/ g+hUr+N+NA pa ya g+hUr+N+NA pa ya/ sarba sa twA ni/ tra sa tra sa/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ sa~M b+h+rA ma

ya sa~M b+h+rA ma ya/ sarba b+hU ta ni/ ku Ta ya ku Ta ya/ sa~M ku Ta ya sa~M ku Ta ya/ sarba sha trU~M Na~M/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ sa~M g+ha Ta ya sa~M g+ha Ta ya/ sarba bid+yA badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ud tsa thA ya badzra badzra/ ha na badzra badzra/ da ha badzra badzra/ pa tsa

badzra badzra/ mA tha badzra badzra/ ud sA d+ha ya ma hA badzra badzra/ d+hA ra badzra bA Ni pre ya/ ka ha ka ha/ ha sa ha sa/ ma hA Tad Ta ha sa/ kha cig tu rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zab cing 'jigs su rung ba'i hU~M zhes bya ba'i seng ge'i sgras sdang ba rab tu sdang ba bgegs dang log

'dren kun tu skrag par byed pa dang / sdang ba thams cad gzhom du gsol/ 'joms su stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ badzra pa ra pra da s+pho Ta/ bsgrub par bya ba lha dang lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang ma mo dang / 'byung po dang / gdon

gyi tshogs mthar 'byin pa/ 'byer bar mdzad pa/ hU~M hU~M phaT he he phaT/ a mo g+ha phaT/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ sum bcu rtsa

gsum gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'byer par bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du

stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'thab bral gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ dga' ldan gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du

stsal du gsol/ hU~M` hU~M` phaT/ 'phrul dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung

ma dang phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ de bzhin du 'od gsal dang / tshangs ris nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris 'og min gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung ma dang / phyugs dang rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar

bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad du gsol/ rmugs par mdzad du gsol/ rmongs par mdzad du gsol/ gcu bar gsol gcad du gsol/ gzhig tu

gsol rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ mnan du gsol/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM khro bo khro bo chen po rnam par bkra ba/ ser skya po nag po/ dmar po ser po/ mi pham pa/ rtag tu 'bar ba'i khro bo/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ tu ru tu ru tu ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru/

tha ra tha ra tha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ku hu ku hu/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ lu Tu lu Tu/ sarba TA lA ma ma hU~M/ pu lu pu lu len tam/ lo ha si len tAm/ mu lu lang khA se/ tsu lu tsu len tam/ ma lu bu len tam/ ma lu ru bi/ kurbi purba/ le N+yu

spyu ra g+ha N+yu spu bi ri tsu/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ su mu su mu ru Ta ka Te/ bi ga Te/ ni ga Te ka Ta bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Ta bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Ta di ka Te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza yan ti/ bi dza yan ti/ ti ming gi si/ ma hA ti ming gi si/ g+hu tang ga me/ g+hu ta bA rA ya ne/ sdang ba rnams la rjes su 'doms pa/

ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byer bar mdzad pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi nang na dpa' ba/ des pa rnams kyi nang na des pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnas bsgags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi rig sngags thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na bcom ldan 'das

kyi spyan sngar lha dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du dam tshig gang bcas pa de rjes su bskyang du gsol/ rjes su bskyang du gsol/

gshegs su gsol/ myur du gshegs su gsol/ bdag gi las rnams myur ba myur bar bsgrub tu gsol/ skrag par byed pa/ rdo rje 'dzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /hu ru hu ru/ grub pa drag po lag na rdo rje bka' stsol cig swA hA/ shin

du grub par byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa la swA hA/ rdo rje 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA rdo rje kI li kI la la swA hA/ drag po kI li kI la la swA hA/ dmar po kI li kI la la swA hA/ byis pa kI li kI la la swA hA/

sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ bdag gi gnod pa dang / nad mgo ba thams cad dang / rims thams cad med par mdzod cig swA hA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo chen pos 'di skad smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa

drug tu g.yos te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad dang de bzhin du bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab par snang ngo / /gnam grum pa'i sgra chen po yang grag go/ kun nas sa chen po 'di grum par kun du snang ngo / /sa chen po'i ser ka de dag nas yan

lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung ngo / /chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi chu bzhin du sa chen po thams cad kun tu gang bar snang ngo / /gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu chen po dang / lha chen po dang lha ma yin chen po de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og nas

'thon cing ri rab kyi drung du 'thon te gyen du byung nas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su dong ngo / /de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang / bgegs dang log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar

rab tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'joms par shes te/ de dag sdug bsngal mi bzad cing drag la rtsub pas nyen nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i ngu skad 'thon te tshig 'di skad ces kyang smras so/ /gsang ba

pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyid na 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad na gnas

pa dang / ri dang chu bo dang / lteng ka dang rdzing dang / dur khrod dang shing dang / thibs po dang khron pa rnying ba dang / btung chu dang lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / gtsug lag khang zhigs pa dang / gnas dang lha khang na gnas pa dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

rdo rje 'jigs pa chen por ltung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de bzhin du lha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ mog mog por gyur cing bod med par kun

tu snang ngo / /bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par snang ngo / /gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos dngangs skrag ste rang rang gi mgo rdo rje rnams kyis rnam

par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / /bdud sdig can yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyam thag cing

skrag la zhum ste gnod pas dngangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo / /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu dag

yongs su skyobs shig /yongs su skyobs shig /bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /chos la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir pha lta bu dang / ma lta bu dang spun lta bu

dang / gnyen lta bu dang snag gi gnyen mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdag deng phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi pha dang ma dang spun dang gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las cung zad

gang ci byed pa de sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/ /bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyung ngo / /bdag grol nas gzhan yang dgrol lo/ /bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las bzla'o/ /

rus pa dang rkang dang / khrag dang sha dang / nyams mthu dang / srog gis kyang sems can thams cad la rim gror bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /brjed par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / slob dpon dang /

bla ma'i gnas thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /sti stang bya'o rim gror bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba gzung ste/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du

gyur te/ dga' ba thob nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis/ /sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir/ /bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo / /rin chen sems 'dis mi ring bar/ /rnam 'dren sangs rgyas

gyur nas ni/ /sems can shin tu sdug bsngal kun/ /mya ngan las ni bzla bar gyis/ /rgyal ba'i mchog 'di ji bzhin du/ /skye dgu thams cad gdul bar byos/ /stobs po che dang ldan pa yi/ /bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i

'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag gi snyim pa na me tog gi phur ma thogs par shes te/ me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag

na rdo rje dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog gi gzhal

med khang chen por gyur to/ /bdud sdig can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag bsam gyi shing

shing du mas mig mangs ris brgyad du bres pa/ rin po che dang nor bu dang / mu tig dang dung dang / man shel dang byi ru dang / mar gad dang / bai dUr+ya dang an da rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / rdo rje dang rdo rje chen po dang / dun las dang / dun

las chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa/ gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan bsgreng bas legs par brgyan pa/ me tog gi phreng bas klubs pa/ pog snod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim po'i ngad kyi dri zhim par byas pa/

phye ma'i dri zhim po'i bsgo bas bsgos pas/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang glu len cing gar byed pa/ rdzing bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu can 'bum phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang /

ud pa la dang / dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa byung nas/ de mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes te gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul

chen pos lag pa gnyis ka spyi bo la blangs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir phul te/ tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/ /'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byor

gyur pa/ /stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyod la brten nas su/ /byang chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems/ /sems can bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis thob/ /bdag mig gti mug mun pas dri can dri med gyur/ /srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing spros

dang bral/ /mya ngan las 'das drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan/ /sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur/ /sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabs su ma song ba/ /kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta bslus shig gu/ /de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod

nams dang / /dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur/ /sa mdog gcig pur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog /gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya/ /srid pa gzhan na kun tu rgyu rtse bdag gi yid/ /rang phan 'jug dang dge bshes bral bar ma gyur

cig /de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /

rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang / gdon dang bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad las rnam par rtsom pa la rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / bgegs mi byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin

gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin tu chug shig /rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yang byin cig dang / de sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces smras pa

dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la legs so/ /zhes te tshig la mngon par dga' nas yang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag

thams cad dang / sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang ma mo dang / yi dags dang sha za dang / 'byung po dang gdon dang / rjed byed dang / srul po dang lus srul po dang / ro langs dang mkha' 'gro dang / sgrub pa dang sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang / gdon

gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po mang po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i 'tsho chen po zab mo klong 'khyil pa/ 'ur 'ur sgra 'byung ba lta bur drag cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang 'thon pos 'di skad ces smras so/ /sdang ba 'byung po dang gdon dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la

sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon cig /khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang / de la

sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/ klog pa de dag la bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'tshe bar mi bya ste/ sgrub pa dang rjes su 'thun par stobs sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur

ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / rig sngags 'grub pa sbyin par bya'o/ /sbrang rtsi dang / tshigs ma dang / sgog pa dang / ki'u dang / gtor ma dang / 'byung po dang / mi bsgrungs pa rnams kyi sha dang zas zos kyang skyon du mi gzung zhing

nyes par mi brtsi'o/ /de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyar ro/ /rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung ci stsal pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /

deng slan chad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro

bo de dag dang / sdang ba bgegs dang log 'dren dang 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig sngags kyi las dang dam tshig dang / phyag rgya thams cad 'dzin du gcug go gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i

sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang / bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu

sems bskyed pa dang / gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang / 'byung po dang bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyang dam tshig la bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe

dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni ming dang yi ge dang sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ming ngam gzugs sam/ dbyibs sam gnas sam/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'am/ g.yengs

pa yang rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang med do/ /gang la ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / dbyibs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa med pa dang / g.yang ba med pa 'di btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ming ci zhig bya zhes de la ji snyam du

sems/ yang btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di ni bdag la gsal bar byed pa ma yin gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin gnyis ka la yang gsal bar byed pa ma yin no/ /'on kyang gsal bar byed par btags pa yod do/ /de la gsal bar byed pa ni gsal
