bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong bdag ni bdag gis stong / gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong / gnyis ga yang gnyis ga'i bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro/ /'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig de yang tshig gi bdag

nyid kyis stong ste yi ge yang yi ge ma yin no/ /de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no/ /don de brjod pa na yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro mod kyi gzhan gyi dbang la rten pa'i phyir yi ger btags pa yang yod do/ /yongs su

btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa yang stong pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o/ /rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa'o/ /glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba yang 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis

stong ngo / /de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo / /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid do/ /ma nor ba de bzhin

nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do/ /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin to/ /ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o/ /rtogs pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo / /lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so/ /

zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o/ /rnam par thar pa gang yin pa de dbu ma'i lam yin no/ /dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med/ mtha' gnyis med/ gzung ba med 'dzin pa po med/ 'dzin pa med chad pa med rtag pa med/ skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ rtog pa

med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ rang dbang med gzhan gyi dbang med/ 'gro ba med 'ong ba med kun nas nyon mongs pa med rnam par byang ba med 'du ba med 'bral ba med de/ de ni lhag mthong yin no/ /lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams med khams rnams med/ dbang po rnams med/ skye

mched rnams med/ yul rnams med/ yul du gdags pa med/ las med las kyi 'bras bu med do/ /gang la las med cing las kyi 'bras bu med pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin

pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so/ /chos gang yin pa de mi skye mi mchi'o/ /mi skye mi mchi ba gang yin pa de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa

ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin bstan pa bshad pa 'di ni shin tu zab ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba yang med na/ 'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang ci dgos chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba ste/ gzhan du na 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa ni ma gtogs so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ni dmyigs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o/ /de skad

ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid do/ /stong

pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin na/ de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan

zhing de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku legs par brgyan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par blta/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs

par sangs rgyas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis shes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go/ brgyan ces bya ba de ni spros pa'i yi ge dang sgra'o/ /dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba de ni sgyu ma

dang / rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do/ /sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/ de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ 'di yang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las dang sku'i gsang ba'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do/ /kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o/ /

rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa/ bsam gtan goms par bya bar shes par bya ba ste/ dmigs pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par

byang bas stong pa/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ yid kyi rang gi ngo bo'i yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nam mkha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par

gzhag pa ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/ /chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam du blta'o/ /dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye mi 'chi ba ste/

de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos kyi sku 'di ni gnas pa nyid do/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa zhes bya ba de ni pha rol du phyin pa dag gi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o/ /de la pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de yang bsod

nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa nyid du blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su gtang bar bya ba'o/ /de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kun rdzob kyi tshig go/ nang zhes bya ba de ni don dam pa'i

tshig go/ de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin du bran pho dang bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / glang po che dang rta dang / shing rta dang sa dang / mgo dang lag

pa dang / rkang pa dang mig dang / sha dang khrag dang rkang dang tshil dang rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de yang thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / gya nom pa dang rgya che ba dang / rang gi sti stang du byas te

rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin pa 'di ni phyi'i 'o/ /nang gi ni chos sbyin pa'o/ /de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sbyin pa'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / bzod pa'i gtam

dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang shes rab dang / thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang / ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying rjes yongs su zin pa thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba'o/ /gzhan yang nang gi sbyin pa ni gang 'di mthar 'dzin pa dang skye ba dang

'gag par yongs su rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / shes pa dang shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa stobs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba ste/ 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /gang 'di nyid la lus dang ngag dang / yid rgod pa

med pa dang khengs pa med pa dang / lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang / yid rnam par g.yeng ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongs su zin pa/ gcig tu nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa btang snyoms kyis

yongs su zin pa/ thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang / srog la mi lta bar bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / bden

pa dang bden pa ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam par spong zhing byams pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang bzod

pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing rtsom pa dang / yongs su mi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang / de dmigs pa med pa dang / byams pas yongs su zin pa ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa yang dag par 'du ba 'di ni 'dir

brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs

ni gang pha rol du phyin pa bzhi po 'di dag nyid rtogs pa ste/ pha rol du phyin pa rnams 'byed pa dang / 'brel pa dang gsal bar byed pa dang / de la gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang stong pa dang / gsob dang bsog dang / dngos po

med pa dang / dngos po thams cad dngos po med par yang dag par ston to/ /mdor bsdu na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang

dag par ston te/ dmigs pa dang bral ba 'di ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin

pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tshogs so/ /bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang shes pa dang / shes

bya mtha' dag dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o/ /rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni gal te de bzhin

gshegs pa nyid kyis sku tshe'i tshad bskal par bzhugs te bstan cing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung gi gsang ba yang de bzhin no/ /thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa dang / so so'i rnam pa dang /

kha dog dang rtags dang / dbyibs dang / ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang bstan par mi spyod mod kyi/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so rang gis rig pa ni thugs kyi gsang ba yin

par shes par bya'o/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis kyang de ltar rig par bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang blo gros dang / blo dang rtogs pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang / sems kyi

rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang / mi shes pa dang ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / mi snang ba dang mun nag dang / 'gro ba lnga dang 'gro ba drug dang /

khams gsum pa thog ma dang / dbus dang / 'jig par gnas pa sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chad par gnas par dus gsum dang / phyogs la mgo rmongs pa/ skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa na ba dang / nad dang mya ngan

dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa la sogs pas nyin gcig bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs

ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzud pa dang / gnas pa thams cad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shin du

bde ba/ don dam pa/ zhi ba 'khrug pa med pa/ dge ba nad med pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog

dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sbyar ba dang / yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / dga' ba dang dad pa dang / mgu ba'i sa la yang dag par gzud pa dang /

chos rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus dang / tshod las mi 'da' bar bya ba dang / de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang /

lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes

goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud kyi rgyun mi gcad pa dang / skal ba yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed pa cung zad cig bshad par bya'o/ /

de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /gang gi phyir kho

bo cag lta bu nyi tshe ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra sgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i nyan thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'di lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa

ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin no/ /btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag

g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyen la shin du gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la gzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba

pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cing bshad de dkrol zhing rnam par phye ba legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar legs so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i

bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag gzhag ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa yang dkon na rab tu gsal

bar byed pa lta ci smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu gang gA'i klung tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das pa snyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul

med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so/ /dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rab tu

mang po dag ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de bas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen

po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang chos kyi dgab

pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma rdungs par kun nas sgra byung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang glu dbyangs blangs

pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed do/ /spos dang byug pa dang bdug pa dang phye ma dang gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / me tog pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / uta

pa la dang / dri mchog dang gna' ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / pa ri sha ka chen po dang / btang gzungs dang gtang bzung chen po dang / man dA ra ba dang man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang many+dzu sha ka chen po dang kun nas skyes dang kun nas

skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab bo/ /spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab po/ /de nas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang brgya byin dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang gnod sbyin dang nam mkha'

lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang 'byung po dang / rjed byed dang / skem byed dang sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang gnon po dang / ma mo dang yi dags dang / sha za dang bram ze'i srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma

dang / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang / mkhar dang ri dang sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo

g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar gzir bas rig sngags 'chang

thams cad dngos grub stsol ba dang / dam tshig thams cad du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de

dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyed rang gi snying

po bstan par bya'o/ /de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho dang sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i sgra bas lhag pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya

che la zab pa thog ma dang bar dang tha mar dge ba/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thad pa/ gsal ba/ 'jebs pa dag pa/ mnyen pa snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i

sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza ya ba ha/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/

lu Tu lu Tu/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza yan ti/ bi dza yan ti/ a dzi te/ a pA rA dzi te/ tad+yi te/ sarba duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta sta ma b+ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ shwe te ka rA le/ ke yu re/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ti/ ban d+ha rA pA si ni/ par+Na sha ba ri/ shrI ye ma hA shrI ye sarba ad

b+hu ta ya shri te/ pad ma bi he/ pad ma mA li ni/ badzra a~M gu shi/ badzra ma te/ badzra pA tA li/ shU li ni/ badzra d+hA re/ hi hi hi hi/ badzra pA Ni/ he he he he/ badzra pA Ni/ badzra shU li Ni/ tsakra d+ha de/ hi hi badzra pA Ni/ he he badzra pA Ni/ hi hi hi hi/ he he he he/ badzra pA Ni/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/

ra la ra la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra/ hA hA hA hA hA/ tsi li me le/ tshi le/ di li/ di di la/ di mi le/ dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa li ti/ pra dz+wa li ti/ tha ra thag ga tha re/ mu gu ti/ k+Sha me/ k+Sha ma me/ grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha thams cad kyi snying kun du 'jug par

byed ma/ sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bigs ma/ sdang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong ma/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug ma tshur shog /dam tshig

rjes su skyongs shig /sems can thams cad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khod cig /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ tra Ta tra Ta/ s+pho Ta ya swA hA/ gyen du lta la swA hA/ rnam

par lta la swA hA/ chu srin la swA hA/ me la swA hA/ tshangs pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ drag po rnams la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la swA hA/ thams cad la swA hA/ lha rnams la swA hA/ nor rnams la swA hA/ ma mo rnams la swA hA/ mtshun

rnams la swA hA/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams gsum

thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la swA hA/ tshur shog tshur shog /dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig /ku ru ku ru/ sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~M yA~M pA~M/ tsaN Da li/ ma tang gi/ brah+ma ni/ puk+ka si/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i lha'i 'khor de 'jigs/

dngangs skrag par gyur nas/ chu shing gi tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du zug cing zhig sa la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du shes tsam gyis

sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor 'di slong shig /ngas dam tshig 'di yongs su 'dzin du gzhug go/ rig

sngags grub pa 'byor bar byed pa'i snying po la gzhol ba bsgrags so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams cad bslang ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ki li ki la/ bA la ki li ki la ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyid pa lags so/ /

des ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar 'chi'o/ /dbang du mchi'o/ /dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o/ /lung bzhin bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dpal bskyed par bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par

bshig go/ sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o/ /'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig par bgyi'o/ /nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang

ba 'di ni 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis rnam par gtses pa'i tshe/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri shing snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang ba

'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de thams cad bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'

stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs shig lhogs shig /'dzin du chug shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / des sems can mang po la yun

ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bla na med pa/ chags pa med pa/ sgrib pa med pa thob cing rtogs par 'gyur ro/ /su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / kun

chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa de ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs dma' ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur/ dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/

shes rab med par yang ma yin/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rabs su tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar

'gyur ro/ /'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro/ /shes rab chen po dang / spobs pa chen po dang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sems can

thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di nyid la

bgegs dang log 'dren dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang yi dags dang / sha za dang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye

chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis mi thul bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de la rig

sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing sbed pa dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam

tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

bstsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang

zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rten cing 'brel par 'jug

pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags dang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang dam tshig thams cad la rab tu 'jog pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /lag na rdo rje'i rnam

par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs shes bya bar zung shig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol

te mngon par dga' nas cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i

'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i

'khor de bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang /

dz+nyA na sid d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/

'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri btang zung chen po na chos ston te/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyag gis

sems can rnams dbugs 'byin cing shar phyogs na me lce kun tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs lag pa gcig

gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pa na ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'o/ /de'i 'og na ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi

rgyal po gnod mdzes so/ /g.yon na ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba kham pa lta bur gzhag go/ snying po ni ki li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang lus dmar po dang / rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje rgya

chen te/ snying po'i mchog go/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po chen po dang nye ba na ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud do/ /sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje'i tho ba

dang / rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ g.yon logs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar mo'o/ /de'i 'og

tu ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no/ /g.yon du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo / /de bzhin du shar phyogs su ni zla ba dang /

nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang dbang po'o/ /me'i phyogs na ni me'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /lho phyogs su ni gshin rje dang khyab 'jug go/ bden bral gyi phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po ma mo rnams kyis bskor ba'o/ /

nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /byang phyogs su ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor

ba'o/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang khyab 'jug dang / tshangs pa chen po dang / de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin

no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ki li ki la badzra/ ki li ki la la swA hA/ spyi gtsug la swA hA/ dpral ba la swA hA/ mig la swA hA/ drag shul can la swA hA/ shin tu drag shul can la swA hA/ rdo rje zhags pa la swA hA/ lus dmar

po la swA hA/ lag na rdo rje la swA hA/ lag na zhags pa la swA hA/ lag na ral gri la swA hA/ lag na dgra sta la swA hA/ gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/ gtun shing 'dzin la swA hA/ lag na 'khor lo la swA hA/ lag na mdung rtse gsum pa la swA hA/ snying po la swA hA/ nye

ba'i snying po la swA hA/ drag po ki li ki la la swA hA/ byis pa ki li ki la la swA hA/ dmar po ki li ki la la swA hA/ stobs po che la swA hA/ ral pa can la swA hA/ gsus 'phyang po la swA hA/ khro bo chol pa la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ srin po la swA hA/ srin po

ya mun la swA hA/ drag po chen po la swA hA/ sprin la swA hA/ ri 'dzin la swA hA/ ri btang bzung 'dzin la swA hA/ rdo rje be con la swA hA/ 'jigs byed chen po la swA hA/ lus 'jigs byed la swA hA sdigs byed la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la swA hA/ rdo rje'i

gtan pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lus la swA hA/ 'gro lding ba la swA hA/ bdud rtsi la swA hA/ dka' thub 'dzin la swA hA/ lcags kyu la swA hA/ don yod pa la swA hA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/ mdog dkar la swA hA/ sngo bsangs mdog la swA hA/

'phyang po la swA hA/ glang po che la swA hA/ ba glang 'phel gyi lag la swA hA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la swA hA/ sbrul gyi ska rags can la swA hA/ rdo rje'i phur pa la swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka la swA hA/ A rdo rje la swA hA/ 'bar ba'i 'od

byed la swA hA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/ myu gu la swA hA/ 'od byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur la swA hA/ sprin rnam par 'thor ba la swA hA/ char pa

rton la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lcags kyu la swA hA/ rdo rje'i snying po la swA hA/ rdo rje'i nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la swA hA/ be con rgyal po la swA hA/ go cha'i rgyal po la swA hA/ oM/ d+h+ri~M/ a~M/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ A mri te hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM a mri te hU~M phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ mig mi bzang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po

la swA hA/ lus ngan pa la swAhA/ dbang po la swA hA/ me la swA hA/ drang srong chen po thams cad la swA hA/ nyi ma la swA hA/ zla ba la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ srin po'i bdag po la swA hA/ klu'i bdag po la swA hA/ rlung la

swA hA/ dbang bdag la swA hA/ dbang bdag gi chung ma la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ nor lha'i bu la swA hA/ rdo rje chen po la swA hA/ tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha mo dpal la swA hA/ lha mo dka' thub zlog

la swA hA/ rig sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'chang zhing yid la byed na srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas brtan blo gros chen po shA ra dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ mu ne mu ne/ ma hA mu ne/ ki li ki la/ ma

hA ki li ki la d+hi ke/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/ ma hA ka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma/ ma hA sha ma / shA tri shA tri shA tri/ shAn ta shAn ta shAn ta/ dAn ta dAn ta dAn ta/ d+hI ra d+hI ra d+hI ra/ ma hA me g+ha/ du ra du ra/ ha ri ha ri ha ri/ kud Ti kud Ti kud Ti/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha

tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ sarba duSh+Tan/ gu mu gu mu gu mu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ prA NAn/ da ma ni da ma ni/ Ta Ta Ta/ Tha Tha Tha/ DA DA DA DA DA DA/ tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha da ha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba ri sha ba ri

sha ba ri/ mA ta~M gi/ tsaN DA li/ hu hu hu/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/ ha tA pra t+yarti na/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phaT phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha thi tiSh+Tha thi tiSh+Tha thi/ ma ti kra ma tha/ ma ta~M gi/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ gal te mi 'dug na lag pa dang / rkang pa dang /

kha dang / mid pa dang mig dang / snying dang ngag thams cad bcing ngo / /dbrog go/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dun d+hu dun d+hu dun d+hu/ ban d+hu ban d+hu ban d+hu/ nI la nI la nI lAng ga badzra d+hA ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig /ko ti

ko ti ko ti ni/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ badzra mA li badzra d+hA ra/ badzra ad ta hA sa/ tsar tu nar tu/ mar tu/ ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sems can chen po dran par gyis shig /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsaN Da tsaN Da tsaN Da/

ma hA tsaN Da/ hur tu hur tu hur tu/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ badzra pA Ni ha na ha na/ ma ma sarba sha trU~M NAn/ mUr+Ni ta DA ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ lag na rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar ma byed cig /dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam

tshig dral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la yang bslus par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin no/ /tsu tsu tsu/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ phu Tu phu Tu phu Tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pa tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa ni/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po

de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig /tsi li tsi li tsi li/ phu lu phu lu phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag snying po 'di dang 'gal bar bgyis na de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i

mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig /dar phu/ tsar phu/ nar phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams

la phyag 'tshal lo swA hU/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lo swA hA/ oM/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun

du 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun du 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur par kun du snang ngo / /de ltar gyur pa

dang / bdud sdig can ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa dang / mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do/ /de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad

dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo chol ba/ mdog dmar ba/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ mi bzad pa/ skra kham pa

gyen du brdzes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa

gcig gi bye ma snyed 'das shing / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs su yang kun du snang ngo / /de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag brgya khro bo chol bas 'dar bar gyur to/ /bdud sdig can ni myos shing

gzir te 'phangs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings so/ /de ltar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams

kyis spos dang / me tog dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs

rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te mngon par dga' bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rang pa mdzad pas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud

chen po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so/ /gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/

'chang ngam klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ sti stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod pa byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyis byas pa'i

gsang sngags thams cad bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so/ /de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag

na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad pas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di smras pa/ o~M` badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi

d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti/ lam bo d+hA ra/ u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam

grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam / klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes

yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i snying po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ srin po 'am/ srin po'i bu 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grul bum gyi bu 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding gi bu 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/

dri za 'am/ dri za'i bu 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi bu 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma 'am/ mkha' 'gro ma'i bu 'am/ sgrub pa 'am/ sbrul 'dzin bcas la sogs pa dang / rjed byed dam/ lus srul po 'am/ ro langs

la sogs pa dang / gcod pa'i gdon thams cad dang / rjed byed la sogs pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje

legs so legs so/ /stong pa nyid do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid do/ /phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /chen po stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na

rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / rim gror bgyi ba dang / bskor bar bgyi ba'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje stobs dpag tu med

pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa drag shul can hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo tir nir nA da/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ /o~M` o~M` oM/ phaT

phaT phaT/ stobs po che la swA hA/ oM rdo rje khro bo stobs po che ha na da hA/ pa tsa ma thA/ bi kI rA/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti la lam bo d+hA ra u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M` dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba duSh+Ta na/ stam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ du rA dza rAn duSh+Ta na ni bA ra ya/ bdag

la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ o~M` a nan ta bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN De hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M` d+h+rig hU~M phaT/ oM shi ro shi ra/ mA li nI/ si ni si ni/ shi shi ni shi shi ni/ oM sarba ad ma dza/ ma hA te dzo/ badzra a sha ni badzra pa sha /a nu pra bi sh+ya sarba

duSh+Tan/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM hU~M ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M/ oM a nan ta bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN De hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra karta ri/ ka ra ka ra tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la d+ha ka d+ha ka dz+wa la dz+wa la

hU~M phaT/ oM bispu ra rak+Sha badzra pany+tsa ra hU~M phaT/ oM ki li ki la badzra bi dzrar b+hUr ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ o~M` badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la da ra da ra/ d+ha ra ya d+ha ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/

dA ra ya dA ra ya/ phaT ya phaT ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ta Ta taT/ tA Da ya tA Da ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ dI pya dI pya/ dI pa ya dI pa ya hU~M phaT/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha

shi kha/ ha ra ha ra hU~M phaT/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la tsaN Da ha na/ da ha pa tsa/ ma thA/ bi ka ri/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bcom ldan 'das tshur

gshegs tshur gshegs/ ha na ha na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ lha dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang pos mchod pa/ thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/

g+hu ru g+hu ru/ kurba kurba/ ma hA kurba/ bi kurba/ ku nad Ti ku nad Ti/ na Ti na Ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ khu ru khu ru/ tu Ta tu Ta/ tud Ta tud Ta/ trad Ta trad Ta/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong

khyer rnam par 'joms par byed pa khro bo chol pa stobs po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru hU~M phaT/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hrI/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu ru swA hA/

oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la sarba duSh+Tan stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ mo ha ya mo ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM ha ha/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ oM bi sa ra/ san tra ya hU~M/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha ra ha ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya

hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M/ mA ma mA ma phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ni bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM ma hA ba la badzra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la gra sa/ u ts+tshuSh+ma sang ga ra hU~M/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug bcu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung

ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug gnon par 'gyur shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bu mang bar 'gyur

ro/ /sa phyogs kyang gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa rnams la skyor chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par

byed par 'gyur ro/ /mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang bu mo yang bde bar btsas par 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang

bdag rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag stong phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ba/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang /

tshangs pa dang / dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ro langs dang / srul po dang / lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/ smyo byed dang / skrod pa dang / gsod pa dang / skem byed dang / sgo glegs dang / 'phrul 'khor dang /

gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung po'i bdag

po dbang bdag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje spar te rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs te/ rdo rje mi bzad

pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / chos kyi dga' ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje rngom bag can du rdo rje spar te/

de nas rdo rje pad ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas te/ rdo rje mi bzad pa'i khro bo chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu khro bo chol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma 'dar te gzir ba bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo / /de dag tshig nas smre zhing srog btang ste sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing

nyams thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan

'das kyi khro bo chol pas gzir cing myos te phongs nas srog la mi lta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ skye ma'o khro bo chen po

'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o mthu che ba'o/ /de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro bo chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o mthu che ba'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na

rdo rjes seng ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la khro bo chol pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa smras pa/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha/ pa tsa/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti la lam bo d+ha ra u ts+tshuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ A

A~M/ ma hA~M swA hA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro bo stobs po che 'di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la drag po'i las dang nad thams cad kyis mi

tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang bgegs dang / log 'dren gyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'dir dbang bskur na bkra mi shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo chen po

la lan khris sngar spyad pa byas te/ khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs su song ba/ byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sems dang

ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyis lung byin pa/ cho ga gang bdud thams cad dang sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang

ba dang / klog pa de bdud dang dgra thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dags dang / sha za dang srul po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rjed byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas la sogs pa thams

cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gsad pa dang / bcing ba thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gcad pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /

rmugs byed dang / rengs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can

dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed dam/ rjes su dran par byed na/ dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lo nyes byung ba'i tshe stobs po che lan bdun

bklags na sprin chen po las char 'bab bo/ /gal te char mi 'bab na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams

kyis sprin chen po las char 'bebs so/ /gal te mi 'bebs na srog skam par 'gyur ro/ /gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du phyogs kyi cha 'am/ klung gi ngos sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram 'am/ mtsho 'gram 'am/ mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa'

lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang / ka ra bi ra ka'i me tog dang / pad ma dmar po dang / a d+hi mug ta ka'i me tog dang / tsam pa ka'i me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pa dang / bum

pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de g.yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bkra mi

shis pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags na g.yul ngor

mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags shes gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ stobs po che zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos so/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi tshul lo/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni theg pa

chen po'o/ /stobs po che zhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o/ /de nas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /skyabs su mchi'o/ /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su

mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /dge bsnyen gyi yan lag bzung bar bgyi'o/ /bde dang thar dang mtho ris dang / /mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni/ /dam pa kun dang phan pa'i phyir/ /stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi/ /de nas bdud sdig

can chos la dga' zhing yid bde ba dang rangs par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dags dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten

gyi sdug bsngal las thar bar byed pa'o/ /de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog

par byed do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa 'am/ bsnyung ba byas pa 'am/ bsnyung ba ma byas pa 'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la sten pa la yang 'grub par byed pa'o/ /de la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro/ /de

nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ci zhig stsol ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig /rab

'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do/ /gos sbyin par byed do/ /dngul sbyin par byed do/ /gser sbyin par byed do/ /ba

lang sbyin par byed do/ /dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i dus su gnas

so/ /'bras bu'i dus kyis yon tan gyi don du gnas so/ /yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid

ldan pa ste/ /stobs po che ni shes rab ldan/ /gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs/ /spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhung / /mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab che/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ /dbang cher

grags shing bsod nams che/ /yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/ /mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir/ /sangs rgyas brgyad stong der gshegs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi bor bzhag ste/

dge bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis gsang sngags 'di sa 'am/ ri 'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i drung du bcangs na 'jigs pa thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes

'di skad ces gsol to/ /su mdo sde 'di 'chang ngam/ klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro nad ma mchis par lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/

'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig /chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /don thams cad

grub pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig /sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub pa'i rgyal po

zhes bya bar yang zung shig /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung shig /

gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / sti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa des 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang

ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes

gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa bzung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu 'am

rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shing lta bur ma rung bar 'gyur ro/ /spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas mchod pa byas na bsod

nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro de la bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na lha dang / mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che bgegs dang

log 'dren thams cad 'ching ba yid la byed na sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang drang srong chen po rnams dang / lha dang klu dang / dri zar bcas pa rnams dgyes dga'o/ /stobs po che'i gzungs

sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par mi byed pa de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad po dag tu skye bar 'gyur

ro/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gror byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yi ge 'dri 'am/ tshig mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i

byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems pa de myos par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang rgyas par bya ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang /

bkra mi shis pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang / dpal gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par

bya'o/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong dang bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so zhes mngon par dgyes pa mdzad do/ /de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu gsungs pa legs so legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus

byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi snying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo / /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA/ oM ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma thA ma thA badzra/ dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka tang ka ye/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te/ a pa rA dzi te/ ma ra se n+ya pra marda nA ye swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig sdigs shig /chings shig chings shig /rnam par chings shig /ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig /grub pa rnams dul bar gyis

shig /dul ba rnams chud mi za bar gyis shig /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig /lha dang klu thams cad tshur shog tshur shog /ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon

nur gyur pa stan las langs ste bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ri la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das 'du byed thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig /'du byed thams cad ni dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o/ /'du

byed thams cad ni glog dang sprin dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni mar me dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni chu bur dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o/ /

'du byed thams cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed thams cad ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o/ /'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi

klung dang 'dra'o/ /'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o/ /skar ma dang 'dra'o/ /sems can rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/ mi mthong / mi shes mi 'jal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

nyid kyis 'jal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to/ /'du byed thams cad stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid gcig par mkhyen to/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen

to/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'di nyid shes

te spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /mtshan nyid 'di nyid

shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di

skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin

gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams mdo sde 'dis byed par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di yongs su nub pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs

pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing sdod de/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa

zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mdo sde 'di la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang nas bka'

lung bzhin du bgyi zhing su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gan du mchi'o zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lha thams cad kyang 'ong ngo / /lha thams

cad kyis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /legs so legs so bdag cag kyang dam pa stsol bar mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid gang gis na mdo sde 'di chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum bcu rtsa gnyis lon pa'i nyin

mo ri btang zung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyis chos bstan te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te mtshan nyid

des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba shes bya'o/ /mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su

'du shes skyed do/ /'khor ba de nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par byed do/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba bgrod dkar sems can gyi/ /srid pa'i phur ba 'byin cing shes rab kyis/ /srid

phur sems klung 'joms shing thub pa yi/ /chos bstan pas ni sdig 'joms legs chos spyod/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol pa su mdo sde 'di

'chang ba dang klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pas bsod nams kyi phung po ci zhig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang

dag par rab tu ston pa des na ting nge 'dzin bye ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong

phrag mang po mthong nas bsam pa rgya chen pos sti stang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bla mar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/ /mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyang

'bul lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang bde bar sbyar ba sgrub po/ /dge 'dun gyi tshogs la yang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi chos bstan pa la yang sti stang du byas te nyan to/ /len to 'dzin to klog go/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ji lta ba

dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro/ /stobs po che pha rol gnon pa khro bo de'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad swa sti swa sti/ sid d+hi/ sid d+hi swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'phags pa byams pa dang

'jam dpal dang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas

'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /

lag na rdo rje yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nI lAm+ba ra d+ha

ra badzra pA NI kal pa nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sangs rgyas gang gA'i

klung gi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mig me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klu nag po se ral

khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ ya sos ma mchu mnon pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad

can/ lce glog ltar 'gyu ba/ gsus po che sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings pa/ a la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa/ rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri

yod pas rkang pa'i pus mor phyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun du 'khrug par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can/ khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/

klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho bAn nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan ni lAm ba ra d+ha ra sha ri ra~M/ badzra pA Ni

hri da ya~M/ yaHsa mA ti krA mA ti/ ud sA da na~M b+ha bi shu ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha/ ma hi pra ba ta/ ha ra ha ra nA ga nA~M/ pra ha ra pra ha ra nA/ ba nA~M/ tshin da tshin da nA sa hri da yA ni/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha nA ga da ma ni/ bi si ma d+ha nA ga sha ri ra~M/ bis+pho Ta

Ta ya nA ga nA ya nA ni/ tad+ya thA/ hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi da ra nA ya phaT/ nA god sa da nA ya phaT/ nI lA~M ba sa nA ya phaT/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pa ra kra mA ya phaT/ kri tAn tA ya phaT/ kri tAn ta rU pa ya phaT/ ro Sha Na ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kusmaN

tod sa da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ ak+Sha a basma ra bi na sha ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ dA ra dA ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+han bin sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trU~M sa~M g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI

lAm ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i cho ga la gnod sbyin gyis zin pa la chu la sngags kyis btab ste gtor na btang bar 'gyur ro/ /klu bzlog par 'dod na smag shad kyi lcug ma 'am/ bal po'i se'u'i lcug mas bya'o/ /yi dags dang /

rjed byed rnams la skud pas bya'o/ /rims nad med par bya ba dang / gzhog phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /nor 'dod na zhag gcig bsnyung bar 'dug ste pog phor gyis bdugs na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba'i

don thams cad ston la gser gyi dong tshe bdun stong sbyin par byed do/ /rgyas btab pa dgrol bar 'dod na thal bas bya'o/ /sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod na yungs dkar gyis bya'o/ /'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba la ni mar snying ba 'am/ thal ba

'am/ yungs dkar gyis bya'o/ /nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /byis pa gdon gyis nyen pa la ni tshon sna lnga'i skud pa la bsrung ba'i mdud pa byas

te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun bzlog par 'dod na sas bya'o/ /dug la ni rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o/ /bdag bsrung ba la ni yid kyis sam chus bya'o/ /gzhan bsrung ba la ni skud pa sngon pos bya'o/ /las de dag thams

cad la sngags brjod pa ni lan gsum 'am/ bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten sku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de/ sngags

stong bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dI pa~M ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba rgya brtson 'grus seng ges dpal

na len dra'i sgo 'gram du bsgyur// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra bi dA ra NA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas lag na

rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bden

pa/ sra ba/ brtan pa thams cad du thogs pa med pa/ thams cad du ma pham pa/ sems can thams cad skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad gnon par

byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jigs par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ 'byung po

thams cad tshar gcod pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ sems can thams cad srung ba/ zhi ba/

rgyas pa/ sems can thams cad rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi mthu chen po 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes rab tu smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsa Na Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/

oM tra Ta tra Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ g+hUr+N+Na g+hUr+N+Na/ g+hUr+N+NA pa ya g+hUr+N+NA pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ sa~M bo d+ha ya sa~M bo d+ha ya/ b+h+ra ma b+h+ra ma/ sa~M b+h+rA ma ya sa~M b+h+rA ma ya/ sarba b+hU tA ni/ ku Ta ku Ta/ sa~M ku Ta
ya sarba bid+yA~M/ badzra badzra/ s+pho Ta ya badzra badzra/ ka Ta badzra badzra/ ma Ta badzra badzra/ ma tha badzra badzra/ aT+Ta hA sa nI la badzra/ su badzra ya swA hA/ he phul+lu/ ni

ru phul+lu/ ni grih+na kul+lu/ mi li tsul+lu/ ku ru kul+lu/ badzra bi dza yA ya swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na pra mo Ta nA ya swA hA/ tsa ra ni tsa ra/ ha ra ha ra/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya/ badzra bi dA rA

ya swAhA/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ b+hin da b+hin da/ ma hA kI la kI lA ya swA hA/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ kro d+ha kro d+ha badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ nu ru tsu ru/ tsaN+Da kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ badzra kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ ha ra ha ra/ badzra d+ha ra

ya swA hA/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ badzra pra b+ha ny+dza nA ya swA h+'a/ ma ti s+thi ra badzra/ shru ti s+thi ra badzra/ pra ti s+thi ra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ a pra ti ha ta badzra/ a mo g+ha badzra/ e hi badzra/ shI g+h+ra~M badzra ya swA hA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/

sarba badzra ku la~M a bar ta ya swA hA/ a mu kam mA ra ya phaT/ na mas+sa man ta badzrA NA~M/ sarba ba la~M A bar ta ya/ ma hA ba le/ ka ta ba le ta ta le/ a tsa le/ maN Da la ma ye/ a ti badzra/ ma hA ba la/ be ga ra Na/ a dzi te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ti Ti ti Ti/ ping

ga le/ da ha da ha/ te dzo ba ti/ ti li ti li/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ma hA ba le/ badzra~M ku sha dz+wa la swA hA/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ d+hA ra

ya d+hA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da badzra/ b+hin da b+hin da badzra hU~M phaT/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mri te hU~M phaT/ sdig pa thams cad byang byas na/ /sdug bsngal

thams cad med par 'gyur/ /rgyud do cog gi rtsa ba ste/ /dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/ /sems can dbang po nyams pa dang / /tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang / /phun sum tshogs min gang chags dang / /lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang / /

mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang / /bran gza' la sogs gtses pa dang / /phan tshun 'thun pa ma yin dang / /nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las gnod pa dang / /'jigs pa dang ni 'phongs pa dang / /gza' dang rgyu skar byad

stems dang / /mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang / /mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/ /rmyi lam sdig pa mthong na yang / /des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yis/ /mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/ /gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing / /gtsang

ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te/ /zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/ /mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/ /mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/ /srog chags dag ni thams cad kyi/ /mi bzad pa yi nad rnams kyang / /de dag thams cad zhi bar blta/ /

tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa kun las rnam par thar/ /nor bu yungs kar d+'ur ba dang / /rin chen rma med tsan dan bcas/ /shel dang rdo rje me tog dang / /chu yis gser ram yang na ni/ /dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang

rung / /gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dgang / /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ /yang na lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad/ /rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni/ /rgyal po rtag tu khrus gyis shig /rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs

rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra/ dA na shI la dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slar yang mang po dang bstun nas/ gtan la legs par phab bo/ / @#/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i

mtshan brgyad po gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs

su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rigs pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas/ gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/

bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa

mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni khyod gtum pa yin/ bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa de dag

thams cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do/ /lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rigs 'di dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyi ming brgyad po gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams

med pa lnga byed pa yang sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rje khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyang 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang

phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang / gang thos na tshangs par ma spyad pa yang tshangs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang / thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang / bsnyung ba ma byas pa yang bsnyung ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong ma yin pa

yang dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang / las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming brgyad po gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje ngas bshad kyis nyon cig /'di lta ste/ khyod ni glang po che'i rna ba can yin/ khyod ni rgyan bzang po dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni bden pa'i sprin nyid
