yin/ khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin no/ /khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa dag gis thos na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bdun

gyi bar du sems can dmyal bar skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe mdun na bzhugs shing de dag de la chos ston par mdzad do/ /chos bstan pa des na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams

kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /na mo bud d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+harma s+ya/ na ma sa~M g+ha s+ya/ na mo badzra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ aT Te/ maT Te/ kha raT Te/

so me so mA su khi/ hi ri hi ri/ mi ri ki ri/ b+hi b+hi bi sa ni sid d+h+yan tu sarba kar+ya Ni sA d+ha ya man tra pA da swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom
ldan 'das legs so legs so/ /'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de ni legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de de legs so/ /de de legs te/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog sgrub pa ni bzlas brjod bgyid

pa dang sgrub pa'i tshe mchod pa bgyis la ming brgyad po bklag par bgyi'o/ /bklags na bdag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' nas dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal lo/ /bgegs kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub

stsol bar bgyid do/ /nyal ba'i tshe bklags na rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lan 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa

yang bskal pa bzang por byang chub sems dpar 'gyur ro zhes bdag mchi'o/ /yang lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad po gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya da sha badzra pA Ni na hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig

na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs bu 'am/ rigs

kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rus shes sam/ gsang sngags shes pa de la byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /srin po rnams dang / lhag ma za ba

rnams dang / bdug pa za ba rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ u ki ri ma ki ri/ ma rI rtsa par+Na sha ba ri/ u li me/ mi li me/ i li me/ mi li me/ i li me/ mi li me/ i li ma

le me/ heg ke d+hig ke/ hug ke/ d+hu d+hu re/ pra d+ha re/ a lam pha le/ phA lam pha le/ khu khu me ti ku me tu me/ khi ri khi ri/ sA d+ha sA d+ha/ sarba bag kwa le/ ban d+ha ma bag kwa le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje

bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid log pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde

legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig /'di lta ste/ rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gangs gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / lus ngan gyi bu

sa mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang / myos

pa dang / rab tu myos pa na yang bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol ba thob shig /gsang

sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra Ni swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ka te/ ke te/ sa~M ka te/ ud du le/ d+ha d+he/ ta te/ ta pad

te swA hA/ tsi tse tsi tse/ tsi khe lo tshe na ne/ b+he d+he ni/ sarba bir+ya tshe da ni/ sarba kri ta ka khorda/ pa ra kri ta nA sha ni/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no/ /

tad+ya thA/ a le lak+She/ pa ke le lak+She/ a ke/ pa ke/ lak+She swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ hu tu hu tu/ hu tu tu/ bi tu bi tu/ bi tu tu/ gats+tsha/ sa ba te/ pa ta ha ta ye swA hA/ na mo b+ha ga bA te bud d+ha s+ya sid d+h+yan tu man tra bA da swA hA/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod

do/ /'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM mu tsi ni swA hA/ mu khe se swA hA/ mo hA ni swA hA/ dan ti ri swA hA/ cho ga ni chu khyor ba gang la bzlas pa byas te

'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rjes rmi lam bstan par 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam mthong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi

bdag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas rdo rje gzhon nu'i rig sngags bshad do/ /dngos grub thob pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/ gdon thams cad yongs su 'dul ba/ kun tu srung ba/

slar ldog pa 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin pas bshad de/ tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ sa ra sa ra/ a mo g+ha badzre/ badzra ka la ka la A tsi ta badzre ni/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ra/ na maHsarba gra ho su pa tra be b+h+yeH/ ka ta ka ta/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Ta nan/ ka ra

ma ni ta nA ya/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ da ma da ra/ sha ma sha ma/ g+hu ma g+hu ma/ g+hu me g+hu me/ badzra ma la da ri/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ tsa kre hri da ya/ ni ra mi te/ nI la ba se ne/ so ma ka sA ya/ bi tsin dra/ sa nan ti sa ka la ras+t+ri/ kri shan pa~M ga li/ bi kri tra be

ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha man/ sarba ta sarba ta/ b+h+ya ye b+h+yaH/ sarba pa lA ya/ b+h+yi sa sa s+ya/ sarbA da tra rak+Sha ku ru ku ru/ ba ri ba pa ri grA ma la na~M shAn ting swa s+ya ya na~M/ da na ra pa ri ha ra~M/ shasta tha ri ha ra~M/ bi sha tu sha nan/ sarba a mr-i ta

ni pa ra nan/ tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ badzre mA la d+ha ri/ badzra ni da ni/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad la srungs shig srungs shig /gdug pa thams cad med par mdzod cig /ha da ha ha ha da/ gdon thams cad la'o/ /

hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M / phaT phaT phaT/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /ka da ug ka ru pi ni pa tsa pa tsa/ phra men ma thams cad bskrad do bzlog go/ a pe a pe rdo rje gzhon nu rdo rje gzhon nus 'then pa rims thams cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams cad 'joms

pa/ b+ha~M dza b+ha~M dza/ ta ma ta ma/ bdag la su zhig smod de/ tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ da ra ya da ra ya/ gdon thams cad 'gog pa dang / rdo rje gzhon nu slar ldog pa'i rig sngags 'di la su zhig 'da' bar byed na/ de la rdo rje gzhon nu 'bar bas

spyi bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ gra sa ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ su zhig bdag la gzhan gyis rig sngags dang / byad stems byed pa dang / byed du 'jug pa de dag gi lus la slar 'gro zhing slar 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /ga ga te

a tsa le/ ri pe ri pe/ pra ha ra stam b+ha ni/ pra ha ra sa~M ka ma ni/ 'tsho ba'i dbang po la srungs shig srungs shig /su zhig bdag la bgegs byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad du gdung bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyi phreng bas so/ /sa ra sa

ra/ su reN De su reN De/ rdo rje'i pho nya mos phyogs thams cad bcing ngo bcing bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mo ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ni/ nad thams cad 'jil ba/ su zhig rig sngags 'di las 'da' bar byed na dug chen por 'gyur ro/ /

gang zhig rig sngags 'di lus la 'chang ba dang / kha ton byed na/ de la nam yang dug gis mi tshugs/ ma rungs pa'i gdon thams cad kyang 'da' bar mi byed/ 'phra men ma thams cad kyang 'da' bar mi byed/ mthong ba tsam gyis

kyang dbang du 'gyur ro/ /'thab mo dang / rtsod pa thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'di'i stobs kyis thams cad sgrol lo/ /a mr-i te sa~M b+ha ba swA hA/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /dgra thams cad kyi nang

du song yang rung / 'tshe ba'i dus su yang rung / dur khrod du song yang rung / btson ra'i nang du song yang rung / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'jil bar byed pa'i rgyal mo las ma 'da' shig /lha dang 'jig rten dang bcas pa dang /

bdud sde dang bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pas kyang mi 'da' na 'dre gdon ngan pa lta ci smos/ phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra a dzi ti a na la pra mo ha nI nA ma

d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

'das rin po che'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa can gyi ri/ gangs ri sul gyi mchog /ri rab kyi smad dang rked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhing re'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo du ma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo

leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ga ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu dang / bla res mdzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs te/

de nas bcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams

dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khri nyi stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig go/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/ gnas par bde ba/ mnyan na bde ba/ 'khor

ba las nges par 'byung ba'i chos ston to/ /de na lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin rnams

dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / srin po'i bu rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams dang /

'byung po'i tshogs rnams dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sgra de dag gsan

nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye bzhin bzangs dag ci'i phyir ku co dang / 'jigs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byin/ de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs

te tho brtsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa/ sa chen po las sa gzhan

thob pa rgyal 'tshab tu nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje'i zom ltar dpung mgo yangs pa/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i cod pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/

rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus mkhregs shing sra ba/ lag na rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / lag cha brtan po 'bar ba thogs pa/ rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams

'di kun du snang bar byed cing rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / rdo rje'i be con dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i tog dang / rdo rje'i snang ba dang / rdo rje sngon po dang / rin po che'i rdo rje dang / gsang ba'i rdo rje dang / 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang /

rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang / dmag skyong rnams dang / sa skyong rnams dang / rdo rje rig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang / rdo rje'i yum rnams dang / rdo rje rnam par 'dren

rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang / rdo rje gnon po rnams dang / rdo rje rmi lam ngan byed rnams yang dag par skul/ rnam par skul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa thams cad la kun tu snang bar byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/

gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/ yang dag par skul/ so sor skul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te

phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su yi rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje 'chang khyod song la lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / rlung lha'i bu rnams dang / nam

mkha' lding rnams dang / nam mkha' lding gi bu rnams dang / 'dus pa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin cing nyam thag pa myong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs par gyis shig /de nas rdo rje 'chang stan las langs te/ lha dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang /

nam mkha' lding dang / 'byung po'i tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston cing rdo rje mtshon cha'i me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro

ba dang / me stag rnam par 'phro ba dang / lce 'bebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rnams gzir to/ /de nas bskal pa chen po lngar rmi lam dang / chu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang / gzi brjid

dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ma dang / bzod pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / rang gi longs spyod thams cad las byung ba'i las grub pa'i rdo rje de byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje de'i lag tu byin no/ /

de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / snying rje

byed pa/ rang gi rdo rje dang / rigs kyi rig pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / bklags pa'i tshul du gyur pa drag po dang / dbang po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ de ltar

de las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das khro bo drag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/ sdang ba rnams skyod pa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsad nas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams spur mar rlog pa/ yon

po rnams srong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srin po rnams dngangs par byed pa/ rang gi gsang sngags rnams rdzogs par byed pa/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phur bus 'debs pa/ nub pa rnams

ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa/ gsod pa/ gnod par byed pa/ phung bar byed pa de der song nas lha rnams dang / lha'i bu rnams dbang du byed de/ de ltar drag po pa drag po grub pa dang / khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang / lha ma yin pa

lha ma yin grub pa dang / de dag spyir skul zhing dkyil 'khor du 'jug /skyod par byed/ mthu ston par byed/ rjed par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do/ /stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gis rdo rje mi pham me ltar rab tu

rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs gsung ba dang / gzungs 'di'i stobs dang / bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rje bskul nas/ 'od des de rab

tu dga' ste rdo rje las snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang / zla ba'i 'od zil du brlag par byas nas snang ba gcig pur byed cing rgya mtsho chen po ni skems/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khor lo dang /

lce 'bebs pa'i 'brug ni bsgrags/ sgra drag po ni phyung / bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag par ni byas so/ /de na rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs me lce 'od 'phro chen po khong na 'dug pa/ skra

tshogs gser dang rin po che 'dra ba/ rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid pas ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems

chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song ngo / /de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal ba chen po dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha 'dun par bya ba'i

stobs byin cig /de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes lan gsum tshig tu smras so/ /thor tshugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag po rtse gsum dang / khyab 'jug gi 'khor

lo dang / gshin rje'i be con dang / lus ngan gyi dbyug tho dang / dbang po'i rdo rje dang / chu lha'i zhags pa dang / log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang / lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang / rlung lha rnams kyi gzi dang / shugs dang grub pa

rnams kyi rmongs byed dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang / klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang / dug dang / khro bo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi 'am ci dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / grul bum

dang / bden bral dang / gnon po dang / ro langs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang / de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyongs shig /mig gi 'dzums pa tsam gyis yud tsam la thams cad mchod nas lag na rdo rje la snying po 'di phul te smras pa/

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra NI/ ma hA a bar ta yi sh+ya mi/ a hi badzre/ ku Ti li/ ko Ti pA ba kA ku la shi khi/

ka bi la ke shi/ ta Ti tsi Ta tsi Ta mi Ta ni/ karka Ta mu Ti bad Ti badzre/ ma hA bi d+hul lo le/ pu gu pu lu/ su mu su mu/ sa ra sa ra/ s+pha Ta s+pha Ta/ su d+yo te/ ping ga le tsi Te/ bi tsa Ti/ dz+wa la ping ga le/ sarba de ba ga na/ pra ha ra Na mA yA/ sid d+h+ya dA

yi ge/ su re ke/ ku ru ke/ badzra g+ho Ne/ badzra DI D+ha/ sA ra pra ha ra Ne/ rad na tra ya/ di kra la bud d+he te/ badzra d+ha ra bi shwa sa ni ka /a pra ti ha ta pra marda ni swA hA/ gang gsang sngags 'di rjes su dran nas klog gam/ sgom 'am/ 'dzin pa de

thos na ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa dang rjes su yi

rang bas 'gugs par byed do/ /dug dang gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pas rnam par skrag par byed do/ /de nas lha dang lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam

par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma yang myong nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i

sprin dang / rin po che mang po'i char rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod de snyan cing zab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces

bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rdo rje mi pham pa me ltar rab tu

rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan

la phab pa/ / @/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra sUk+Sh+ma a pra ti ha ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje hU~M zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan

te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u gcig byung ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs

kyi bdag po/ lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang rig sngags gzungs sngags rnams rab tu brjod du gsol/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/

bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu smras so/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra pA NA ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya

thA/ oM ha ra ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badzra/ d+hu na d+hu na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badzra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya badzra/ dA ru Na dA ru Na badzra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da badzra/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha badzra hU~M phaT/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hu

lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo thams cad kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas

rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byang / tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dang / dug dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par thar nas/ gang zhig

gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la rtsi ma ga d+ha sprin gyis bshig pa 'am/ skyu ru ra rlon pa gser gyis bzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje phri mo spros pas de dag gi phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur du rlag par 'gyur ro/ /

lhas smras na lha'i zla ba gcig gam/ lo lnga na lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gis smras na bdud kyi mtshon cha rnams myur du btul bar 'gyur ro/ /mis brjod na gang la dmigs pa de mi'i zla ba gcig gam/ mi'i lo lnga na

nges par brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad phyung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por

bsgrags so/ /rdo rje phra mo thogs pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya badzra b+hai ra ba d+hA ra NI nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma sel ba/ mtha' yas pa/ mu thug pa med pa/ dam pa sbyin pa/ shin tu rgya che ba/ thams cad bdag la 'thun par rtag tu mtha' yas

pa'i dam pa'i mchog stsol bar gyur cig /de la nga'i rdo rje'i tshig ni 'di dag go/ a ra ra/ a sa ma/ sa ma tA/ a nan+ta d+harma tre/ kha NA kha NA/ ma hA bi re/ tsa le sa ma ma/ A sa hA/ ma hA ba le/ ka Na ka Na/ ma hA ba la Ag gri he/ ha ha badzra

badzrA hA ye/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hU~M hU~M maN Da la/ sa ma pa ra ag kra pig pra me/ ku ru ku ru tu ru tu ru sarba~M thA/ sarba hi/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ag kri ni phaT swA hA/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags thams cad kyi snying po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan

stong bzlas brjod byas na/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags thams cad lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas par 'gyur ro/ /las gzhan thams cad kyang don yod cing thogs pa med par byed de/ dam tshig gsum pa'i cho ga las 'byung ba'i rig

sngags dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / gzungs thams cad kyi nang na las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /de nas cho ga mi bzad pa/ /rdo rje gtams pa 'dra ba ni/ /klu dang lha min srin bcas pa'i/ /sum bcu gsum lhas mi

shigs pa/ /de khros pas ni lhas mchod pa'i/ /brgya byin nyid kyang 'dar bar 'gyur/ /'byung po kun gyis ma dmad pa/ de ni bsrung bar byed pa'i mchog /ji ltar lhar bcas 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas 'dra ba'i ston pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig

ni de yis ni/ /skye bo kun la bsrung gyur cig tad+ya thA/ oM badzra pra ka ra/ badzra pra ka ra/ badzra da~MSh+T+rA~M/ b+ha yA pa hA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ pa ri tsu ma bi ke/ tsu lu te le/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra b+hai ra ba s+ya/ ma hA ga Na pa ti s+ya/ badzra shag ti/ pa ra shu/ pa sha /

hastA ya/ ba ra ka na ka /badzra bai dur+ya/ a lang kri ta/ sha ri rA ya/ badzra pA Ni ra nu pA lA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ a na yA/ a na yA/ ma hA ga nA pa ti la g+hu la g+hu/ e hi e hi/ Ag kra ma ag kra ma/ sha rI ra~M/ gri hI ta ma/ gri hI ta ma/ gri hI ta ma/ driSh+T+ra ma/

d+hiSh+T+ra mA bA/ ad tra bi sha tu sha rI ra~M/ /kin tsi rA ya si/ /bi d+hu na/ ba d+ha na/ pa Ta pa Ta/ kam pa kam pa/ rang ga rang ga /mo da mo da/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ bi dzrim bA bi dzrim bA/ pU ra pU ra/ g+hur+Na g+hur+Na/ a bi sha a bi sha /shig g+h+ra shig g+h+ra/ ma hA badzra bai ra

bo/ gaN pu ti rA dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ cho ga la dgra thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / byad stems thams cad gcad pa la ni ba'i lci ba la dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ sems khros pas mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ sa la btsugs na

de ma thag tu byad stem thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs bzlog par 'dod pas ni dbyug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ de phyogs su 'phangs na dgra thams cad myos par 'gyur ro/ /klu dbang du bya bar 'dod na khros te

rdo rje la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na klu rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /ser ba zlog par 'dod pas ni rdo rje ha cang mi drag par bskor zhing / sgra yang ha cang gsang mi mtho bar brjod na klu rnams ser ba mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /chang

bsrung bar 'dod pas ni chang gi rdzas rnams yungs dkar la lan bdun bsngags na thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad zhi bar 'dod pa la ni nad dang 'thun pa'i sman nam chu la lan bdun bsngags te 'thungs sam byugs na nad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /las

gang byed pa thams cad la 'ang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na bsams pa de grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi gzungs zhes bya ba/ ma rungs pa phyir bzlog pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //'phags pas gsungs

pa'i gzungs rnams rnam mang yang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed zhal nas gsungs pa'i gzungs/ /bsrung bya'i las bdun ldan pa'i gzungs mchog 'di/ /kun gyi thun mong ma yin rnal 'byor dam pa'i gzungs/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po

don yod rdo rje'i zhal snga nas bsgyur nas/ bod kyi ban de skyo 'od 'byung la gnang ngo // // 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi

sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan

'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang / glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren

dang / 'tshe ba can dang / sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar gtug pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni legs so legs so/ /khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig /de nas

khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ pra dz+wa

la ti dib ha/ dang Sh+T+rod kata/ b+ha ya b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la/ badzra pa ra shu pA sha hAsta ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ a mri ta kuN Da lA ni/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ khA da khA da/ khA hi khA hi/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha

da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ grih+na grih+na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ gardza gardza/ tardza tardza/ bispo ta ya/ bispo ta ya/ b+ha ga ban/ a mr-i ta kuN Da lI/ mur+d+hAn tA Da ya badzre na/ sarba bi g+han bi na ya kan/ ni bA ra ya/ ma hA ga na pa ti dzA bi tan ta/ kA rA ya hU~M phaT

phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga na pa ta ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang po'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maSh+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pA ta ye/ na mo ma hA badzra kro d+hA ya dang Sh+T+rod kata/ b+hai ra bA yA/ a si paSh+Ta na hasta ya/ he he/

pa ta pa ta/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a mri ta kuN Da lI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ ga na pa ti bi tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na maSh+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/

ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ bi ma la ka na ka dz+wa la b+hu Sha NA ya/ ga ga na a mr-i ta sam b+ha ya/ rag ta ma l+ya/ a nu le pa na pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badzra pA Ni tu l+ya/ b+he gA yA/ de+e ba/ nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha rak+Sha

sa pra mA thA nA ya/ trai lo kya go+o tsa rA ya/ sha ta sai n+ya/ bi drA pa na ka rA ya/ tri rad na gar b+hod ta mA ya/ a mr-i ta kuN Da lI/ e h+ye hi da~MSh+T+rad ka Ta b+hai ra bA ga ga ni bi d+h+yud dz+wa la s+phu ling gA sha ni/ tu l+ye ru bo di ta/ sam b+hu ta/ oM/ kha kha

kha kha/ grih+na grih+na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+han bi na ka ya ka Nan/ hri da yan phaT/ gan d+harba hri da yan phaT/ rak+Sha hri da yan phaT/ brah+ma

rak+Sha sa hri da yan phaT/ sarba dz+wa ra hri da yan phaT/ sarba tsA tur tha ka hri da yan phaT/ sarba nA gA nan hri da yan phaT/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a b+hi shi a b+hi shi/ in na tsa me kA kya~M ku ru badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o/ /

na mo badzra kro d+ha ya/ dang Sh+T+rod ka ka ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha swA hA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ /de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang / bzlas

brjod byas shing bsgrubs na/ bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad bton cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang / bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'tshal lo/ /de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so/ /o~M` a mr-i te hU~M phaT/ bdud

rtsi thabs sbyor gyi snying po'o/ /rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i thad du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo bo mthur du gtugs so/ /kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i

ngag nyon cig /rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo gshags sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtubs pa dang /

rdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / skams pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig /nga'i mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig /gang 'di gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / des srung ba byed pa

de la glags ma tshol cig /til sbrus pa 'am/ zas ngan pa za yang rung / grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig /zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ /nyi ma

'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyi bzhin rtag tu 'brang ngo / /log 'dren rnams kyang glags mi tshol lo/ /til dang sran chung dang / 'bras dang / pen tse yang rung / snu~M mkhur bar ba ta dang / la bug kyang rung ste/ thams

cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin na de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang yon tan dpag tu med par shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi snying po/ rdzogs s+ho// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA daN Da nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod

chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na 'dug go/ der 'di lta ste/ lha'i gdon rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi

'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang /

grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la

shin tu gtses so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bya rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum

bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ngus te mchi ma blags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod ci'i phyir nga'i mdun na 'dug nas mchi ma klog /de skad ces

bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i gnas na bud shing chen po lta bu'i phyogs na mchis mchis na/ der lha'i gdon

rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / klu'i gdon rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / mi'i gdon rnams dang /

rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / gzig rnams dang / bya rog rnams dang / 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul

rnams dang / gzhan yang mi dang / mi ma lags pa'i sems can rnams kyis bdag la shin tu gtses lags mod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa/ sgra gcan zin khyod kyis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi

rig sngags 'khor bzhi po dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba ba dang yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ba 'di zung shig /tad+ya thA/ ang gA

bang gA/ tang gA/ ta rang gA/ sa rA sa rA/ ta rang gA swa/ sa dang sa/ dza d+ha rA/ ag ka re/ a rA bI rA/ ta rA bI rA/ ka ra bI rA/ karkar bI rA/ tsu ru bI rA/ tsu ru tsu ru/ in dra/ in dra ki/ sa ra ha na sa/ ha na sa ki sa ra/ mi tsi re lA/ ma hA mits+tsha/ ba

hi ShI kA ka ling tsa kA ang ge dza ye/ dze ye li kA/ e lA/ tsin ta/ li li/ ti le ti le/ su ma ti/ bu su ma ti/ tsu lu nad Te/ tsu lu tsu lu nad Te/ tsu la na Te/ ku na Te/ ha rI Ta ki/ na rI Ta ki ta/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ d+hA ra Ne/ d+hA ra Ne/ uSh+Ta/ bi pI li ka /uSh+Ta/ ba pi la

ke/ ka ra kaR+thi ke/ kA ke li/ tsa la nad ti/ ka gi ma le/ la ma ti rak+Sha ma ti/ bA la ku le/ bad sa le/ un mi le/ ta ra bI re/ ta ra ta ra bI re/ ku ru bI re/ ku ru ku ru be+e re/ tsu ru bi re/ tsu ru bi re/ tsu ru tsu ru bI re/ ma hA bI re/ i

ra ma ti/ bar ma ti/ rak+Sha ma ti/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni/ pa ra ma su ra sA d+ha ni/ a pra ti ha te/ rgyal po dbang po dang / rgyal po zla ba dang / rgyal po gshin rje dang / rgyal po rlung lha dang / rgyal po gzi can dang / rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu dang / rgyal po be con dang /

rgyal po be con med dang rgyal po tshangs pa stong ldan dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rje/ chos kyi rgyal po/ 'jig rten thams cad la thugs brtse ba bla na med pas bdag la bsrung du gsol yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang /

yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ i la me le ta sa lA/ i

ra ma ti/ bi ra ma ti/ tsa la ma ti/ phu ru ma ti/ phu ru phu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ ba ra khu ru ru/ khu ru ma ti/ b+hU mi maN De/ ka li ke/ tsaN Da le/ a ki sa rA le/ i yA sA/ sa la ma to hu le s+thu le/ sha le dza ya s+thu le/ tsa la nA Ti/ tsa la nA ti/ nA ga nan d+hA

ra NI/ go ra hi ni/ go le/ hi he/ aN Da re/ paN Da re/ ke yU re/ ke tu ma ti/ b+hU ta~M ga me/ b+hU ta ba te/ d+ha r+ye ma hA ba le/ a tsun de/ a tsu run de/ d+ha ran d+ha ra/ dza ya li kA/ dza le go ro hA ni tsa ra hu ru hu ru/ run d+hu run d+hu/ hu ru/ d+hu ma ti/ d+ha ran

d+ha re d+ha re/ bi shwa ma ti/ na sha ni/ ban d+ha ni/ mo tsa ni/ bi mo tsa ni/ sad+ha ni/ sho d+ha ni/ bi sho d+ha ni/ sa~M gi ra ni/ man thI ra ni/ ad tsid da ni/ sa d+hu ta ra mA ne/ ha ra ha ra/ ban d+hu ma ti/ hi ri hi ri/ ge ri le/ hu ru hu ru/ bing ga le swA hA/ sangs rgyas

bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags brgya rtsa bcu pa 'di skud pa la mdud de/ lag pa la btags sam/ mgul du btags na kun nas dpag tshad bcu khor

yug tu be con rnams dang / me tog rnams dang / phyag rgya rnams kyis de bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /de la mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / nad dang / rims nad dang / rims drag po dang / rig sngags dang / ro

langs dang / khro gdug dang / me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang gsang sngags sbyor ba rnams legs par sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams kyang grub par byed pa'o/ /grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa'o/ /pha rol

gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o/ /pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o/ /nad dang mya ngan dang / bgegs rnam par 'jig par byed pa'o/ /'thab pa'i rnyog pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o/ /gdon thams cad zlog par byed pa'o/ /gdon gang gis mi gtong ba

de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba/ kun tu 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pas de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas

so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi yang lcags kyi 'khor lo spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor du gnas pa mi 'thob bo/ /sgra gcan zin rgyal po dang / mi rgod dang /

me dang chu dang / mtshon dang 'brog dang / dgon pa dang ri dang / mya ngam du song ba gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig sngags 'di lan cig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sgra gcan zin be con chen po'i gzungs sngags

'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ gsung ba/ gsung bar 'gyur ba mchog tu grub pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ lha dang klu dang / dri za la sogs pas bstod pa/ 'byung po thams cad

kyis yongs su gzung ba ste/ bdag dang sems can thams cad gnod pa thams cad las bde bar gyur cig /nad med pa dang / 'jigs pa med par gyur cig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin

yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa be con chen po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen

gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya big+han bi na ya kA ra d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bgegs sel ba'i

gzungs/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo

tshogs kyi bdag po su gang tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'dzin pa des cho ga thams cad dang dgongs pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ na mo stu te/ ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ Da ha Da ha/

gr-i hA nA/ b+han dza/ b+han dza/ na mo stu te/ ru ru tsa tsa ye swA hA/ a b+hu trA/ bi na duHkha na man tsed d+ha pa ra sa ma gad tsha ti/ ha ha ya/ ma hA ha sting k+Sha ta nan/ bra go pa ye mo/ ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ na mo na ma swA hA/ nang par langs te sngags lan bdun bzlas

la/ chu khyor ba gang steng dang 'og gi phyogs su gtor cig dang / bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags sgrub 'dod pas skud pa dkar po la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bor te/ lag pa la bcings na rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /

bgegs thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /gang na tshogs kyi bdag po snang ba der sngags 'di lan/ cig bklags na yang bgegs rnams bar chad mi byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'khor de dag thams cad dga' ste/

lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bgegs sel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //gu gul ser po dang / pha bang gi

rtug pa kun la rku ba'i rtag pa sbyar ba'i du bas bdugs na/ 'go ba'i nad pa'i gam du phyin yang mi tshugs/ gos pa la thug na nyur du sel/ khyim du 'byung po gnod pa dag la rab tu bsngags so// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba la ba tI nA ma pra t+yang

gi rA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can/ 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung po thams cad 'gog pa/ rims nad thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zlog pa/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon thams cad rnam par

'joms pa/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad 'joms pa/ mi mdza' ba thams cad so sor rengs par byed pa/ tshe skyong ba srog skyong ba'i phyir zlog pa 'di brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki te/ a ba lo ki ta/ sam b+ha be/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra

ba ra/ kA le kA le kA le/ ma hA kA le/ a ba lo ki ta/ bra swA dA ne/ d+ha me d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha ma ne/ sa ma hi te/ bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/

yongs su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyang du gsol/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ chad pa spong bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshon cha spong bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/ sa bcing bar mdzad

du gsol/ ku ru ku ru pan ma k+Shi/ bi d+hi bi d+hi bi d+hi/ mArga sam pra swa te/ a mri ta te dza ba ti/ gnod pa thams cad las bdag la rtag par bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ mu lu mu lu mu lu/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri/ ba le ba le/ ta ra ta ra

ta ra/ mu ya mu ya/ mun ca ni/ kha kha re/ d+hu hU~M ni/ d+hu hU~M ni/ bdag 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang rtsod pa dang 'gyed pa thams cad las bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ dza ya~M ku ru ku ru/ phu ru phu ru swA hA/ a ma le swA hA/ a mr-i te swA hA/

'phags pa phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsau ra bi d+h+wan san nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig tu lus 'phags ri las gshegs pa'i tshe/ tshe dang

ldan pa kun dga' bos mi rgod phal po che zhig rgyang ring mo nas mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang skrag ste spu zing zhes byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das mi rgod dag cig go/ bde bar gshegs pa mi rgod dag
cig go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis 'jigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jigs lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa 'jigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

kun dga' bo khyod mi rgod rnams kyis ma 'jigs shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gti mug chen po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tad+ya thA/ a nu lo me/ pra ti lo me/ a nu lo ma/ pra ti lo ma/ a ta~M ke/ pra ta~M ke /

pa~M ke/ a ti pa~M ke/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ tsaN Da li/ ma ta~M gi/ pug ka si/ ri mi ri mi/ rid d+hi ma tse baSh+Ti ti tsau ra pra dan tu/ bis+tha han tu/ b+ha man tu/ mA mi yan du ya bad gra na d+hi na mun tsa mi swA hA/ kun dga' bo ngas dpag tshad bcu tshun chad

kun tu bsrung ba dang / mi rgod thams cad dang / ri gseb kyi grong mi thams cad dang / gseb lam srung ba thams cad dang / gnod par sems pa thams cad kyi rkang pa bcing bar byas so/ /rmugs par byas so/ /rengs par byas so/ /ji ltar rdza

mkhan gyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am/ ji ltar rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor ba ltar mi rgod rnams 'dar bar gyur cig /rengs par gyur cig /mgo rmongs par gyur cig /mdud pa ma grol ba'i bar du 'chi bar ma gyur cig /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //cho ga ni shing kun dang / bong bu'i spu bsres te/ bu mo gtsang mas bkal ba'i srad bu la

lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /yang na gos kyi mtha' ma la mdud pa bor te/ bde bar phyin nas dgrol bar bya'o/ /'di ni grub pa'o/ /'phags pa mi rgod rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor 'bar ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man ta bud d+hA nA~M/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ hU~M hU~M/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta/ phaT phaT/ sarba dur ni mi ta/ duHswapa na shan ti ku ru

swA hA/ sangs rgyas stong gi sngags 'di ni/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes grags te/ /las rnams gang dag stong phrag ni/ /brgyad cu dang ni dgu phrag lnga/ /rnam pa sna tshogs las rnams dang / /bkra shis dpal grags thams cad byed/ /

rmi lam ngan dang mtshan ma ngan/ /lan cig bzlas pas sel bar byed/ /gtsug tor 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a tsa la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa khro bo mi g.yo ba'i

gzungs zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud dang klu la sogs te ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba sku byad skyes bu lang tsho la bab pa lta bu/ mdog dbyar gyi char sprin lta bu/ nam mkha' 'od kyis

'gengs pa bskal pa'i me lta bu/ shin tu 'gying ba dpag bsam gyi shing lta bu/ zhabs brkyang bskum gyad kyi 'gros lta bu/ spyan dmar ba pa la sha'i me tog lta bu/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ zla ba tshes pa lta bu/ ljags 'gyu ba thog gi glog

lta bu/ smin ma khro gnyer bsdus pa shing b+hi sha'i lo ma lta bu/ phyag g.yas na ral gri bsnams pa gza'i mda' lta bu/ g.yon na zhags pa bsnams pa rgya mtsho 'jing gi sbrul lta bu/ dga' bo dang nye dga' sngon pos thod byas pa/ pad ma dang pad ma

chen po ser khras rna cha byas pa/ dung skyong dkar pos do shal byas pa/ rigs ldan ljang khus ga sha byas pa/ mtha' yas dang 'jog po nag pos zhabs gdub byas pa/ tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang klu dang / gnod

sbyin dang / sha za dang 'byung po thams cad ha hi hU~M zhes brjod pas skrag par byed pa/ ha~M ma~M zhes brjod pas brgyal bar byed pa/ nad dang rims dang / gdon dang dgra dang / mtshon dang chom rkun dang / gcan zan dang / 'thab rtsod dang / rmi lam ngan pa

dang / ltas ngan pa rnams zlog pa/ lha dang / klu dang / 'byung po rnams lan cig brjod pas 'joms par byed pa'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na maHsa man ta Ar+ya a tsa la na~M/ tra Ta tra Ta/ a mo g+ha tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hU~M/ tra ma

ya tra ma ya hU~M phaT/ trA thaHha~M ma~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM AHhU~M/ shud d+he shud d+he/ ra~M ho ya~M/ bi shud d+he bi a shu ma~M bi shu ra~M/ sho d+ha ne bi sho d+ha ne/ tsaN Da tsaN Da/ ma ma/ ba la ba la/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba sha tru~M/ sarba bi g+han/

sarba duSh+Ta na hU~M phaT/ oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ de'i cho ga la ha~M ma~M zhes bya ba rdzas gang dang gang la bkod de/ sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags na gang bsgrubs pa 'grub bo/ /lcags sna lnga las byas pa'i ral gris gzhan gyi

g.yul thams cad zlog par byed do/ /gla rtsi dang / btsan dug dang / shing kun dang / bya rog gi mchus gdon gyi rigs tsam thub par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa chus bkang bas bkrus na nad thams cad sos par byed do/ /rin po che'i snod

du gser dang / dngul dang / byi ru dang / mu tig dang / shel stsal te gsol ba btab na nor rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /gla rtsi dang / ma lA dang / sgogs pa dkar pos nad thams cad bsrung bar byed do/ /'dza ti pha la dang / gur gum dang /

li shi dang / sug smel dang / bcu gang dang / ka k+ko la dang / gla rtsi dang / ga p+pur rnams za ma tog gtsang bar sbyar te mig la bskus na 'byung po rnams mthong ngo / /bya rgod kyi sder mo dang stag gi mche ba ser ba g.yo ba'i phyogs su phyar

na slar zlogs so/ /klu'i gzugs spra tshil la byas te bla khab med par mchod na char pa phebs par byed do/ /shi shing gi phur pa la sngags kyi 'phrul 'khor bcas te tshags byas na dgra rkun zlogs par 'gyur ro/ /ye shes kyi 'od zer la dmigs pa bcas na sdig

sgrib thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis snying rje dang ldan par yi dam du byas te klog pa dang / kha ton dang zlos par byed na/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa khro bo mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/

rdzogs s+ho// //paN Di ta d+harma ta shi dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong chos kyi bzang pos bsgyur ba'o// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra dun da nA ma nA ga sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig go/ thams cad

mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yog 'dor na bzhugs te/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po 'jog po la sogs pa klu'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen

po'i phyir te/ bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba bde bar byed pa'i chos ston to/ /de nas grong khyer de na bram ze'i khye'u khyab ma spyan zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ rdzas dang yo byad mang po phun sum

tshogs pa/ rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sngags la 'jug pa/ sngags grub pa zhig 'dug ste/ de yang yang dang yang du klu 'gugs zhing me'i sbyin bsreg byed do/ /bram ze de'i lo tog smin kar char

chad par gyur nas/ des nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang 'thun pas 'di skad ces bdag gis char gyi rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o zhes smras te des me'i sbyin bsreg bya bar bshams nas til dang / 'bras dang yungs dkar

rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang bsregs te sbyin bsreg byed do/ /de nas klu mi srun pa zhig gi gzugs byas te/ des lcags kyi phur bu la sngags nas klu'i spyi bor btab pa dang / klu'i spyi bo gas nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to/ /klu de yang cher 'khrugs te khros

nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rdul 'byung ba'i 'od zer tsha ba rang gi lus las bkye ste gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byas so/ /de yang

lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon med skyabs med/ dpung gnyen med de/ me'i sbyin bsreg byed pa btang nas de bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang skyabs dang / dpung gnyen btsal te 'bros par

bsams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das klu khro bo bdag gi srog ma rungs par

bgyid par 'tshal te skyabs su yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /bram

ze chen po ma 'jigs shig /ngas khyod kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang klu mi bgrungs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi slad na slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na

sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lo tog thams cad kyi don du/ lo tog rnams tshim par mi 'gyur ba dang / kun tu bsrung ba dang / rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par gyur pa lo tog yongs

su skyong zhing klu zlog pa de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rjes klu rab tu 'gro bar byed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs

pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de ngas bshad par bya'o/ /des myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo tog thams cad

myur du bskyang bar 'gyur ro/ /legs par gasrungs par 'gyur/ me'i ri sul chen po so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /me lce 'bar ba'i rim pa'i sprin chen po nam mkha' lding 'dab ma

gdengs pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i sprin gyi rim pas nam mkha' khebs par byed do/ /lo tog dang me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kun tu bsrung ste gnas par 'gyur ro/ /des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun du rab tu 'bar bar

'gyur ro/ /klu mi bgrungs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro/ /'dum par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman

pa'i slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di bka' stsal to/ /na mo b+ha ga bA te/ sarba bud d+ha nAn/ na mo b+ha ga bA te shAkya rA dzA ya/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ gi rI ba b+ha ni/ tib ta be ga ma hA ba

de b+ha ga bA te ma hA tsaN Da hri da ya sa la ni/ hu ru hu ru/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba sas+ya na sha ya/ nA ga ku la bang shan d+ha ra d+ha ra pra sa ra tsaN Da be ga ma hA ba la pa ra kra ma spu ri ta rau dra bag dra/ ma tha ma tha/ pra dz+wa la mA la d+hA ra NI/ tsaN Da be

ga ba ti/ pra pa ra bi man d+hA ra NI/ hU~M hU~M/ ba la ba ti/ be ga ba ti/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra sa ran ti/ sarba sa dri s+yen nA ma dri ba na ya dri/ pu ya pha la phaT/ dra san d+hA ra NI/ a pa sarba na du sarba nA ga to sha sarba ba b+ha ba b+ha ni/ ba ga ta be ga ba

ti swA hA/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ nA ga bi sa ra ni phaT/ dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/ dz+wa lam li ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu thams cad dang / klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa 'di

bshad ma thag tu klu dang klu chen po thams cad klad pa na bar gyur/ lus rul te lus rnags zhing dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig

shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis mi dran du lags kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das rig 'dzin gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la brnyas pa dang / rdeg pa dang 'ching ba dang / skrod pa dang / gnod pa

de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das klu mi bgrungs pa rnams 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ma rung bar bgyid/ ser ba 'bab par bgyid/ sad dang rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid/ ha chang char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang /

dus ma lags par char 'bab par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa sngags smra bas byams pa la gnas par bgyi/ byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/ byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi ste/ byams pas gnod par bgyid pa

thams cad zhi bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bdag cag dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di rab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do/ /gang na snying po'i

gzungs 'dis srung bar bgyis pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang bar bgyis pa dang / srad bu bre ba dang / mtshams dgum pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi sa ris gcad par bgyis pa der bcom ldan 'das

bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi 'tshal lo/ /lo tog dang me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad kun du bsrung bar 'tshal lo/ /yongs su bskyang bar 'tshal lo/ /tha na rkun po dang / g.yo can dang / ri dgas

dang / bya rnams kyang kun du bsrung bar 'tshal te/ slad kyis kyang ma rungs par mi bgyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ klu'i bdag po dag legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis de ltar

gyis shig /khyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs par bsrungs pas bsrung bar gyis shig /de nas de'i 'og tu cho gar bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ /lo tog la gnod par byed na de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas zhing gi dbus sam

khang steng ngam/ gnas mthon por dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ me tog sil mas gcal bkram ste gzhag go/ gzugs 'khyil pa bdun bya'o/ /'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil pa bdun bya ste/ gzugs

re re zhing yang gzungs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o/ /'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang zho dang 'o ma gzhag par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya'o/ /pad ma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen

po gzhag ste ba las byung ba lnga dang / 'o ma dang chus dgang ngo / /yungs dkar dang 'bras yos blugs par bya'o/ /sngags lan drug bcur yongs su bzlas par bya'o/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang / lcags kyi phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor

brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o/ /ba ser skya'i lci ba 'am/ bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu de dag kyang snying kar nub par gzugs so/ /sngags brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su

bzlas par bya'o/ /shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun pa bzhag par bya'o/ /nub phyogs su mgo brgyad pa'o/ /lho phyogs su mgo lnga pa'o/ /byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo dgu pa gzhag par bya'o/ /pog por re

re ste lnga gzhag par bya'o/ /yungs dkar dang bra yos su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o/ /phyogs bzhir gtor ro/ /gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzugs so/ /zhing gi dbus

su yang gzugs so/ /bskyed mos tshal gyi dbus su yang gzugs so/ /de btsugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /

lo tog thams cad dang me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /tha na 'dab ma gcig kyang skams par mi 'gyur na/ yal ga dang sdong bu skam par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ srog chags kyi rigs

ri dgas dang bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /ma rungs par byed kyang mi nus so/ /gnas der rlung dang / sprin dang ser ba dang sad dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/ /klu'i gnod pa byas kyang ma rung

par byed mi nus so/ /ma rung pa zhig tu gyur na de yang slar rtas par 'gyur ro/ /yang stobs dang / rtas pa dang 'ongs yod par 'gyur ro/ /bum pa chen po nang na yod pa de yang zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi phyogs bzhi kun du gtor ba byas

na srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sbrul dang / byi ba dang / ne'u le dang / byi dur dang / dom dang / sbal pa dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / 'dab chags rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /grog sbur thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /tha na phye ma leb la sogs

pa yang nam yang mi 'byung ngo / /drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / sgo nga las skyes pa'i bar gyis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/ /rlan dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma phyung gi bar du nam yang mi

'byung ngo / /phur bu ma phyung gi bar du klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs mi 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bde ba dang lo legs pa dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ro zhim pa dang 'jam par

'gyur ro/ /klu thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /phye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ste/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / shing ljon pa rnams la gtor na srog chags thams cad

lhung zhing med par 'gyur ro/ /srin bu trai ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / sbrul gdug pa dang / rkang brgyad pa dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu ma phyung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /zhing gi phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i

las bya ste/ nas dang / gro dang / til dang / yungs dkar dang / 'bras dang mar bsres te sbyin bsreg byas na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so/ /gzungs 'di dang / cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha'

dag bri bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang / rdo rje 'dzin bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te gnas mthon por gzugs so/ /gtor ma dang / me tog dang / bdug pa yang 'bul lo/ /seng ldeng gi phur bu

sor brgyad pa la lan stong yongs su bzlas pa byas te khang steng du btsugs na rlung dang / sad dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro/ /lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par byed pa'i srog chags rnams med par

'gyur te/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / pi tsi li ka dang / byi ba dang sbrang ma dang / trai ma bu ka dang / trai la ta dang / bi sha ki ta ka dang / nya phyis can dang nya dang lo mi ka dang / sbal pa dang / ne'u le dang / phag dang / kan ti ka dang seng ge dang / rkang mangs dang / rkang gcig

pa dang / rus sbal dang / grog mo dang / sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma dang / thang gi sbrang ma dang / bung ba dang / nag po dang / shang ga ni ka dang / sa'i 'og nas byung ba dang / ma lu shi ka dang / 'ug pa dang / byi ba dang / mchu rings la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad med

par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro/ /bya rog dang / bye'u dang / khug rta dang / phug ron dang / mu du ri ka dang / 'ug pa dang / kha na dza na ka dang / ne'u tsho dang / ri skegs la sogs pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /sngags 'dis

phur bu la yongs su bzlas par byas te phyogs bcing ngo / /na mo bud d+hA ya/ o~M` ki li mi li tsaN De/ me ri li/ tsaN Da tsaN De ban d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha chang yang mi ring ba zhig na 'dug pas gzungs 'di thos

nas de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis srog chags kyi rigs gnod par sems pa/ rab tu gnod par sems pa/ dug 'chang ba

lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang 'dab ma dang / sdong bu dang / rtsa ba ma rungs par bgyid pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o/ /bzlog par bgyi'o/ /bsdigs par bgyi'o/ /phyogs bzhi kun nas dpag tshad du mtshams gcad pa

chen po bgyi'o/ /kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gnod par sems pa/ rab tu gnod par sems pa thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o/ /sngags kyi tshig rjes su gsal bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can

thams cad kyi don dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /drang srong chen po ngas byin gyi brlabs kyis / sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang /

'bras bu dang / 'dum pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig smros shig /de nas drang srong chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /na mo b+ha ga bA te shAkya rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ na mo a ka tA ya/

ma hA rI ShI ya/ tad+ya thA/ k+Sha mi tsu li/ tsa la tsa ra tsa ra/ ho mi li/ ban d+ha ni/ nA sha ni/ da ha da ha/ su mu ri tsa ri/ sarba duSh+Tan b+han d+ha ni/ dun da ban d+ha ni/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ k+Shu k+Shu k+Shu/ ma ni shu ri bi sa ra sa ra/ ha li hu li/ hu ti hu ti/ sa ra ma ni/ sa ran du/ sarba

pA pa pA na ga k+Shu d+ha li swA hA/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'di smras ma thag tu klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gnod par sems pa de dag thams cad khas bub tu 'gyel nas bcom ldan 'das la skad kyi gsang

mthon pos smre sngags 'don te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma rung lags so/ /drang srong gi dmod pa bab par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong gi dmod pa'i mes tshig go/ kun du tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad

'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag slan chad lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do/ /srog chags kyi rigs thams cad bzlog par bgyid do/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig /'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad lo tog dang / me tog dang 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / yal ga bde bar kun tu 'phel

bar gyur pa rjes su srungs shig /de nas drang srong chen po des cho gar bya ba smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kha shar phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ rig pa drang srong chen po'i snying po 'di ril ba 'bring po chus bkang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su

bzlas pa bgyi ste/ drang srong gi mi smra bas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bgyi'o/ /a pa sa ra sa ra/ sha pa ta pa dA ma/ hri da ya kro da/ a ba mu ka ban d+ha ya/ pra na tsa ra/ su mu ru tsa la swA hA/ sngags 'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa bgyi ste/ bzlas pa

tsam gyis klu gnod par sems pa thams cad tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur ro/ /rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags kyi rigs thams cad dmod pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byer ro/ /slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod

pa mi bgyid do/ /srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags kyi rigs thams cad phyis kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /yang lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kyis drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ drang srong chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs par bsrungs bar 'gyur ba dang / lo tog dang / me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad

legs par bsrung bar gyur pa de ltar gyis shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su srung bar bgyid na/ bcom

ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad yongs su srungs shig /lo thog la gnod par byed pa klu'i cho ga rdzogs s+ho// //de nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das

zham ring chen po dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po dang / bkod pa chen po dang / don yod pa'i mthu chen po dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas su gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam

thos kyi bu'i gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byon pa dang / sa phyogs de na 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nags de'i mthongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/ rdzing bu de'i mthus lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi zhing dang kun dga'

ra ba dang / nags dang 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams kun du tshim par gyur to/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / rta dang rta rgod ma dang / ma he dang glang po che dang / bong bu dang / skye bo'i tshogs thams cad

bde bas tshim par gyur to/ /rdzing bu de yang phyogs bzhi kun du rgyar dpag tshad gnyis kyi tshad do/ /rdzing bu de yang me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pun da ri ka sna tshogs kyis kun tu khebs shing / nya sna tshogs dang / chu bran dang /

nya mid dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bung ba gzugs sna tshogs can no/ /de nas de'i 'og tu than pa byung ba de'i tshe nags tshal dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / yal ga thams cad skams te me tog de dag rnyings so/ /nya dang / chu srin

dang / nya mid dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bung ba gzugs sna tshogs pa de dag kyang chu bri ste chu cung zad cig lus pas phyogs bcur rgyug /kun tu rgyug rab tu rgyug ste/ srog 'gags la thug /srog 'chad la thug pas snying 'phar zhing rgyug go /

de nas bcom ldan 'das zham ring ba chen po dang rdzing bu der byon pa dang / de na nya dang / chu srin dang / chu srin byis pa gsod dang / bung ba brgya stong du ma srog 'gags la thug /srog 'chad la thug ste phyogs bcur rgyug cing snying rje rje ltar gzigs

nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rjes dbugs phyung ste se gol gyi sgras klu rnams 'bod cing lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol rdob cing stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra grag par mdzad do/ /sngon las kyi rkyen

'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma chad do/ /klu chen po de dag gis sgra de yang ma thos/ bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes su ma dran no/ /de nas bdud kyi rigs kyi gnod sbyin rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams su sgra bsgrags pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par sreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ste/ 'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las gang tshig par mi 'gyur ba cung zad kyang mi srid do/ /'jig

rten du 'jigs pa chen po byung zhes sgra grag go/ de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas kyi hud kyi hud

'jig rten ma rung par gyur to zhes ngu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang dgongs pa mdzad de bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer byung nas/ 'od zer des klu'i khyim

thams cad snang bar byas nas kyang slar log ste spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye klu dang klu chen po dag ci'i phyir 'od zer

byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung / de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshos bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od zer byung bar mthong ngo / /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bcom ldan 'das

gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od zer rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 'od zer rab tu bkye ste khang pa thams cad snang bar bgyis te/

slar ldog par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye klu'i bdag po dag srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po srog 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad

cig thang cig yud tsam de la rdzing bu char gyi rgyun gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so/ /de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung bar gyur nas sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas bskor te

mdun du bdar ba'i dbus na bzhugs so/ /klu'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag brgyad bcu ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba de stan las langs nas/

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas me tog dang / gdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / na

bza' sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal po bzhis bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom

ldan 'das 'jigs pa chen po mi bzad pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'di ltar than pa byung zhing mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen

ma mchis par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ gang gis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su ltung ba'i 'jig rten kun tu sgrol ba dang / ha cang char che ba dang / char ma mchis

pa dang / dus ma lags pa'i char dang / ser ba dang sad dang / tsha ba ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu ma mchis par bgyid pa dang / bzlog pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rgyal po chen po dag

klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bya ba yod de/ de dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi khyim dang / klu thams cad kyi lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /klu mi bgrungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'phar

bar 'gyur ro/ /klu thams cad kyi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /mig dang mgo rnams gas nas dum bu dum bur chad cing 'brul bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po dag klu gnod par sems pa dang / rab tu gnod par sems pa

rnams kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi phyir zung shig /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po'i sngags kyi tshig skul ma 'debs pa

kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lta stangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs stangs kyis rnam par gzigs nas klu'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

klu'i bdag po dag nga las gzungs kyi tshig gi sngags kyi tshig nyon cig /tad+ya thA/ oM bi pu le/ pra pha re/ nA ge ma hA nA gra hri da ya/ a par te/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba nA ga hri da ya ni/ ki mi ki mi/ nA ga ku la bi d+h+wan sa ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba nA ga duSh+Ta na hri da

ya ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba duSh+Tan nA ga ba ba na ni/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa ya/ sarba duSh+Tan nA ga nan/ a kri ma/ a kri ma/ sa mu drA sA ga ra/ bi ma le/ bi kra ma/ ma hA nA ga ga te/ dza ba re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig

'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de dag thams cad 'dar zhing lus rul te dri mi zhim par gyur to/ /me 'bar ba bzhin du lus la du bar 'thul zhing 'gre ldog go/ thams cad skad cher bcom ldan 'das la ngu zhing thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la

'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin du mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyi snying la g.yo ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma

rung par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad 'thun par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yi dam bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'das yang bdag

cag 'dzam bu'i gling du 'tshe ba mi bgyid do/ /ma rungs par mi bgyid do/ /me tog dang yal ga dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid do/ /dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do/ /bde ba dang yid bde bar bgyid do/ /

lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su bskyang bar bgyid do/ /bden pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do/ /bu gcig pa la bgyi ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rjes su

bskyang bar bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'thun par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di dran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun

'bab par bgyid do/ /dran pa tsam gyis kyang ha cang char che ba zlog par bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las log par mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das yang mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig stsal to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag

thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /tad+ya thA/ oM tsa ta tsa ta/ bi tsa ta/ sha ta sha ta/ pa tsa ra ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gdugs zhags gcig cho ga bgyis la/ bdag

cag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ /bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'pho bar

gyur du yang mchi ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas mnas bsgag pa'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di thog ma nyid du lan bdun du brjod par bgyi'o/ /de'i 'og tu ske tshe'i sa bon brgya rtsa brgyad klu'i sa bon du mtshe 'ur dor ro/ /bcom

ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi khang khyim mtha' dag zhugs 'bar bar gyur/ bdag shi keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas yongs su thar bar gyur gyi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad

kyis myur bar char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do/ /gal te myur du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du mchi'o/ /bu dang tsha bor bcas te 'gum par mchi'o/ /de nas rnam thos kyi bu la

sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig shin du mi bzad pa dag bshad do/ /snying rje ma mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa dag bshad do/ /bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na klu mi bgrungs pa ma rungs pa gtum pa gnod par byed pa dag 'byung ste/ de'i tshe mna' 'dis 'jigs par 'gyur/ skrag par 'gyur/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun ni legs par

'bebs so/ /dus dus su lo tog dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams sgrub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgya cher bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan

'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa/ char mi 'bab pa'i dus na des ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ chu mig gam/ mtshe'u 'am/ mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ khron pa 'am/ klu'i gnas kyi mtshe'u 'am/ 'jim pa dang / lci

bar bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste/ dkyil 'khor dbus zabs khru gang brkos la/ kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o/ /shin tu 'jam pa dang / shin tu phyi bar bya'o/ /spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro/ /de'i dbus su

rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste/ ba ser skya'i lci ba dang / 'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdengs ka can lus dbyibs rgu bar byas te/ thams cad kyi mgo la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu bya'o/ /shar phyogs su klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho

bya'o/ /lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya'o/ /nub phyogs su klu'i rgyal po chu lha bya'o/ /byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu ka ra bya'o/ /de'i g.yog 'khor bdun bdun mgo gsum pa/ mgo gnyis pa/ mgo lnga par bya'o/ /lus dag la spos sna

tshogs kyis byug par bya'o/ /tsan dan dkar dmar dang / su ra bin tsan dan dang / shug pa dang / gur gum rnams phye mar byas te gtor bar bya'o/ /me tog dang me tog phreng ba gdags so/ /gnas de'i dbus su 'bras yos dang / yungs dkar gyis

gtor bar bya'o/ /grwa bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang / mchod rten ring bsrel dang bcas pa dag gzhag go/ dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /

mchod pa lngas mchod do/ /a ga ru dang / tsan dan dang / du ru skas bdug go/ rgya spos dang / na la dang / kun du ru dang / yungs dkar dang / gan d+ha ra sa dang / sra rtsi'i pog dkar po rnams dang sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas

te klu rnams la bdug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du nas phyes pad ma bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi btod la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor mas gzhong pa bkang ba bdun bdun gzhag par bya'o/ /gtor ma dkar po dang / ci 'byor pa'i ro rnam pa

mang po gzhag go/ me tog sil ma gtor bar bya'o/ /bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ pog por bzhi nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug go/ mar me kha brgyad du bud do/ /rig pa 'dzin
