nam mkha' bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan gyi sde rab tu rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha kha me kha kha me/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bI re bI ra/ be ra be ra/ sau me sau me/ shAn+te shAn+te/ dAn+te dAn+te/ badzra d+ha ra ban d+ha

ban d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT/ \u0f00 hU~M Sh+To~M swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra pA Ni ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra pA se na sarba duSh+Ta big+h+na bi nA ya kA na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M drU~M ban d+ha phaT/ rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M sarba satwA~M sh+tsa swA hA/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor

nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam/ mgul du thogs pa byas nas bcang bar bya/ bklag par bya ste/ de

dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ rims kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis mi tshugs/ tshad pas mi tshugs/ me dang chus mi tshugs/ bsgyur ba'i las thams cad kyis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/

dug sbyar mas mi tshugs/ byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad

bcu rtsa bzhir skye ba dang skye bar tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi'i rig sngags kyi lhas kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam par bzhag nas de la rtag par bsrung ba

dang bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed do/ /rdo rje pho nya mo mngag gzhug brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang rtag par yongs su skyong bar byed de de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin nyid dang / srin po nyid dang / 'byung po nyid dang / yi

dgas nyid dang / sha za nyid dang / srul po nyid dang / lus srul po nyid dang / mi dbul por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na/ tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma

byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas byas pa can ma yin pa yang bsnyen gnas byas pa can du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byas pa de yang sdig pa ma lus

par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro/ /bud med gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog

pa chen mo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des kyang bu snyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs dang / rab tu ldan no/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang

dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis mi ngas dang / ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang /

pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo 'di

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te rim gro cher mchod pa chen po byas nas grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ ljongs sam/ grong rdal lam/ dur khrod dam/ ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan

gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog pa chen mo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs pa tsam gyis g.yul zhi bar byas par 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / pha rol gyi

dmag tshogs rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas dang / klu'i rgyal po dung skyong dang / klu'i rgyal po nag po chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / de dag dang gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis

kyang dus dus su char 'bebs so/ /dus dus su glog 'byin to/ /dus dus su 'brug sgrogs so/ /nad dang gnod pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /o~M` hU~MSh+To~M ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba duSh+TA na rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA~M sh+tsa

swA hA/ oM hU~MSh+To~M ban d+ha ban d+ha sarba duSh+Ta na rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya satwA~M sh+tsa badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a na ba lo ki te mUr+d+ha nit+te dzo ra shi/ oM dza la dza la/ khA da khA da/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi da ra

bi da ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ b+hin da b+hin da hU~M hU~M phaT phaT rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba satwA~M sh+tsa swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT swA hA/ hU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha ma ma sa pa ri bA ra s+ya sarba sa twA~Msh+tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya

thA/ oM a na le a na le/ a tsa le a tsa le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bI re bI re/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre sarba duSh+Ta tsit+t+wa na hU~M phaT swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor

gyis shig pa thams cad la lan gsum bzlas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi

'am ci dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor nas byung ba gdugs dkar po can zhes bya ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir

zlog pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre a pa ra dzi ta nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug

tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan cig

phyir 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha'i drang srong dmod pa 'dor ba dang phan 'dogs nus pa rnams la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan drag po dka' thub zlog pa'i bdag po dang lhan cig pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan sred med kyi bu phyag rgya chen po

lngas phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs ldan nag po chen po grong khyer sum brtseg 'jig par byed pa dur khrod na gnas par mos pa ma mo'i tshogs kyis phyag byas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad

ma'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nor bu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /glang po'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhon nu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i gdung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde mtshon cha'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po me tog kun du rgyas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan rgyas pa ud pa la gsung gi tog gi rgyal

po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis 'byung po'i gdon thams cad tshar gcod pa/ gzhan gyi rig sngags

thams cad gcod pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba las zlog pa/ sems can bcings pa thams cad grol ba/ sdang ba dang rmi lam ngan pa dang ltas ngan pa thams cad zlog pa/ gdon brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig par byed pa/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dga' bar byed pa/ gza'

chen po brgyad 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad zlog pa/ ma rungs pa dang / sdang ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ dug dang mtshon dang / me dang chu las sgrol ba ste/ gzhan gyis mi thub drag shul che/ /gtum pa

chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dkar mo chen mo stobs chen mo/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba gos dkar mo/ /'phags ma sgrol ma khro gnyer can/ /rgyal ba'i rdo rje phreng zhes grags/ /pad ma'i mngon mtshan rdo rje'i mtshan/ /gzhan gyis mi

thub phreng ba can/ /rdo rje mkhar rnams 'joms pa mo/ /zhi ba'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa/ /gzugs zhi gzi brjid chen mo can/ /'phags ma sgrol ma stobs chen mo/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud gzhan dang / /rdo rje gzhon nu rigs 'dzin ma/ /lag na rdo rje rigs

gser phreng / /leb rgan rtsi dang rin chen ma/ /snang mdzad rdo rje gtsug tor grags/ /rnam par bsgyings ma'i rdo rje dang / /gser 'od lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba/ /rdo rje sgros dang dkar mo dang / /pad ma'i spyan dang zla 'od dang / /phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyis

bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ oM ri Shi ga Na pra sha sta ya ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M drU~M/ dzam b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sta~M b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ ma hA bid+yA sam b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ par bid+yA sam b+hak+Sha Na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba duSh+TA NA~M

sta~M b+ha na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ sarba yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa gra hA NA~M bid+h+wa~M d+h+wan+sa na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ tsa tu rA shi tI nA~M gra ha sa ha sra nA~M bid+h+wa~M san ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+TA bi sha tI nA~M nak+Sha trA NA~M pra sA da na ka rI hU~M drU~M/ aSh+TA NA~M ma hA gra ha nA~M bi d+h+wa~M san ka rI hU~M drU~M rak+Sha rak+Sha mA~M/

bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo/ phyag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ dbu stong mnga' ba chen mo/ spyan bye ba brgya phrag stong mnga' ba chen mo/ mi phyed 'bar

ba'i mtshan rtags can/ rdo rje yangs pa chen mos sa gsum gyi dkyil 'khor la mnga' mdzad ma/ kun nas bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ oM rgyal pos 'jigs pa dang / chom kun gyis 'jigs pa dang / me yis 'jigs pa dang /

chu yis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / dgra yis 'jigs pa dang / lce 'bab pas 'jigs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'jigs

pa dang / sa g.yo bas 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung bas 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs pa dang / lha yis 'jigs pa dang / klu yis 'jigs pa dang / glog gis 'jigs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis 'jigs pa dang / gcan zan

khro bos 'jigs pa dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin

po'i gdon dang / yi dags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang / skem byed kyi gdon dang / rjed byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi

gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / nam gru'i gdon dang / zas su mngal za ba dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba dang / zas su zhag za ba dang / zas su sha za ba dang / zas su tshil za ba dang / zas su rkang za ba dang / zas su gtsas ba za ba

dang / dang / srog 'phrog pa dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang / zas su lhag ma za ba dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba dang / zas su snabs za ba dang /

zas su ngar snabs za ba dang / zas su rnag za ba dang / zas su gtor ma za ba dang / zas su phreng ba za ba dang / zas su dri za ba dang / zas su gdug pa za ba dang / sems 'phrog pa dang / zas su me tog za ba dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba dang / zas su lo tog

za ba dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba las bdag bde legs su gyur cig /de dag thams cad dang gdon thams cad kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ /kun du rgyus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mkha' 'gro

dang mkha' 'gro mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /phyug bdag chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sred med kyi bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nam mkha'

lding yang dag pa dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /nag po chen po dang ma mo'i tshogs kyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /mi'i thod pa can gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus

gdab bo/ /rgyal bar byed pa dang sbrang rtsir byed pa dang / don kun sgrub pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /sring mo bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /b+h+ri~M gi rI ti dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi

bdag po dang lhan cig pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dge sbyong gcer bus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /dgra bcom pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /'dod chags dang bral

bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phur bus gdab bo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can khyod

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ o~M` a si tAn lArka pra b+hA s+phu Ta bi ka si tA ta pa tre/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khA da khA da/ ha na ha na/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/ b+han da b+hin da/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ hU~M hU~M

phaT phaT swA hA/ he he phaT/ ho ho phaT/ a mo g+he phaT/ a pra ti ha tA phaT/ pa ra pra dA phaT/ taM gi ri ti phaT/ a su ra bi drA ba ka phaT/ sarba de be b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba nA ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a su re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ru De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ga ru De b+h+yaH

phaT/ sarba gaN d+har+b+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kin na re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ma ho ra ge b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba yak+She b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba rAk+Sha se b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pre te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pi shA tse b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba b+hA te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ku~M b+haN De b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba pU ta ne b+h+yaHphaT/

sarba ka Ta pU te ne b+h+yaHphaT/ /sarba skan d+he b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba un mA de b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ts+tsha ye b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba a pa smA re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba o sta ra ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dur lang g+hi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba duSh+p+re k+Shi te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba dz+wa re b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba kri ta karma

NA ka khor do ki ra Na be tA Da tsits+tsha pre Sha ka dus tsar di ta dur b+hu ga te b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba tIR+thI ke b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba ShA ma Ne b+h+yaHphaT/ sarba bid+yA d+hA re b+h+yaHphaT/ dza ya ka ra ma d+hu ka ra/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ko b+h+yo bid+yA tsa re b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa tur b+h+yo b+ha gi ni b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra

kau mA rI ye bid+yA rA dz+nyI ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma hA pra t+ya~M gi re b+h+yaHphaT/ badzra shring kha lA ya pra t+ya~M gi ra rA dzA ya phaT/ ma hA kA lA ya ma tri ga Na na ma skri tA ye b+h+yaHphaT/ biSh+Na bI ye phaT/ brah+ma nI ye phaT/ ag+ni ye phaT/ ma hA kA lI ye phaT/

kau ai na tri ye phaT/ ro dri ye phaT/ ko ma dAM ye phaT/ bA rA ye phaT/ tsa mun dri ye phaT/ ra trI ye phaT/ kA la rA trI ye phaT/ ya ma daN DI ye phaT/ ka pA lI ye phaT/ a d+hi muka ti sma sA na bA si nI ye phaT/ sems can

gang su dag bdag la sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / mdangs 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas

su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su gtsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su skyugs pa za ba rnams dang / zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin

'thung ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba rnams dang / zas su mchil ma 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su rnag za ba

rnams dang / zas su gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / sems 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang /

zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams dang /

srin po'i gdon rnams dang / yi dags kyi gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang / srul po'i gdon rnams dang / lus srul po'i gdon rnams dang / skem byed kyi gdon rnams dang /

smyo byed kyi gdon rnams dang / grib gnon gyi gdon rnams dang / gnon po'i gdon rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon rnams dang / nam gru'i gdon rnams dang / gshin rje'i gdon rnams dang / bya'i gdon rnams dang / ma mo dga' bar byed pa'i gdon

rnams dang / kun du bre ba'i gdon rnams dang / tsher ma 'don pa'i gdon rnams dang / rims nyin gcig pa rnams dang / nyin gnyis pa rnams dang / nyin gsum pa rnams dang / nyin bzhi pa rnams dang / nyin bdun pa rnams dang / rtag pa'i rims

rnams dang / rims mi bzad pa rnams dang / rims ldang dub pa rnams dang / 'byung po'i rims rnams dang / rlung las gyur pa rnams dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa rnams dang / bad kan las gyur pa rnams dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa rnams dang /

rims nad thams cad dang / klad pa na ba bsal du gsol/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi ga 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / snying

na ba dang / ske na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto ba na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / brla na ba dang / rje ngar na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba dang / nying lag na ba bsal du gsol/ gdugs

dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma rdo rje gtsug tor phyir zlog pa chen mo 'dis/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi nang tshun chad du 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rims dang / shu ba dang / g.yan pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / mdze dang /

phol mig dang / bal bldogs dang / me dbal dang / g.ya' ba dang / lhog pa dang / skem pa dang / skrag pa dang / dbyig dug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byad stem dang / me dang / chu dang / mi ngas dang / dgra dang / gnod pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang /

sbrang bu t+ya~M bu ka dang / trai lA tA ka dang / sdig pa dang / sbrul dang / sre mo dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom dang / dred dang / chu srin dang / bung ba lta bus gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa de dag thams cad kyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzi brjid bcing bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan

gyi rig sngags bcing bar bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ bi Sha de bi Sha de/ bai ra bai ra/ badzra d+ha ri ba~M d+ha ba~M d+ha ni badzra pA Ni phaT hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ hU~M drU~M ban d+ha phaT ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ sus de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar

po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma 'di gro ga 'am/ ras sam/ shing shun la bris te/ lus sam mgul du thogs na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dug gis mi tshugs/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ me yis mi tshugs/ chu yis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/

byad kyis mi tshugs/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /gdon thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje'i rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhis kyang de la bsrung

ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed par byed de/ de rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam du yang gnod sbyin dang / yi dags dang / srul po dang / lus srul po nyid du mi 'gyur ro/ /mi dbul

por mi 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir

zlog ma chen mo 'di 'chang na tshangs par mi spyod pa yang tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ro/ /thub par ma byas pa yang thub par byas par 'gyur ro/ /mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur ro/ /bsnyen gnas ma byas pa yang bsnyen gnas byas par 'gyur ro/ /bsnyung

ba ma byas pa yang bsnyung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byas pa yang sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa yang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i

gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub ma chen po 'di 'chang na bu 'dod pa des bu rnyed de/ tshe dang bsod nams dang stobs rnams kyang rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye

bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / gnag nad dang / yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs

dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa phyir zlog pa chen po 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te/ rim gro cher byas te/ mchod pa chen po byas la/ grong khyer thams cad kyi sgo 'am/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ dgon pa'i gnas su gzugs so/ /gzhan

gyis mi thub ma phyir zlog ma chen po 'di rim gro cher byas te/ btsugs ma thag tu g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'go ba dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyur

ro/ /tad+ya thA/ oM Sh+To~M ban d+ha ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ oM hU~M Sh+To~M ban d+ha ban d+ha badzra ma ma rak+Sha rak+Sha badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha an ba lo ki te mUr d+ha ni te dzo rA shi/ oM hU~M dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /da ra da ra/ bi da ra bi da ra/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da/

b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ oM a na le a na le/ kha sa me kha sa me/ bai ra bai ra/ sau me sau me/ sarba bud d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha si tA ta pa tre hU~M phaT/ hU~M ma ma hU~M ni swA hA/

sangs rgyas rnal 'byor du bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang dus dus su char 'babs so/ /'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung ba'i gdugs dkar po can gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// //

rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi uSh+NI Sha la lI tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal lha mo gtsug tor rol pa'i tan tra/ dpal rang byung gi lha mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ro langs nag mo'i gdon dang / sha za nag mo'i gdon dang / smyo byed nag mo'i gdon

dang / sgrib byed nag mo'i gdon dang / phung byed nag mo'i gdon dang / drang srong nag mo'i gdon dang / srin mo nag mo'i gdon dang / rlung lha nag mo'i gdon dang / dbang ldan nag mo'i gdon dang / nam gru nag mo'i gdon dang / grul bum nag mo'i gdon dang / klu mo

nag mo'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin nag mo'i gdon dang / nam gru skyong byed ro langs nag mo'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo phung byed seng ge'i gdong gi gdon dang / nam gru chen mo mkha' 'gro khyung gshog ma'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo lag gcig nyab

pa'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo so gcig mig gcig ma'i gdon dang / nam gru chen mo bong zhon ma'i gdon nyid yin pas sprul pa bcwa brgyad ma nyid do/ /yang sprul gur bdag bcu gsum ni thugs kyi sprul pa chen mo ni gur gcig la dbang byed pa'i

gdon dang / gur gnyis la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur gsum la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bzhi la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur lnga la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur drug la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bdun la dbang byed pa'i gdon

dang / gur brgyad la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur dgu la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bcu la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bcu gcig la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bcu gnyis la dbang byed pa'i gdon dang / gur bcu gsum la dbang byed

pa'i gdon no/ /yang sprul thugs kyi sprul pa yis rims nad la dbang byed pa dang / 'khrug pa la dbang byed pa dang / bdud kyi dmag dpung thams cad la dbang byed pa dang / nad dang rims kyi dbang sgyur ma/ mgo nad la dbang byed pa dang / kha nad la dbang

byed pa dang / khrag nad dang mgul pa'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / snying nad la dbang byed pa dang / lkog nad la dbang byed pa dang / lha gor na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / brla na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / rje ngar na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang /

lhog pa'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / skem pa'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / chu so'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / shu ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / yan lag na ba'i nad la dbang byed pa dang / 'brum bu phra mo la dbang byed pa dang / bal bldags

la dbang byed pa dang / me dbal la dbang byed pa dang / lhog pa la dbang byed pa dang / dbyig dug la dbang byed pa dang / dug nad la dbang byed pa dang / rgyu gzer la dbang byed pa dang / pho log la dbang byed pa dang / gnyan po la dbang byed pa dang / skya rims klad

gzer gyi nad la sogs te/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi dag la dbang byed pa ni e ka dza T-I'i sprul pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /de dag thams cad la ni rig sngags bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi rig sngags kyis gcad do/ /drag po zlog pa'i phur bus gdab

po/ /gnod byed kyi gdon du gyur pa ni ro langs ma srin mo nag mos grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig par byed pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad do/ /phur bus gdab po/ /gnod byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed rnga zhon gyi gdon dang / grong rgyun la sogs pa'i gdon

rnams ni smyo byed gdon du za ba yin pas na shugs sgrol ma'i rig sngags kyis gcad do/ /rig sngags 'chang gi phur bus gdab po/ /oM a kar pra ma ni b+h+yaHphaT/ sha tu ma ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT/ bud med nag mor mngon pa dang / /rnal 'byor

spyan rtul byed pa ni/ /sgrol byed nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ /legs ldan dka' thub kyi rig sngags kyis gcad do/ /shugs sgrol ma dbang phyug gtso mo'i phur bus gdab po/ /sarba pra ma ni b+h+yaHphaT/ ro ti ba~M ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT/ skya rims klad pa na ba

dang / /rkang lag 'khol ba'i nad byung na 'byung po nag po'i gdon yin pas/ dpal chen dbang gi rig sngags kyis gcad do/ /shugs sgrol chen mo'i phur bus gdab po/ /dza lar ye b+h+yaHphaT/ pra ma ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ lci zhing nad byung 'thibs

pa dang / /gnyid bro zhing sems la mi dran pa'i nad byung na bud med nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ rgyal bar byed pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /sbrang rtsir byed pa'i phur bus gdab/ /ru tra ya na byi sha b+h+yaHphaT/ ka pa la ki li ki la ya phaT/ byas

dgur ye nas mi btub cing / /las byas bsam pa mi 'grub pa ni drang srong gzi can gyi gdon yin pas/ thod pa can gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ dge sbyong gcer bu'i phur bus gdab/ tsa ya ma me b+h+yaHphaT/ ro ti pa ma ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ rnal 'byor sems

la yeng yeng po seng seng phya phya byed pa'i nad byung na srin mo nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ phyag na rdo rje'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ dbang ldan mgon po'i phur bus gdab/ rak+Sha ya ni b+h+yaHphaT/ du ni rAk+Sha ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ sems la mi dga' phya phya'o/ /

rlung 'phyo'i thabs su na ba ni rlung lha nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ ma mo bdun gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ sring mo bzhi'i phur bus gdab/ ha sa ya ni ra re b+h+yaHphaT/ du ya ka sa ya ni ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ khro ba dang ni 'tshig pa dang / /smra 'dod dang ni

'tshig 'dre dang / /rkang lag bya btsag mang po'i nad byung na dbang ldan nag po'i gdon yin pas/ dbang ldan gtso bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ rigs kyi khro bo'i phur bus gdab/ /de ba lo yA b+h+yaHphaT/ de ba ki li ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ nam phyed gung la

gnyid med dang / /cho 'phrul chen po 'byung ba dang / /bung bu phag gi gzugs ston pa ni nam gru nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ dpal chen gtso bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ rigs kyi khro bo'i phur bus gdab/ /de ba ki li ki la yA b+h+yaHphaT/ de ba dra ti ki li

ki la ya hU~M drU~M/ rkang lag khol zhing na ba dang / /yi ga bcings nas skyug bro ba'i nad byung na ya ma nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ 'jam dpal gshin rje'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /mi pham mdzes pa'i phur bus gdab/ /ya ma rA dza hriHSh+Ti bi

kri kri na da ma hA hU~M drU~M/ tsa ya ra~M ba ni ki li ki la ya b+h+yaHphaT/ gzhogs skams pa dang rengs pa dang / /zha grum sha lus sngo la 'jam/ /mig mdog gnag cing rkong ba ni/ /shu ba mdze'i cho 'phrul ni klu mo nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ bya khyung

he'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /drang srong rgad po'i phur bus gdab/ /nA ga le ya hU~M drU~M/ tsa ya ka b+h+yaHphaT/ sems la yeng yeng seng seng po ro stod mnan pa snyam byed pa dang / snyang snyong byed pa'i nad byung na/ /kha so 'brul ba snyam byed na gnod

basbyin nag po'i gdon yin pas/ rnam thos sras kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /sprul byed ma'i phur bus gdab/ /ti ti ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ku ku rA dza ye hU~M drU~M/ shu ba 'brum bu na ba dang / /sha lus g.ya' ba'i nad byung na

nam gru skyong byed ro langs nag mo'i gdon yin pas/ gshin rje thogs med kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /'dod pa dmar mo'i phur bus gdab/ /ba ren he ya hU~M drU~M/ ku ma la gur dang b+h+yaHphaT/ khrag tu na zhing lci ba dang / /mig rgyang ring

du mi mthong ba dang / sems la yeng yeng seng seng po'i nad byung na nam gru khyung gshog ma'i gdon yin pas/ dpal chen dbang gi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /khro bo hU~M chen 'bar ba'i phur bus gdab/ /du ya ku la hU~M phaT/

ma ma kha du ye b+h+yaHphaT/ g.yas kyi lag pa zha ba dang / rtsib mar gzer zhing na ba ni lag gcig nyab pa'i gdon yin pas/ dbyings kyi khro bo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /dbang mo dmar mo'i phur bus gdab/ /ma ma ri ha ya hU~M drU~M/

ka pa la ya he b+h+yaHphaT/ myos shing khrag tu bshal ba dang / /mig sngar sna tshogs gzugs 'ong ba ni so gcig mig gcig ma'i gdon yin pas/ legs ldan phyir zlog pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab/ /rAk+Sha se hU~M drU~M/ rAk+Sha

la~M ki la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ ma bdud kyi gdon bcu gnyis la/ /dar dkar gur gyi nang shed na/ /bud med mnga' bdag cho 'phrul ni/ /mi bzang dkar mo byung ba ni/ /gser dang g.yus brgyan dbang mo che/ /ye shes kun du bzang mo'i gdon/ /dus ngan char pa 'khrug

pa dang / /sad dang ser ba'i cho 'phrul te/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi phur bus gdab/ ni d+harma d+hA tu sa ma ya hU~M drU~M/ ku ma la tsa ga ye sa ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ g.yu gur gnyis la dbang byed ma/ /mthing ka chen mo dbang mo che/ /ba

lang dre rta zhon pa dang / /'jig rten yo ga phung bar byed/ /dbang byed chen mo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /khyab pa chen mo'i phur bus gdab/ a ra li b+h+yaHphaT/ ra du hU~M drU~M/ byi ru'i gur gsum dbang byed ma/ /gur nang snying gi mnga' bdag ste/ /gser gur mchod

pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /dka' thub gtso bo'i phur bus gdab/ /tiSh+Ta tiSh+Ta ni b+h+yaHphaT/ ba pA ma hU~M drU~M/ gser gur bzhi la dbang byed ma/ /lha gor ba dang lhog nad kun gyi bdag /'jam dpal ro tan gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /mi pham mdzes

pa'i phur bus gdab/ /ro ro ba~M hU~M drU~M/ ku ku ye b+h+yaHphaT/ mthing nag gi gur lnga la dbang byed ma/ /gzer ma kha ral bud med yin/ /chu so'i nad dang lkog nad dang / /khrag nad dang ni shu ba'i nad/ /ya ma rol pa'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /mi pham rol pa'i phur bus

gdab/ ya go le hU~M drU~M/ phra do phra ye b+h+yaHphaT/ bsam med zhing chen gyi gur drug la dbang byed ma/ /lha mo nyid kyi nad lags te/ /kha nas khrag tu skyug pa dang / /lus la tsha ba skyes pa dang / /yan lag 'khongs par byed pa'o/ /ya ma thugs rje'i rig sngags kyis

gcad/ /ya ma chabs byed kyi phur bus gdab/ /tsa ga ya ba~M b+h+yaHphaT/ gur la de hU~M drU~M/ re lde'i gur bdun pa'i nang shed na/ /khram la 'debs pa'i ma mo ste/ /kha nas khrag nad 'bebs pa dang / /lus la tsha ba'i me chen sbar ba dang / /zangs gri thogs pa'i las

byed de/ /khyung chen 'bar ba'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /dug chen tshar gcod kyi phur bus gdab/ /da he ya ya hU~M drU~M/ me tsa ye b+h+yaHphaT/ glang po che'i gur brgyad pa'i nang shed na/ /bong bu dre'u zhon pa'i bud med de/ /lhog pa glo dang rkong pa nad kyi bdag /

gshin rje thugs kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /'bar ma dbang gi phur bus gdab/ /tsakra ki li ki la ye b+h+yaHphaT/ A ko la~M hU~M drU~M/ bse gur khra bo dgu'i nang shed na/ /rda bran sman gyi gtso mo dgus/ /ser ba sad dang 'gong nad dang / /phung byed khang pa rdib

pa dang / /lbo zhing sna thabs sun pa ni nag po dgu'i nad yin pas/ dbyings kyi gtso mo'i rig sngags kyis gcad/ /'khor ba rab 'joms kyi phur bus gdab/ /ku ma la ya hU~M drU~M/ sha ma ma ye b+h+yaHphaT/ mthing nag gi gur bcu phub pa'i nang shed na/ /gur la

dbang ba bcu gnas pa/ /mdze dang shu ba g.yan pa dang / /dug sbyor ma dang 'khrug byed dang / /gri thabs su gsod par byed pa ni khro bo grags 'dzin gyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ khyab pa ma'i phur bus gdab/ /a ko sha me ra ra hU~M drU~M/ pra du le b+h+yaHphaT/

gsang ba pad ma gur bcu gcig pa'i nang shed na/ /bcu gcig dbang gi gur bdag mo/ /khyab bdal chen mo dbang gi sku/ /'jig rten du char sgo gza' yis 'gegs shing / char pa 'bebs su mi ster ba ni dpal chen dbyings

kyi rig sngags kyis gcad/ /mdzes ma sa 'dzin ma'i phur bus gdab/ /a ko mun b+h+yaHphaT/ tsa ye ma hU~M drU~M/ ga phur shel gyi gur bcu gnyis pa'i nang shed na/ /mu kha le ma cig dbyings kyi yum/ /bcu gnyis bcu bzhi khyod la rdzogs/ /'gro ba

yongs la sman slad du/ /bdud rtsi'i bcud kyi nang na bzhugs/ /phyag na rig pa thugs kyi sdong bu bsnams/ /srid pa thams cad dus gcig gsal/ /gsal 'bar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /bdud bzhi shin ting ku ru swA hA/ ri tshe 'gong

g.yag shan ting ku ru swA hA/ pho bdud bcu gnyis shan ting ku ru swA hA/ mo bdud bcu gsum shan ting ku ru swA hA/ skos rje drang dkar shan ting ku ru swA hA/ gnam the dkar po shan ting ku ru swA hA/ bar the khra bo shan ting ku ru swA hA/ sa the

nag po shan ting ku ru swA hA/ byang shar mtshams kyi gdon btsan 'gong dmar po shan ting ku ru swA hA/ yams dang nad kyi bdag mo shan ting ku ru swA hA/ sman dang yul sa shan ting ku ru swA hA/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i gtsug tor phan yon rtsa ba dang bcas

pa gdon zlog pa'i mdo'i gzungs 'di ni lan gsum du dag par klags te/ las dka' ba la dmod btsugs na ji ltar bsams pa ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /bse phor gyi nang du gtor ma lnga byas la/ cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas na/ ji ltar 'dod

pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo gtsug tor gyis gdon zlog pa 'di ni mtshan mar bzung ste/ yang dang yang du bton zhing cho ga gzhung bzhin du byas te/ gtor ma chu chen po 'am/ ri mthon po la bskyal na/ 'khrug pa chen po

byed na g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /drag po'i las byed na dgra bo'i snying la gtad de gur bcu gnyis kyi bdag mo la gtad na dgra phung zhing rlag par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo gtsug tor rol pa'i tan tra/ rdzogs so// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mA rI ts+ye+e nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das

mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de

nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lha mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i mdun dang mdun nas 'gro ste/ de bltar med/ bzung du med/ bcing du med/ dgag tu med/ brgal du med/ rmongs par

byar med/ chad pas gcad du med/ mgo breg du med/ gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro'o/ /dge slong dag gang gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can de'i ming shes pa de yang bltar med/ gzung du med/ bcing du med/ dgag tu med/

brgal du med/ rmongs par byar med/ chad pas gcad du med/ mgo breg tu med/ gzhur med/ tshig par byar med/ de dgra'i dbang du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bdag gis kyang lha mo 'od zer can gyi ming shes kyis bdag kyang bltar med par

gyur cig /gzung du med par gyur cig /bcing du med par gyur cig /dgag tu med par gyur cig /brgal du med par gyur cig /rmongs par byar med par gyur cig /chad pas gcad du med par gyur cig /mgo breg tu med par gyur cig /

gzhur med par gyur cig /tshig par byar med par gyur cig /dgra'i dbang du mi 'gro bar gyur cig /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di rnams yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M` pa tA kra ma si/ pa rA kra ma si/ u da ya ma si/ nai ra ma si/ arka ma si/

marka ma si/ Ur ma ma si/ ba nA ma si/ gul ma si/ tsi ba ra ma si/ ma hA tsI ba ra ma si/ an ta ra d+hA na ma si swA hA/ oM lha mo 'od zer can bdag lam du skyobs shig /bdag lam log pa las skyobs shig /bdag skye bo'i 'jigs pa
las skyobs shig /bdag rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag glang po che'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag klu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /
bdag seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag stag gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag me'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag chu'i 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /

bdag dug gi 'jigs pa las skyobs shig /bdag phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad las skyobs shig /'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nyams pa dang / ma nyams pa thams cad du yang bdag seng ge las srungs shig /bdag stag las

srungs shig /bdag klu las srungs shig /bdag sbrul las srungs shig swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrugs pa thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a lo

ta lo/ ka lo/ sats+tsha lo sa ma pa mur d+ha Di rak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M/ bdag dang sems can thams cad la 'tshe ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / nad thams cad las srungs shig swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo 'od zer can gyi snying po brjod par bya

ste/ tad+ya thA/ oM bdA li/ ba tA li/ ba rA li/ ba ra ha mu khi/ sarba duSh+Tan/ pra duSh+Ta na~M/ tsak+Shur mu kha~M ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ban d+ha mu khaM/ dza~M b+hA ya/ sta~M b+hA ya/ mo hA ya swA hA/ oM mA rI ts+yai swA hA/ oM ba rA le/ ba dA le/ bta tA lI/ bA rA hA mu khu/

sarba duSh+TAn pra duSh+Ta nA~M/ tsak+Shu mu kha~M ban d+ha ban d+ha swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma

yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa 'od zer can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //paN Di ta a mo g+ha badzra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong

ba ri rin chen grags pas bsgyur ba'o// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsun de de bi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing bstod pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du dge bar mdzod cig /na maH sab tA nA~M/ sam myag sam bud d+ha ko Ti nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le/ tsun de swA hA/ brtson

'grus chen mo thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mo chen mo/ khro mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha'

yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje

sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma/ rdo rje'i khu tshur ma/ rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stangs stabs can ma/ drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du sgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku

rdo rje dang bai dUr+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan ma/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de/ / /d+h+ru~M d+h+ru~M/ krU~M krU~M/ mrU~M mrU~M/ srU~M srU~M/ rU rU/ a be+e sha ya/ grIh+na grIh+na/ grIh+na pa ya/ grIh+na pa ya/ ha ra ha ra/ b+han dza b+han dza/ sa ra sa ra/ ma rA ma rA/ ma rA ya ma rA ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/

grIh+na grIh+na/ sdang ba'i gdon dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / yi dags dang / sha za

dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba dang / gdug pa de dag thams cad sa d+ha ya sa d+ha

ya/ marda ya marda ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa ya/ ud sA d+ha ya ud sA d+ha ya/ ha na ha na badzra Na/ sa ra sa ra da Ne Da na/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ khag ge na/ hU~M hU~M hUM/ tsU~M tsU~M tsU~M/ drU~M drU~M drU~M/ o~M` tsa le tsu le tsun de sarba ar+tha sA d+hA ya swA hA/ bcom ldan

'das 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma'i mthu dang byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gnod pa thams cad las dge bar gyur cig swA hA/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya

dza~M gu lA nA ma bid+ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu

rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ gangs kyi ri yi byang ngos na/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i

ri bo la/ /ri rgyal de yi sul gnas tshe/ /gzhon nu bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/ /e ne ya yi lpags gyon la/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags can/ /gdug pa'i sbrul gyis mgo brgyan byas/ /mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/ /dug gi me tog

rnams za zhing / /ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung / /nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug /bu khyod tshur shog nga las nyon/ /nga la dug sel ces bya ba/ /dug 'jigs rig sngags dam pa yod/ /dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/ /nga yi ming gis 'jigs par

'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ oM i li mid te/ ti li mid te/ i li ti li mid te/ dum be/ dum bA lI ye/ dusme/ dusmA li ye/ ta ra ke/ ta ka ra ne/ marme/ marma ra Ne/ kash+mI ri/ kash+mI ra mug te/ a g+he a g+ha Ne/ a g+ha na g+ha ne/ i lI i lI e/ ag khA I e/ A byA/

i e/ shwe te shwa ta duN De/ a nu rag te swA hA/ dge slong dag nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/ sus rig sngags 'di lan cig thos pa de la lo bdun gyi bar du sbrul gyis mi za'o/ /de'i lus la dug gis mi

tshugs so/ /sbrul gang zhig de la 'dzin na de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag sbrul gyi mdun du brjod par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbrul de 'chi ba'i phyir ro/ /tad+ya thA/ i la

la/ tsi la lA/ tsakra brag ko/ ko DA/ ko DA+e ti/ ku ra ta/ ku ru De ti/ po DA ti/ pu ru dA/ pu ru de ti/ mo De ti/ ni ku ru De/ ni ku ru De/ ni ma mu ru ta/ ni ma mu ru De ti/ pu ru de/ phud ta ra he/ phud Tad Tan Da ra he/ nA ga ra he/ nA gad Tad taN+Da Da ra he/

sarba ra he/ sarba da tad tan da ad tshi/ ad tshi/ pu ru Da ta/ tsa la bi She/ shI te/ shrI tA/ ban d+ha le/ mA tA le/ ha le ha le/ ha la ha la/ ha la le/ i la le/ ki pa tsa le/ mi la le/ tan Di tan Di/ ta Ta ta Ta/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/ phaT

phaT/ ra ha ra bi sha swA hA/ dge slong dag de ltar na dug sel gyis 'byung po 'dus pa thams cad la rig sngags gang brjod cing bsnyad pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin no/ /yang dag pa'o/ /bden pa'o/ /ma nor ba'o/ /phyin ci ma log pa'o/ /

dug 'di mi gdug par gyur cing / sbyin par byed pa'i gan du song shig /'dzin pa'i gan du song shig /me'i nang du song shig /chu'i nang du song shig /thang la song shig /kha ba'i nang du song shig /brtsig pa'i nang du song shig /nam

mkha' la song shig /sa'i nang du song shig /zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags
pa dug sel ces bya ba'i rig sngags/ /rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya hi ra Na ba tI nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/

sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan na la ba dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma

thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs

par gnas la bka' stsal pa/ legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin par 'dod pa des/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

mthong ngo / /thos so/ /myong ngo / /gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / myong ba des/ gzungs thob bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdag

gis bsod nams byas so zhes mi 'dzin/ bdag gis bsod nams ma yin pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas so zhes mi 'dzin to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzungs 'dzin

par mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs thob pa ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la dngos por ram/ mtshan nyid du mi rtog /yongs su mi rtog ste/ rkyen du ma yin/

rkyen med par ma yin/ 'gro bar ma yin/ 'gro ba med par ma yin/ 'chi 'phor ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/ stong par ma yin/ mi stong par ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma med par ma yin/ smon par ma yin/ smon pa med par ma

yin/ skye bar ma yin/ 'gag par ma yin no/ /legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mtha' 'dis spyod pa de ni ye shes la gnas pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe ye shes la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /gang gi tshe mya ngan las

'das par gyur pa de'i tshe dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs len cing / kun chub par byed la 'dzin te/ don tam tshig 'bru yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /yongs su ma brtags pa'i tshul khrims can yang yin te/ bden pa'i tshul khrims dang /

rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims can no/ /ma brtags pa'i chos can yin te/ bden pa'i chos can dang / rnam par dag pa'i chos can no/ /gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi chos la zhugs so/ /sangs rgyas la lhag par bya ba byas pa'o/ /rigs

pa'i cho ga la zhugs pa'o/ /legs par gnas de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags so/ /mi 'chang ngo / /mi 'grol lo/ /legs par gnas gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi chags/ mi 'chang / mi

'grol ba de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams kyis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'thob bo/ /tad+ya thA/

ku Ti ku Ti/ ku tsA la/ e lA i mi ri to/ ko tha lA/ e re ri/ e mi ri Ni/ legs par gnas 'di dag ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan no/ /legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum mo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i don la mi gnas

ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i don la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /legs par gnas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa la mchod pa dang

bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bsgrags pa dang / khong du chud par byas pa yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no/ /legs par gnas dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa dag

'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mnyes par byas/ bsnyen bkur byas/ mchod pa byas so/ /bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do/ /snyam du shes par bya'o/ /su zhig bsam pa gang gis dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs 'di 'dzin pa de la de nye bar gnas par 'gyur

te/ shes rab 'dod pa la shes rab dang / gzungs 'dod pa la gzungs dang / dbyig 'dod pa la dbyig dang / thos pa 'dod pa la thos pa nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi ngo la nyi ma shar kar 'bras sA lu'i chan dang 'o mar

sbags te bza'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags 'di dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rig sngags kyi ming gzhan dag rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /'on tang gsang sngags gzhi dag gi mthus gang dag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

dag na 'khod pa'i lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ yi dags sam/ grul bum mam/ sha za 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa de dag de la sems dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /bar chad byed par mi 'gyur/ rtag

tu yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bzang dang / yangs pa chen po dang / lag na rdo rje dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / ri dben pa la gnas pa dang / gangs ri la gnas pas kyang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /

'og min gyi bar gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis kyang 'di lta ste/ dbyig dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi mthus 'jigs pa 'am/ dgon par de la byin gyis rlob par 'gyur/ de la mi 'jigs pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan na zla ba

dkar po lta bu'i rdo leb la bzhugs shing / de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs par gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /'phags pa dbyig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ya sho ba ti d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ dz+wa re ma hA dz+wa re/ du khe mu ge su sa~M pan ne/ ma hA sa~M pan ne/ sa~M pad ti/ ma hA sa~M pad ti/ ka se ma hA ka se/ kad tsha dz+wa ra mug te si swA hA/ skud pa 'am chu la lan gsum sngags na rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo

ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ rak+Sha rak+Sha man/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA swA hA/ gdon thams cad la tshon sna lnga'i skud pa 'am/ skud pa dmar po la lan gsum du sngags te mdud pa gsum bor la bcings na bar du

gcod pa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rata na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi li/ ni ki le swA hA/ 'bru mar la lan gsum sngags te bskus na skran 'tsho'o/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma

Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re bi sa re/ sa ra na sha ni swA hA/ shi ba'i rna bar lan gsum bzlas na sos par 'gyur ro/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA

ya/ tad+ya thA/ ni si re ni si re/ ka la ni mi re/ ka la ri tsi ri/ bi tsi le swA hA/ lba ba dang / lkog ma'i lha gor dang / lce kyi ba na ba dang / gdon nad thams cad la 'jim pa la lan gsum du sngags te bskus na phan no/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki

te shwA rA ya/ badzra pa Ni d+h+ya ma/ oM oM krA ra pra b+ha be/ b+ha ga ba ti bud d+he/ pra ti bud d+he/ shud d+he shan ti ki ri/ ha na ha na/ ma ma pA pa ma/ da ha da ha/ ma ma pA pa da~M/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma ma pA pa kan/ oM o De/ gra sa gra sa/ ri te De ri te De/ shan ti ka rI/

ya swA hA/ shu b+ha ka rI ya swA hA/ k+She ma ka rI ya swA hA/ rims nad kyis btab pa la byab pa byas na rims nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /sman la sngags kyis btab ste blud na nad pa sos par 'gyur ro/ /zas la sngags kyis btab ste zos na dug mi

gnod par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te bcings na thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa grags ldan ma'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// // @#/ /bklags pas grub pa bcom

ldan 'das ma 'phags ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de ltar tshes la dge slong rnams ri dri rgyal na gnas te/ de'i tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kyang de na bzhugs te/ des bdag la smras

pa/ bu sngags kyi tshig 'di nyon cig /klu'i dbang po rnams kyi dug med par byed/ sbrul gyi dug med par byed g.yog rnams dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za rnams dang / sems can stobs po che rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang / sems can phra

mo rnams dang / phra men pha dang / phra men ma dang / chu srin dang / stag dang / grul bum dang / rwa can dang / mche ba can gyis de ltar sngags kyi tshig drag shul chen po oM gu li yang dag par thos na sngags kyi gtso bo sems can gdug pa rab tu 'jil bar byed pa ste/

sngags can gang gis de shes na lha rnams kyi gdug pa yang dag par med par byed do/ /o~M` na mo b+ha ga ba ti Ar+ya a~M gu li/ tad+ya thA/ /klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ sbrul lam/ sbrul mo 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ 'byung po 'am/ 'byung mo 'am/ phra

men pha 'am/ 'phra men ma 'am/ gdug pas zin pa 'am/ gdug pas ma zin pa yang rung ste/ pha pha pha/ ha re ha re ha re/ re dza re/ be sha be/ nA ga re/ sa rwa re re/ ha ra ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ma Ta

ma Ta/ mo ta ya mo ta ya mo ta ya/ shi g+h+ra shi g+h+ra/ la g+hu la g+hu/ a na ya a na ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ b+han d+ha b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ gurna gurna/ gurna ya gurna ya/ dpag tshad stong brgyad bcu na gnas pa'i klu rnams kyi gdug pa med par mdzod cig /klu thams cad

chings shig sod cig thar bar mdzod cig /oM hu lu hu lu/ ha la ha la/ ha la bi sha~M/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa'i rgyal mo a~M gu lis bka' stsal pa/ tag ke Tag ke/ tag ke ni/ Tag ke ni/ sha ra shi ra/ tsan dra ke sha re hi le/ bgegs thams cad sel bar

mdzad pa can/ las stong can/ bcom ldan 'das ma grub pa a~M gu li ta thA bi ga ta/ klu mo'i tshogs sum bcus mchod pa/ dza ya dza ya sid d+hai/ rgyal bar mdzad pa/ mi mgo'i thod kyi phreng ba can/ hU~M k+Sha/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam nyin par gyi bar du

dug sel ba/ a su ra de'i ta dang / ngan pa'i stobs 'joms par byed pa can/ bgegs 'joms par mdzad pa can/ lha'i yum khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod swA hA/ sngags kyi tshig drag shul can sbrul gyi mdun du bklag par mi bya ste/ 'chi ba

dang / klad pa 'gas shing tshal pa brgyar 'gyur ro/ /sngags kyi tshig drag shul can chen mo sbrul gyis thos na thams cad tshig par byed do/ /oM ki li ki la/ ma hA ki li/ ka la ru pi ni/ bgegs thams cad zlog shig /pha pham pha rol pham par

mdzod cig swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa a~M gu li'i snying po dang bcas pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M` d+hu ne d+hu ne/ d+hu ni d+hu ni/ sat+ya/ tad Ta ha si ni d+hu d+hu ni/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ rdo rje'i gzungs mang pos bka' stsal pa/ 'jog po'i dug 'dor du 'jug la/ dza ya dza

ya/ mu dza mu dza/ mun dza mun dza/ thong shig /glog dang rlung zhes bya ba mgyogs pa'i shugs can/ ro langs chen mo bcom ldan 'das ma shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'byung ba'o/ /mu ya mun tsa mun tsa swA hA/ bklags pas 'grub pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags

ma sor mo can zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo/ rdzogs so// // 'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bA ma ne twA~M na maSh+yA mI twA~M na ma s+yA mi bA ma

ne/ b+ha ga ba ti pi shA tsi/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ pi shA tsi pA sha par shu d+hA ri NI/ ya Ni ka ni tsid b+ha yA n+yud pa d+yad te yaH kA tsid mA ra yo/ yaHkA ma hA ma ra yo/ AHkA tsid ti yo/ ye ke tsid ud pa dra bAHye ke tsid u pA yA sA/ ye ke tsid

a d+h+ya ad mi kA b+ha yA/ ye ke tsid u pA yar+g+ga u pA sar+g+ga sa~M bad d+ha/ bA uta pa d+yad te/ sarba ni tA ni/ sarba sta/ sarba te bA la ta e bod pa d+yan te/ na ba Na Di ta taH/ ta da ne na sa t+ye na sat+ya bA tsa ne na sat+ya bAg ke naH/ tad+ya thA/ o~M` dzaHdzAHdzaHdzAH/ e b+hi shaH

paN Di ta a d+hiSh+Thi tai ra man tra pa dai ra/ ma ma sarba sa twA nAn tsa/ rak+Sha~M ku ru pa ri tra Na~M ku ru/ pa ri gra ha~M ku ru/ pA ri pA la na~M ku ru/ shan ti ku ru swas+t+ya ya na~M ku ru/ daN Da pa ri hA ra~M ku ru/ sA s+t+ra pa ri hA ra~M ku ru/ yA bad bi Sha d+hu Sha Na~M ku ru/ ag ni pa ri hA

ra~M ku ru/ u da ka pa ri hA ra~M ku ru/ kA khor da ts+tshe da na~M ku ru/ sI mA~M ban d+ha~M ku ru/ d+ha ra Ni ban d+han ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mi te a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a me ta sa~M b+ha beH a swa ste/ a swa stA~M ge/ mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra/ sha ma pra sha ma u

pa sa ma sarba bya d+hI/ nu pa sa ma sarba a kA la mri t+ya/ nu pa sa ma sarba na k+Sha tra gra ha do/ ShA nu pa sa ma/ sarba da~MSh+Ti NA~M/ tso pa sa ma/ b+ha ga ba ti/ par+N+Na sha ba ri/ t+yu~Mn t+yu~Mn/ bi t+yu~M na bi t+yu~M na/ tu Na tu Na/ tu mu le swA hA/ oM gau ri gan d+ha ri tsaN DA li/ ma ta~M gi pus puk+kA

si swA hA/ na maHsarba sha pa rA NA~M/ ma hA sha pa rA NA~M/ b+ha ga ba ti pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha pa ri hrIHhaHhUM phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/ oM a~M ku re ma~M ku re/ ku ra re par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ gnag nad la srad bu byas te/ brgya rtsa

brgyad du bzlas shing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad du mdud de/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la/ de'i rjes la nad pa 'am/ rta dang ba lang la sogs pa la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus te

de'i mgo la bcings na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du ma he dang ra lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la yang lhas su bri bar bya'o/ /bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste/ brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas bkrus na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /snga dro phyugs kyi lhas

su song la dri dang me tog gi gtor ma byas te/ bum pa sar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags te/ phyugs lhas kyi sgor rta babs gzugs shing / rta babs de la chu shing gi lo ma la rig pa 'gi'u wang gis bris te/ rta babs kyi khar

gdags so/ /de nas phyugs thams cad gzas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo nas gzung ngo / /gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags nas mi bzhis chus gtor na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na nad

thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi nad dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/ /stag gis 'jigs pa la dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o/ /chu srin gyis 'jigs pa la mda' dang pha gu la

sngags na sbrul dang / byi ba dang / sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul ngor thal ba la sngags te/ spyi bo dang mgul du byugs na mtshon cha zlog par byed do/ /skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nad pa'i khri la bcing

ngo / /bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du sngags pas khrus bya'o/ /lag pas skud pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo / /de nas bde bar 'gyur ro/ /yul skor te dril bu dang / rnga dang / dung la bzlas pa byas na bgegs thams cad 'byer te gnod pa 'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /

skyes bu dpa' bo yi dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs gzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra 'am g.yul zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa par+N+Na sha ba ri'i mdo/ rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya par+N+Na sha ba ri d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/

'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon pa'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi'u thung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das ma sha za ba/ mi'u thung ma sha za ma/ ri khrod lo ma gyon ma sha za

khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na zhags pa dang dgra sta thogs ma/ 'jigs pa gang dag ci byung ba de dag thams cad dang / yams kyi nad gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'chi byed chen po gang dag ci yang rung ba

dang / gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ci yang rung ba dang / khong du gnod pa gang dag ci yang rung ba thams cad dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / 'go ba dang 'brel ba gang dag ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad byis pa kho na las 'byung gi mkhas pa la ni ma

yin te bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des song shig song shig dang mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bsrung bar gyis shig bsrung bar gyis shig /yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang

bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ oM a mri te/ A shwa ste/ A shwa stAng ge/ mA ma ra ma ra/ pra sha ma/ u pa sha ma/ dun nu pi

dun nu/ du le du ma le swA hA/ na ma sarba sha pa rA NA~M na mo ma hA sha pa rA NA~M/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri/ pi sha tse swA hA/ oM par+N+Na sha ba ri hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM a~M ku re/ ma~M ku re/ par+N+Na sha ba ri ye swA hA/ oM pi sha tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri/ sarba ma ri pra sha ma ni/ sarba duSh+Ta nan/ ban d+ha

mu khe/ sarba mu khe hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA sarba d+harma ti ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang /

byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi

ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i gzungs nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs te/ nga yang da ltar 'chad pa zung shig /tad+ya thA/ a brte a brte/ bi brte bi brte/ ba ga ma shud d+he/ pra b+ha swa re ta na re/ ug kha me/ mug kha le/

sarba d+harma pa shi ba te ne+e swA hA/ de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gzungs 'di'i snying po brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ad tshe/ a ne yi/ e lu le/ e lu phe/ mUr+d+ha

a nu ga te sarba d+harma a d+hi pa ti ya/ pra bra te dz+yo sna ka ra a d+hi ga ta dz+nyA ne bi shud d+he pa ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das

kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /chos thams cad kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i

gzungs/ 'phags ma bcom ldan 'das ma gza' rnams kyi yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma

yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / gza' lhag dang / phur bu dang / pa ba sangs dang / spen pa dang / sgra gcan dang / mjug rings dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs

pa du mas bstod cing / rdo rje chen po dam tshig gi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gzhu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun du gzigs dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun

brgya phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar ba la chos ston te/ bkod pa chen po'i rgyan yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/

yongs su byang ba'i chos ston par mdzad do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de rnams la bltas nas langs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan stong phrag du mar bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal

nas spyan sngar 'dug ste/ snyems pa dang bcas pas dkyil mo dkrung legs par bcas pas 'khor de rnams la bltas te/ rdo rje thal mo rang gi snying gar sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gza' rnams ni

gtum zhing gtum pa'i gzugs can drag cing drag pa'i gzugs can khro zhing khro ba'i sems kyis sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod par bgyid la mdangs 'phrog par bgyid de/ kha cig ni nor rdzas 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig ni srog

'phrog par bgyid/ sems can tshe ring po kha cig ni tshe thung bar bgyid/ de ltar sems can rnams la gnod pas 'tshe bar bgyid pas na/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i don du snying rje bskyed nas gsang ba chen po shin du gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so/ /de dag ngas bshad kyis nyon

la legs par rab tu zung la yid la gyis shig /gza' rnams gtum pa'i gzugs la shin du khro zhing 'jigs pa rnams la mchod pa bzang po mchod yon dang bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba las ches gsang ba ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de dag mchod pas mchod

'gyur zhing / /gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/ /gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang / /ji ltar dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / /lha rnams dang ni lha min dang / /mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang / /srul po dang ni mi rnams dang / /drag po gzi

brjid chen po dag /khros pa zhi bar byed pa yi/ /gsang sngags dang ni mchod pa dag /rim pa bzhin du bshad par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'bar ba phyung nas gza'

rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs par gyur to/ /de nas de nyid kyi skad cig nyid la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' rnams langs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas kyis bdag cag rnams la sman yon btags par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag rnams tshogs nas yo byad du gyur par byed pa'i chos smra ba rnams la bsrung ba dang /

yongs su bskyab pa dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / rim gro dang chad pa bzlog pa dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bar 'gyur ba rnams bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi mchod pa dang gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi dbye bas phyogs rnams su dri'i dkyil 'khor byas la pad ma sor bcu

gnyis kyi tshad du byas pa'i 'dab ma bris te/ lte ba yang sor bcu gnyis pa la sgo bzhis mdzes pa rim pa bzhin du byas pa la pad ma rgyas pa'i steng du lha nyi ma bsam par bya ba ni lus gzi brjid kyi phung po li khri nye bar 'bar ba lta bu nyi ma stong dang

mtshungs pa'i 'od zer can no/ /o~M` mai g+hol ga ya swA hA/ shar du zla ba dkar po/ o~M` shi ta~M sha be+e swA hA/ me'i mtshams su mig dmar dmar po/ oM rag ku ma ra ya swA hA/ gshin rje'i phyogs su rgyal rigs gza' lhag mdog ser po/

oM bu da ya swA hA/ bden bral du phur bu dmar ser/ oM b+h+ri ha spa ti ye swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs su spa ba sangs dkar po/ oM a su rod ta ma ya swA hA/ rlung du spen pa mig sman ltar shin du gnag pa/ o~M` kriSh+Na war+N+Na ye swA hA/ lus ngan po'i phyogs su sgra gcan

dmar nag /o~M` a mri ta pri yA ya swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dud sprin gyi mdog lta bu'i mjug rings/ o~M` dz+h+yo ti ke ta be+e swA hA/ shar gyi sgor rje btsun sangs rgyas/ lho sgor phyag na rdo rje/ nub sgor 'jig rten mgon po/ byang gi sgor 'jam dpal

lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi byang shar du gza' thams cad do/ /shar lho'i mtshams su khyim rnams dang rgyu skar rnams so/ /lho nub du gnod pa thams cad do/ /nub byang du rje btsun rig pa chen mo'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i phyi rol gyi shar du yul

'khor srung / lhor 'phags skyes po/ nub tu mig mi bzang / byang du lus ngan po'o/ /nyi ma'i 'o thug dang / zla ba'i zho zan dang / mig dmar gyi sran ma/ ma sha'i bza' ba dang / lhag pa'i mar gyi 'khu ba dang / phur bu'i 'o ma dang / pa ba sangs kyi khur

ba dang / spen pa'i sran ma/ ma sha dang / mud kha bsres pa dang / sgra gcan gyi til gyi thug pa dang / mjug rings kyi til gyi thug pa dang / bu ram gyi tshod ma'o/ /gnod sbyin gyi gtor ma ni yul 'khor srung gi zho zan no/ /'phags skyes po'i zho dang sran ma/

ma sha'i gza' ba'o/ /mig mi bzang gi'o thug gi gza' ba'o/ /lus ngan po'i zho dang sran ma/ ma sha'i bza' ba dang bu ram chang dang sbyar ba'o/ /ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi me tog dbul lo/ /ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi bdug spos dbul lo/ /ji

lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog gi ba dan dbul lo/ /so so la mar me dbul lo/ /ji lta ba'i rim pa'i mchod pa bya'o/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis dung phor bkang ste rin chen sna lnga bcug la mchod yon dbul zhing gdong la yang dar bcing bar bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje gza' 'di rnams

kyi snying po'i sngags bklags pas 'grub pa rnams yin te/ ji lta ba'i rim pa'i kha dog dang 'thun pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/ /kham pa 'am zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser ram dngul gyi snod du mchod

yon phul nas/ re re la yang bzlas brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje de nas yang de'i 'og tu/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig rnams lan bdun brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gza' nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza'

thams cad kyis srung bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbul ba'i gdon las grol bar byed do/ /tshe zad pa rnams tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje yang gang zhig dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams sam/ sems can gzhan

sems can gyi skye bar gtogs pa gang dag gi rna lam du thos na de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje yang gang zhig gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod cing / nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos

smra bar byed pa de la gza' rnams thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de'i rigs rgyud kyi dbul ba yang nyams par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas

gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs bka' stsal pa/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ na mo badzra d+ha rA ya/ na mo pad ma d+ha rA ya/ na mo ku mA rA ya/ na mo gra hA na~M/ sarba shwa pa ri pU ra kA na~M/ na mo nak+Sha tra na~M/ na mo dwi da sha rA shaM na~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM bud d+he bud d+he/ badzre badzre/

pad me pad me/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sma ra sma ra/ krI DA ya krI DA ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ mar+d+ha ya mar+d+ha ya/ g+ha Ta ya g+ha Ta ya/ sarba big na~M/ ku ru ku ru/ ma mA kar+yA~M/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ sarba duSh+Ta~M/ k+ShA pa ya k+ShA pa ya/ shAn te shAn te/ dAn te dAn te/

dA ma ya dA ma ya swA hA/ dru dan dar sha ya/ ad ma na~M/ rak+Sha rak+Sha ma~M/ sarba satwAM Sh+tsa/ sarba gra hA na k+Sha tra/ bi d+h+wa~M sa ni brtA ye/ b+ha ga ba ti ma hA ma ye/ pra sa da ye/ sarba duSh+Ta~M sho d+hA ya sarba pa pa~M/ tsaN De tsaN De/ tu ru tu ru/ tsaN De ni tsaN De ni/ mu yu mu yu/

mu tsu mu tsu/ ba ha ba ha/ u gre u gra ta me/ pU ra ya me/ ma no ra tha~M pa ri pu rA ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/ oM swA hA/ hU~M swA hA/ hrI swA hA/ hA/ swA hA/ d+h+ri~M swA hA/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ a di d+ya ye swA hA/ sau ma ya swA hA/

d+ha ra Ni su tA ya swA hA/ bau dA ya swA hA/ bri ha s+pha ti ye swA hA/ shU krA ye swA hA/ kriSh+Na war+N+Na ye swA hA/ rA ha be swA hA/ ke ta be+e swA hA/ bu dA ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ ku mA rA ya swA hA/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba na k+Sha tre b+h+yaH

swA hA/ sarba dwi da sha rA shi na~M b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM sarba bi d+ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ lag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig dag ston zla tha chungs smin drug gi zla ba'i yar ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams

te/ gso sbyong blangs nas tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin du mchod cing brjod par byas nas de nas nya la nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na de la lo dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bar du 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skar mda' ltung ba dang / gza' dang

rgyu skar gyis gdung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /gza' thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /gza' rnams kyis de la ci 'dod pa'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gza' de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das

la legs so zhes gsol nas mi snang bar gyur to/ /'phags ma gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgyal blon byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sku ring la bsgyur ba las/ dus phyis dge bsnyen grags pa rgyal mtshan

gyis dpal ldan sa skya'i dben gnas su rgya dpe la gtugs nas shin du dag par byas pa'o// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ gra ha mA tri ka nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'brog gnas kyi grong khyer chen po na/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /

mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / bdud dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / pa ba sangs dang / phur bu dang / gza' lag dang / spen pa dang / sgra gcan 'dzin dang / mjug rings rnams dang / rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad la sogs pa mang po rnams

kyis bstod pa/ rdo rje chen po'i dam tshig gis byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje'i khri la bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang yang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems

dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje gtum po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje gzhu can dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i bdag po

dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po kun tu gzigs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i tog dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhal ras rgyas pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i spyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rnams kyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa la chos ston to/ /bkod pa chen po'i rgyan gyi nor bu zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba dang / bar du dge ba dang / tha mar dge ba dang / don bzang po

dang / tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i chos ston to/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes 'khor de dag la bltas te langs nas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor

ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas spyan sngar 'dug ste snyems pa dang bcas pas dkyil mo dkrung legs par bcas nas 'khor de dag la 'gying bag du bltas te/ rdo rje'i thal mo rang gi snying gar gzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad

ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gza' mi bzad pa/ mi bzad pa'i gzugs can drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ khro ba khro ba'i gzugs can dag sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar bgyid pa tho 'tshams par bgyid pa/ mdangs

kyang 'khrog par bgyid cing / kha cig nor zas 'phrog par bgyid/ kha cig srog 'phrog par bgyid/ sems can tshe ring ba kha cig ni tshe thung ngur bgyid do/ /de ltar sems can thams cad la gnod cing 'tshe bar bgyid pa de rnams kyi slad du bcom

ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis sems can thams cad la bsrung bar 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang yang khyod kyis snying rje bskyed pas sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gsang chen

pas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed pa ni legs so legs so/ /de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / gza' mi bzad pa'i gzugs can shin du khro ba dang / shin du 'jigs par byed pa rnams kyis mchod

pa dang / mchod yon dang / bzlas brjod bzang po gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba ngas bshad do/ /de dag mchod pas mchod gyur cing / /gnod pa byas na gnod byed pa/ /gza' de kun gyi kha dog dang / /ji lta bur ni 'gyur ba dang / /lha rnams dang

ni lha min dang / /mi 'am ci dang klu dag dang / /gnod sbyin rnams dang srin po dang / /mi rnams dang ni mi ma yin/ /drag po gzi brjid chen po dang / /khros pa zhi bar byed pa de'i/ /gsang sngags rnams dang mchod pa dang / /rim pa bzhin du bshad par

bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa nyid kyi thugs ka nas snying rje rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye ste/ gza' rnams kyi spyi bor zhugs so/ /de nas de'i mod la nyi ma la sogs pa'i gza' thams cad langs te/

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la lha rdzas kyi mchod pa byas te phyag 'tshal nas pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag cag la sman yon btags par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs gang gis bdag cag rnams la sogs pas chos smra ba rnams la srung bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang /
