zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba rnams bgyid par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams mchod pa dang gsang sngags bka' stsal to/ /oM mai g+hol gA ya swA hA/ oM shi ta~M sha be+e swA hA/ oM rag ta a~M ga ku mA rA ya swA hA/ o~M` bu da ya swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ha spa ti ye swA hA/ o~M` a su rod ta mA

ya swA hA/ oM kriSh+Na brna ye swA hA/ oM a mri ta pri yA ya swA hA/ oM dz+h+yo ti ke ta be+e swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni gza' dgu'i gsang sngags kyi snying po bklags pas grub pa yin te/ kha dog dang 'thun par spos kyis dkyil 'khor sor bcu gnyis pa

byas pa'i dbus su mchod par bya'o/ /kham pa 'am zangs la sogs pa 'am/ gser dang dngul gyi snod du mchod yon phul nas re re la yang bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje de'i 'og tu gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi

gsang sngags kyi tshig lan bdun brjod par bya'o/ /de nas gza' rnams thams cad srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /dbul ba'i gdon las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe zad pa las tshe ring por byed par 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje dge slong dang / dge slong

ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi rigs gang yin pa dang / gang dag gi rna lam du grag pa de dag kyang dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje gza' rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi

dbus su mchod par bya ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du klog par byed pa'i chos smra ba gang yin pa de la gza' thams cad bdag nyid kun gyis bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de dang rigs gcig

pa rnams kyi dbul ba yang sel bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad ma 'chang la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i gza' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyu skar rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gza' khyim bcu gnyis po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ badzre badzre/ pad

me pad me/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ sma ra sma ra/ krI DA ya krI DA ya/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ mar+d+ha ya mar+d+ha ya/ g+ha Ta ya g+ha Ta ya/ sarba big na~M/ ku ru ku ru/ ts+tshin d+ha ts+tshin d+ha/ k+ShA pa ya k+ShA pa ya/ shAn te shAn te/ dAn te dAn te/ dA ma ya dA ma ya/ bcom

ldan 'das ma bdag nyid myur du bstan du gsol/ bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad la bsrung du gsol bsrung du gsol/ gza' thams cad dang / rgyu skar rnams kyi gnod pa bzlog tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ma

rdzu 'phrul chen po mnga' ba sdang ba'i sems can rnams bsal du gsol/ bdag gi sdig pa rnams skam du gsol/ tsan De tsan De/ tu ru tu ru/ tsan De Ni tsaN De ni/ mu yu mu yu/ mu tsu mu tsu/ ba ha ba ha/ u gre u gre ta me/ pU ra

ya me/ ma nor tha~M pa ri pu ra ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te sa ma ye swA hA/ oM swA hA/ hU~M swA hA/ hri swA hA/ d+h+ru~M swA hA/ d+h+ri~M swA hA/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ a di t+ya ye swA hA/ sau mA ya swA hA/ d+ha ra Ni su trA ya swA hA/ bu da ya swA hA/ b+h+ri ha

s+pha ti ye swA hA/ shu krA ye swA hA/ kriSh+Ni brna ye swA hA/ rA ha be swA hA/ ke ta be+e swA hA/ bud d+ha ya swA hA/ badzra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ pad ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ ku ma rA ya swA hA/ sarba gra he b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba nak+Sha tre b+h+yaHswA hA/ sarba dwi da sha rA shi na~M b+h+yaH

swA hA/ sarba u pa dra be b+h+yaHswA hA/ oM sarba bid+ye hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig dngos grub thams cad kyi gzhi yin no/ /phyag na rdo rje gang yang gza' rnams kyi gzungs kyi

gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ston zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo'i tshes bdun nas brtsams te gso sbyong dang ldan par byas nas/ tshes bcu bzhi'i bar du gza' rnams la mchod pa byas te gzung bar bya'o/ /de nas zla ba nya'i nyin mtshan thog thag bklags na

de dag la lo dgu'i bar 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /gza'i 'jigs pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba dang / rgyu skar gyi gnod pas 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /gza' thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /

gza' thams cad kyis ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gza' rnams kyis phyag 'tshal te legs so legs so zhes gsol te mi snang bar gyur to/ /gza' rnams kyi yum zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aSh+Ta de bi d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa

thams cad byang bar mdzad ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/ bgegs thams cad rab tu 'jig par mdzad ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo'i mchog 'di gsungs so/ /na maH

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he bud d+ha mA ta ri/ sarba pA pa na sha ni/ gardza gardza b+han dza b+han dza/ marda marda/ ga ma ri/ ga ma b+ha ri/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bid d+h+wan sa ya bid d+h+wan sa ya/ sarba sha trUn ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/

pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra tid dz+nyA na/ sarba bud d+ha par+yu pa si ti/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma sa ni/ kra ma Ni d+ha ba ni ra ma Ni mA taM gi ge swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maH

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a ma ri/ a ma ri/ ta Ta/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsi mi tsi/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma thA ma thA/ dur nAn ta da ma ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ he he/ ka ni de/ sarba ta thA ga ta

b+ha ne ke/ b+ho d+hin dad/ trA Ta trA Ta/ hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ gardza gardza/ pa ra ma ti/ bi hu ri ke swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ b+ha ga ba ti pradz+nyA pA ra mi te a/ sarba pA pa ya~M ka ri dz+nyA na a ci s+pha ra ni/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ma tha ma tha/

da ma da ma/ A na ya A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba bud d+ha dza ne trI yai swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma thA ma tha/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dun tu b+hi/ sarba nir g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bid d+h+wan

sa ya bi d+h+wan sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi phu la ni rma la nir dza te/ a ha ra a ha ra/ gad tsha gad tsha/ sarba bud d+ha par+yu pa sa ti ma/ mA bi lam ba swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /

na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ke/ pU ra ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hU~M hU~M dza ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs

so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA hU~M tri/ sarba bud d+ha mA ti ri/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ma thA ma thA/ da ma ni da ma ni/ gargA ri gargA ri hrI swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA

te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ trA Ta trA Ta/ mu hu mu hu/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka /mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/

sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na nir dza te swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ ha ha mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ dur tAn ta da ma ni swA hA/

bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha'

yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/

srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom rkun gyis bcom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma

yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de nyid la nyin gcig bzhin

mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar

'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /des ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur ro/ /de ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas su/ /lan cig klog par byed pa'i

mi/ /srid pa nyams ngar gang byas pa/ /sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs chom rkun dang / /mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing / /dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/ /rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang / /

ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te mngon par
bstod do/ /'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA ra b+haT+TA ra ka nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka /bod skad du/ rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/ rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan yid 'ong po ta la/ /sna tshogs

khams kyis rnam par spras/ /sna tshogs ljon pas bkram pa ste/ /skye gnyis du ma sgra 'byin pa/ /'bab chu sna tshogs ku co che/ /ri dgas sna tshogs 'khrugs pa ste/ /me tog sna tshogs rigs rnams kyis/ /kun du dri yis bkang ba ste/ /

sna tshogs yid 'ong 'bras bur ldan/ /rkang pa drug pa glu yi sgra/ /mi 'am ci yi glu snyan len/ /glang chen smyon pas yang dag khengs/ /rig 'dzin grub pa'i tshogs rnams dang / /dri za rnams kyang glu len pa/ /thub pa 'dod chags bral rnams dang / /

byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gzhan dang / /sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams dang ni/ /'phags ma sgrol sogs lha mo rnams/ /rigs pa'i rgyal mo stong rnams kyis/ /rtag tu legs par sten pa'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po tshogs gzhan dang / /rta mgrin la

sogs kyis bskor ba/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /bcom ldan 'das ni spyan ras gzigs/ /bzhugs te de phyir dpal dang ldan/ /pad ma'i snying po thub pa'i gdan/ /dka' thub chen po dang ldan pa/ /byams pa dang ni snying rjer ldan/ /

lha yi 'khor ni chen po la/ /chos gsung ba ni yang dag bzhugs/ /de ru nyer 'dug yang dag langs/ /phyag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pas/ /spyan ras gzigs la zhus pa ste/ /rkun po sbrul dang seng ge me/ /glang po stag

dang chu 'jigs pas/ /zhi mdzad thub pas sems can rnams/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba rnams/ /'khor ba'i zhags pas bcings pa rnams/ /chags sdang gti mug dri ma las/ /gang gis sems can grol 'gyur ba/ /de gsungs

bdag la thub chen po/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'di skad gsungs/ /dpal ldan de ni spyan ras gzigs/ /phyag na rdo rje rab rtogs byed/ /snyan pa'i tshig ni 'di skad gsungs/ /nyon cig gsang ba'i rgyal dbang po/ /skyob pa 'od dpag med pa yi/ /

smon lam stobs kyis byung ba ste/ /nga yis 'jig rten ma ru shes/ /snying rje che dang ldan pa yis/ /'gro ba 'don par brtson pa mo/ /nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ /zla ba nya 'dra byad kyi 'od/ /lha bcas mi dang lha min dang / /'di rnams thams cad

gsal bar byed/ /'jig rten gsum po g.yo bar byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po 'jigs par byed/ /phyag na ud dpal sngon po ste/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs zhes brjod ma/ /bar snang du ni 'phar bar gnas/ /'gro ba yang dag bsrung

don du/ /mtshon gyi bskal pa byung ba dang / /'jigs pa sna tshogs 'khrugs don du/ /rgyal ba rnams kyis bdag bskyed de/ /ming rnams dran pa nyid kyis ni/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsrung / /sna tshogs 'jigs pa'i rgya

mtsho las/ /sems can thams cad bdag gis bsgral/ /des na bdag la 'jig rten du/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs kyis sgrol mar bsgrags/ /thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/ /spyan sngar 'dug te 'di skad gsol/ /gus dang bcas pas yang

dag gnas/ /gang zhig rgyal bas sngon bsgrags pa/ /gsungs shig mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ /sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon rnams dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rab dga' ba'i/ /sdig pa spong byed bsod nams dang / /bkra shis grags

pa 'phel bar byed/ /gter dang nor rnams 'phel byed nyid/ /nad rnams thams cad rlag par byed/ /dpal dang shis pa 'jog par byed/ /nad med tshe ni 'phel bar byed/ /sems can rnams la byams bsgoms la/ /de dag sgrogs shig

thub chen po/ /'di skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang rab tu bzhad/ /mchog rnams rab tu rnam gzigs nas/ /'di lta bu yi byams pa spro/ /phyag ni g.yas pas phyag thab mdzad/ /bsod nams mtshan nyid ldan

pa yi/ /de gsungs shes rab shin du che/ /legs so legs so dka' thub che/ /sems can kun la gcig tu brtse/ /skal ba chen po'i mi rnams nyon/ /mi rnams gang zhig 'di sgrogs pa/ /nor gyi dbang phyug yang dag 'gyur/ /

nad rnams thams cad yang dag grol/ /dbang phyug kun dang yang dag ldan/ /dus min 'chi ba nges par bsregs/ /'chi ba bde ba can 'gro ba/ /de rnams bdag gis bshad par bya/ /lha yi dge 'dun bdag la nyon/ /'di la rjes su

yi rangs gyis/ /legs par bsdams par gyur la bstod/ /oM dge ba can ni gzi brjid che/ /'jig rten gso byed snyan pa che/ /dbyangs can ma ni spyan yangs ma/ /shes rab dpal dang blo 'phel ma/ /gso byed ma dang rgyas 'debs

ma/ /swA hA oM gyis rnam pa 'dod gzugs ma/ /sems can kun la phan par brtson/ /g.yul las sgrol byed rgyal ba mo/ /lha mo shes rab pha rol phyin/ /'phags ma sgrol ma yid 'ong ma/ /rdza rnga dung can rgyas pa mo/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo

tshig snyan ma/ /zla ba'i gdong can dkar mo che/ /mi pham gos ni ser mo can/ /sgyu ma chen mo dkar mo che/ /stobs po che la pha rol phyin/ /rtsub mo chen mo gtum chen mo/ /sdang ba'i sems kyis rlag byed ma/ /rab tu zhi ba zhi ba'i gzugs/ /

rnam par rgyal ba 'bar ba'i 'od/ /glog gi phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can/ /ral gri 'khor lo gzhu thogs mtshon/ /'chol byed rengs byed nag mo ni/ /mtshan mo nag mo mtshan spyod ma/ /srung byed rmongs byed zhi ba mo/ /mdzes ma dge ma 'dra ba'i

lding / /tshangs pa mo dang rig byed mo/ /gsang ba mo ni brag phug gnas/ /bkra shis don byed zhi ba mo/ /skyes nas rig byed yid mgyogs ma/ /thod pa can ni shugs chen mo/ /tshangs ma bde ma gzhan mi rgyal/ /ded dpon chen mo snying rje

gnas/ /chud zos pa la lam rab ston/ /mchog ster ster byed ston pa mo/ /bud med gzugs la dpag med gnon/ /ri khrod ma dang rnal 'byor ma/ /grub ma gtum ma bdud rtsi ma/ /des ma nor can bsod nams ma/ /skal chen skal

bzang mdzes ston ma/ /mthar byed skrag byed 'jigs byed ma/ /grag dang brtul zhugs chen mo ma/ /'gro la gcig tu phan par brtson/ /skyabs byed gus la gsong po ma/ /ngag gi dbang phyug zhi phra ma/ /rtag ma kun 'gro rjes 'gro ma/ /

don kun sgrub byed bzang po ma/ /gsang byed gso byed nor ster ma/ /mi 'jigs bsod nams gau ta ma/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang bdag nyid skyes/ /mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni/ /phan par byed par grags pa ste/ /mchog tu

rmad byung gsang ba'o/ /lha yul na yang rnyed dka' ba/ /skal bzang skal ba dang ldan byed/ /dug ni thams cad nyams byed la/ /nad ni thams cad zhi byed ma/ /sems can kun la bde ster ma/ /blo ldan gang zhig lan gsum klog /

mnyam bzhag gtsang sbra byas pa yis/ /des ni dus mi ring ba ru/ /rgyal srid dpal yang thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sdug pa 'ang bde bar 'gyur/ /bkren pa phyug por 'gyur ba'o/ /rmongs pa shes rab chen por 'gyur/ /yid gzhungs

'gyur bar the tshom med/ /bcings pa bcings las grol bar 'gyur/ /tha snyad las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur/ /dgra bo bshes por 'gyur ba ste/ /rwa can dang ni mche ba can/ /dog pa'i 'thab mo rgyal dka' dang / /sna tshogs 'jigs

pa 'khrugs pa las/ /mtshan ni 'di rnams dran pa yis/ /'jigs pa kun las sgrol bar byed/ /dus min 'chi las sgrol bar byed/ /skyes bu snyan pa thob par byed/ /mir ni skye ba don dang bcas/ /de gcig pu'i phan yon gyis/ /

gang zhig 'di ni sngar langs nas/ /skyes bu gang zhig sgrogs byed pa/ /de ni dus ring tshe dang ldan/ /mi ni dpal gyis dga' 'gyur te/ /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /dri za dang ni lus srul po/ /'byung po gshed byed srin po

dang / /ma mo rtsub pa'i sems ldan pa/ /gnod sbyin mo dang yi dags byed/ /smyo byed dang ni gdon chen rnams/ /grib gnon dang ni rjed byed dang / /sha za la sogs pa rnams dang / /ro langs la sogs sna tshogs rnams/ /skul byed

gzhan sems sdang ba rnams/ /grib ma yang ni 'gom mi 'gyur/ /ji ltar slar ni rtsod par 'gyur/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'ching bar 'gyur/ /nad la sogs pas thebs mi 'gyur/ /phyug dang longs spyod yon tan ldan/ /

bu dang tsha bo 'phel bar 'gyur/ /blo ldan skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /rigs dang ldan zhing mthong dgar 'gyur/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing tshig gsal ba/ /bstan bcos thams cad rig par 'gyur/ /dge bshes bsnyen bkur yang dag bsten/ /byang chub

sems kyis brgyan pa dang / /gang dang gang du skyes pa der/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas kyis mi spong / /dpal ldan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs pa/ rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogs so// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na maHAr+yA wa lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tuta tA re tu re sarba duSh+TA pra duSh+Ta Na ma ma kri te dzam b+ha ya/ sta~M b+hA

ya/ ma hA ya/ ban d+hA ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+Ta stam b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tA rA swa pra ti dz+nyA nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/

'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas sgrol ma rang gis dam bcas pa'i gzungs smras pa/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re ta ra ye/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ sa ma ya

s+thi te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba b+ha ra Na/ bi b+hu shi te/ pad ma ni/ pad ma/ ma hA pad ma/ a sa na s+thi te/ ha sa ha sa/ trA+ai lo kya ba ra de/ sarba de ba da na pa/ pu dzi te sma d+ha hi/ b+ha ga ba ti tA re/ sma rA hI/ b+ha ga bAn ta/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ pu ra taH

sa ma ya~M/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA sa twa a ba lo ki te/ ma Ni ka ni ka /bi tsi tra b+ha ra Ne/ o~M` bi lo ka ya/ che ge mo/ b+ha ga ban te/ tA re/ hrI~MhrI~MhrI~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di yid kyis dran pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar

'gyur ro/ /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /dkar po'i tshes brgyad dam bcwa lnga la 'phags ma sgrol ma la mchod pa chen po byas te/ sgrol ma mngon sum du mthong gi bar de tsam du bzlas par

bya'o/ /gang 'dod pa de sbyin no/ /mchog thams cad ster ro/ /ma byin na bdag gis mtshams med pa lnga byas so/ /gzhan yang phan yon dpag tu med pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje mchog gi rgyud las btus/ 'phags ma sgrol ma rang gis dam

bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba ti nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe 'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas/ ma dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang /

lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te/ dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams

gang dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de de'i tshe ku cho'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po'i shugs kyis yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam

par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi las glog las ser ba dang / char chen 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te/ stan las langs nas

shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba stong mngon par sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs 'di bya'o/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs

pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/

gi ri gi ri/ badzra/ ha la ha la badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ sarba b+hU tA nA~M/ b+h+rA ma ya b+h+rA ma ya/ b+ho b+ho badzra d+ha ra badzre Na/ pA ThA ya/ pA ta ya/ shI g+ha na shi g+ha na/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa lA ya/ na ga b+ha ba nan/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /su zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur

ro/ /snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /snying 'grum par 'gyur ro/ /badzra ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra ya swA hA/ badzrA b+hai ra bA ya swA hA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la pA rA kra mo badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogs su

rnam par bltas nas khros te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po nged nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar rlag go/ lus srul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o/ /

klu thams cad kyi gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o/ /yang smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag gi rdo rje lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/

rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems par byed pa'i rdo rje/ snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya ste/ da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par

sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A brtA ya/ sa~M go tsa la/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ d+ho na d+ho na d+ho na/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha ban d+ha/ sarba pa she/ mo ha ya/ dzam b+ha ya/ stam b+ha ya/ ha sa ha sa ha sa/

san trA sa ya/ sarba duSh+Ta nan badzra d+ha ra adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal

bar bgyid na bdag gis kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/ /snying rnams dgrum mo/ /tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ mi li mi li/ tra ta tra ta/ b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wA la

ya dz+wA la ya/ dU ti da yan sho Sha ya/ gang zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /hU~M hU~M hU~M/ badzra d+ha ri badzre Na/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/

tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badzra du ti/ rAd nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang bcas pa stan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i

bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa bdag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par sems pa nas lus srul po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la bzlog par bgyid do/ /da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam

par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma rungs par bgyid pa de dag gi don gyi slad du gsang sngags gzhi mi bzad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ga d+ha ga /d+hU ma d+hU ma/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/

ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha ha/ badzra d+hu ti mo hA ya/ dzam b+hA ya/ stam b+hA ya/ sarba nA gA na/ sarba a hi te Sha No/ badzra Ni bud d+ha mai tri/ d+harma sat+ye na/ in dra sat+ye na/ in dra ba le na/ lo

ka pA la pra b+hA be na/ dzam b+ha yA mi/ sarba nA gA na stam b+ha ya mi/ sarba a hi te Shi No/ ba ru na pA pa she na/ ban d+ha yA mi/ sarba nA gA na in dra tsi len/ sarba a hi te Shi Na tsha ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/
badzra sha~M ka le swA hA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te/ me tog bkram la/ a ka ru dang / tsan dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /de ltar

'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu las gang 'dod pa de bya'o/ /skud pa nag pos ni rims nad sel to/ /shing ka ra bi ra'i lcug mas ni sprin zlog go/ chu'i nang du 'dug na ni dran par bya'o/ /gcan zan khro bo'i nang na 'dug na ni gos

kyi mtha' mar mdud pa bor ro/ /lto sbos na ni tshwa chus zhi bar byed do/ /so na ba la skud pas zhi bar byed do/ /gna' ma'i me tog brgyad brgya me tog re re nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtor ro/ /nyi ma bdun na de bzhin gshegs

pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsaN Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ a pra ti ha ta pa la pA rA krA ma ye/ na maHsarba badzra ku la bid+yA/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs lnga brgyas

yongs su bskor zhing mdun du bdar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sems can thams

cad la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ sems can thams cad la sman pa'i don dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di bka'

stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di

ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ ngas kyang da thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir bshad kyis khyod kyis zung shig /

tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza ya bA ha ni ye bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ bud d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams

te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod par gyur pa de'i lus la phyir rgol ba rnams kyis dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod

par byar mi chud do/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /mi'i bdag po dbang po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /yul 'khor der phyir rgol ba'i dpung gis mi chud par 'gyur ro/ /lag na

rdo rje rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te/ 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de'i lus la dug dang / mtshon dang / chu dang / dbyig dug dang / sbyar ba las byung ba'i dug gzhan

gyis kyang mi tshugs so/ /dgra'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /de la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / mtho 'tsham pa mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang / chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /g.yul ngor zhugs na yang lus

la mtshon gyis mi phog go/ thams cad du rgyal ba smra bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzi brjid dang / mthu dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis thogs pa med cing ma snad ma rmas par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /

tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ dza yod ta me/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni bo d+ha ni/ ta thA garta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba ro ha Ni/ a ba ro bya ni dza ya ku su me/ sA re swa ra ba ti/ dri

d+he dri d+he dri d+he dri D+ha pa sha ni dad d+he/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ti/ mo hi ni/ sarba he tai shi nan/ na mo b+ha ga ba to/ bud d+ha s+ya ma hA ka ru Na/ bi hA ri ni/ sid d+h+yan du me man tra pA da ni swA hA/

de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs dang / bdag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal

mo chen mo rgyal ba can gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzri Ni/ pra ha ra pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra/ b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ta ra

ta ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri ni/ ni la ba sa ni/ badzra pra ha ra ni/ badzra sam b+ha be/ badzra ka li/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud d+ha ra/ ma hA pra b+ha be/

ud tsa skan d+he/ ma hA te tsa ba ti/ a le pa tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ kang ka kang ka re/ ka si ni sa ma he te d+harma a ba b+hA sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu te/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra sa ra/ kA lA tsA ri Ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi

gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa lags te/ gang dag rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la

'khu ba lags so/ /'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dags sam/ sha za 'am/ grul bum 'am/ grib gnon nam/ rjed byed dam/ gshed byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma

mo'i gdon nam/ gong du yang gdon gzhan nam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ gshin rje'i gdon yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzre/ ni ha na badzre/

khA da khA da/ badzre Ni/ s+phA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ badzre Na/ id gra ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha me/ d+ha d+ha me/ d+hu d+hu me/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / g.yul

'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig /rgyal bar mdzad ma rgyal bar mdzod cig /ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ba ta ra Ne/ ku te ku te/ mu ku te

badzra ku te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bya ba dang / snying

brtse ba'i phyir zhugs te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di smras pa ni sems can chen po lag na rdo rje khyod yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag na yod pa dang / lus

la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod pa dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas na yod pa der rgyal po chen

po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /mi ngas mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /sa phyogs der rgyal po chen

po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas te/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul de la srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mi 'ong ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /sa phyogs der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod

sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rgyu zhing der srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang / yongs su skyong ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spong ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang /

dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / dug gzhig pa dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ pra ta pa ne/ d+hu ru me/

d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ ma hA d+hu ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe mu khe su mu khe/ swa la pra ti sa mA d+hi sa mA d+hi ga /mA na si/ phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ bud d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs

pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang chen no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la yod par byas te 'chang ngam/ spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi rgyan rnams kyis de la sti stang du

byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed cing mchod na/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu mi'i rgyal po de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing / phyir rgol ba thams cad las srung ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /

mi'i bdag po dbang po de la dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /yul der pha rol gyi dpung mi 'jug go/ 'jug na yang de dag la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs byed par 'gyur te/ bgegs sna tshogs

brgya dag dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong dag byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de dag gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bzhag

par bya'o/ /gang du g.yul 'gyed dam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/ der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi

dmag tshogs de la gnod pa 'dis gnod par byed de/ de pham par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di su'i mgul du thogs pa de ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/

grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang gang du nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung ba der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di la me tog sna tshogs kyi bla re bres la gtor

ma'i cho ga gzhung khung bzhi ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ste phyogs bzhir bzhag la/ de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor dang bcas te gnod sbyin bye ba

khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di'i gong na rig sngags

ches stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba ni gang yang ma mchis te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog lags so/ /yul gang dag

tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre/ a mi ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzra/ hu ta sha ni/ b+han dza b+han dza/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dzam b+ha dzam b+ha/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ sarba duSh+Ta

gra hA NA~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu re/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/

badzra mAn si/ badzra hu ti/ phu ru phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi te shi nan/ su ru me mu~M mu le/ badzra pra ti pa ti/ sarba ba le phu swA hA/ a lu pa la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam b+ha be swA hA/ dza yod ta me

swA hA/ dza ya ba re te swA hA/ dza yan d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya ma ni swA hA/ dza ya badzra ya swA hA/ a dzi ta badzra ya swA hA/ ma hA badzra hu ta sha na ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badzra hasta ya swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la

bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi ste/ yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang yongs su bskyang ba dang zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' bo bzlog pa dang / dus ma

lags par 'gum pa thams cad dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams gcad par bgyi'o/ /

tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li mi li/ mAn si dz+hu dz+hu dz+hu/ dz+hu ru me/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu tu Tu/ mu lu le swA hA/ mArga ba tI d+hu d+hu me be ge/ be ga d+ha ri ni/ te dza bA ti/ 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang dus ma

yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs shing / byin gyis brlabs pa

lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+ha ba ti/ bud d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harma ba ti/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi ga /bud d+ha a ti ga me/ bud d+ha bi hA re/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ne swA hA/ gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo

chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'gal bar bgyid na/ de'i mgo sid d+ha ka bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub

par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ gtsug lag khang du glegs bam gnas par bgyid na/ der tshogs kyi g.yog 'khor

dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'chang de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dpag tshad brgyad stong tshun chad du slar rgol ba dang / dgra rnams las thams cad du bsrung ba dang / mtshams

gcad par bgyi'o/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni sems can chen po

sems can thams cad la phan pa byed pa khyod yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis su la bsrung ba byas pa dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa

de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs so/ /dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad dang / gshed byed dang / rims nad nas gdon thams cad kyi bar gyis de la mi tshugs so/ /pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags

kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /

lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe gnod sbyin dang / srin po mdangs 'phrog pa drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa dag dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i

rgyal po tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems kyi rgyud mi mnyam pa/ mi bzad pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dag dang

sems can sdang ba thams cad kyi don dang / tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du

mas gsungs shing byin gyis brlabs te phyag rgyas btab pa yin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig /

rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi

bu dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya

ba/ rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ba tI nI nA ma d+hA ra NI/

bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong

stong du tshang ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan

'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba dang / sems can thams cad la sman pa dang / mi'i rgyal po rnams la sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bgyi ba/ 'di bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rig sngags kyi

rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba

dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir nga yang da ltar 'chad pa 'di zung shig /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ya bA ti ye/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud d+ha a d+hi ga me dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swA hA/ lag na rdo rje 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs

pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams te/ lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i tshig 'di dag gang gis lus la btags sam/ glegs bam la bris pa de'i lus dpag tshad stong tshun chad du phyir

rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshon dang dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi 'byung ngo / /phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje rigs kyi bu

'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ rgyal ba can 'di yi ger bris te 'chang ba de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de'i lus la mtshon dang dug dang / chu dang / rims dang / dug sbyar ma gzhan gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /de la dgra'i

'jigs pa dang 'tshe ba dang mtho 'tsham pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'thab mo'i nang du song yang de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi phog /thams cad du yang nga rgyal ba smra bar

'gyur/ gnod pa med cing ma snad la ma smas par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i mthu dang / gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / byin gyi brlabs kyis rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza yod ta me/ d+harma a ba

b+ha sa ni/ bud d+ha bud d+ha/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ ta thA ga ta/ a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha ni/ o ro bya ni/ dza ya ku su me/ swa re/ sa ra ba ti/ dI D+he dI D+he/ da da dri d+ha pA sha ri bad d+he/ o ha ni/ mo ha ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ stam b+ha ni/ stam b+hi ta/

sarba a hi te Shi Nan/ na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud d+ha s+ya/ ma hA ka ru NAn/ bi ha ri ni/ sid d+h+yan du man tra pA da swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi

mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi brlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzra pra ha ra/

pra ha ra/ pra ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba la/ tsakra tsakra/ pI Da ya pI Da ya/ a kra ma/ a kra ma/ bi kra me/ bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga tsA ri Ni/ nI la ba ti/ badzra pra ha ra ni/ badzra sam

b+ha be/ badzra ka ya bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud d+ha raSh+mi ma hA pra b+he ud tsa kan d+he/ ma hA te dza ba tI/ ma tsa le/ pa tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka ka kang re/ kA si ni/ sa mA hi te/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu De/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa ra/

kA la pa ri NI swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan

'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dags sam/ sha za 'am/ rjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa 'am/ ma mo'i gdon nam/ gong

ma'i gdon nam/ skem byed dam/ skem byed kyi gdon nam/ za ba'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyis so/ /rengs par bgyis so/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzre/ ni ha na badzre/ khA da khA da badzre ni/ s+phA Ta ya s+phA Ta ya/ s+pha Ta ya/ badzre ni/

i da gra ha na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs

shig srungs shig /dza ya ka rI/ dza ya~M ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra ne/ ku Te ku Te ku Te/ badzra ku Te swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ lag na rdo rje legs so

legs so/ lag na rdo rje sems can chen po khyed sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rje rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste/ lus la

btags sam/ glegs bam la bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang ngam/ 'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pas grong

ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul de bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /yul de pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag

khrig 'bum phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang lhan cig der srung ngo / /yongs su skyob bo/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byed do/ /chad pa spong ngo / /mtshon cha spong ngo / /dug gsod do/ /mi mdza' ba 'gog go/ mtshams gcod do/ /

sa gcod do/ /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+hu ru me/ d+hu ru me/ bud d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu khe/ mu khe/ su mu khe/ su mu khe/ spa la pra te/ sa mA d+hi te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ mA na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru d+hu ru/ bud d+ha mA na si ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rje

'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /gsang ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis rig sngags kyi

rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis sti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed na/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po

rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig du bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mthus yul der 'jug pa dang bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam

thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po'i gang dang gang du 'bro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur bar bya'o/ /gang du g.yul ngor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang

'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te/ g.yul ngor zhugs na der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ni rgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di su'i mgul

du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad pa chen po byung na/ der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang /

me tog sna tshogs dang / cho ga dang / gtor ma dang / bum pa btung ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di bklags na de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin

bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mi ngas de rab tu zhi bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches

stobs dang ldan pa 'am/ gzi brjid che ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul che ba 'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dang gang du spyod par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dang

de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ a mri ta badzre/ dz+wa la ti badzra/ hu tA sha ni/ b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza/ dzam b+ha/ stam b+ha ya/ sarba gra hA NAn/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/

pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho ri g+ho ri/ badzra mA na si/ badzra hu ti/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi ti Shi NAn/ nA bu ru Ni/ mu mu le/

badzra pra dI pA ni/ tsa ma le phu swA hA/ a yu pA la ni tsu tsu re swA hA/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya sam b+ha be swA hA/ dza yod ta me swA hA/ dza ya bar de swA hA/ dza yan d+ha re swA hA/ dza ya mA na si swA hA/ dza ya badzra swA hA/ a dzi ta badzrA ya swA hA/ ma hA

badzra hu tA sha na ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha badzra hasta ya swA hA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bsrung ba stsal bar bgyi/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spong ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus

ma lags par 'gum pa dgag pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag 'khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ye

dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mi li man si/ dz+he dz+he dz+he/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ be ge be ga d+ha ri NI/ te dza ba tI/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par

'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/

bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+he bud d+he/ bud d+ha ba tI/ bud d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harma ba ti/ sa ma hi te/ sa mA d+hi ga /bud d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud d+ha pa ri ha ri/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni swA hA/ su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di

las 'da' bar bgyid pa de ni mgo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ glegs bam la bris

te/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog na/ der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu

rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin du 'brangs te bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya stong tshun chad du mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang /

'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po legs so legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod

'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bde ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'dis gang yongs su bskyab pa dang /

yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang / gnod pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni de

bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zung shig chongs shig kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu

rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/ sems can drag shul dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul

'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di sems mi mnyam pa/ sems mi bzad pa de dag dang / dngang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/ /rig

sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa byin gyis brlabs pa dang phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal

mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ltar gzung

bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje de'i phyir khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya zhes bya bar zung shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba

can zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA shrI ya s+'u tra/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba

lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong

ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul ba bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/ /de nas

'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi

bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo/ pad ma'i spyan/ byed pa mo/ 'od chen mo/ zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo/ sAd ya the dan/ dzi ni/ g+h+ri ni/ sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni/ sha shi ni a/ lak+Sh+mi ni/ me na sha ya sid d+h+yan du

man tra pa das swA hA/ oM b+h+ri ku TI pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'byor

pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad par byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa

dang bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan

la phab pa// // dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der phyin nas/ bcom

ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan
'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te/ 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed

pa dang / rjod par yang byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis ni 'di lta ste/ bkra
shis ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad ma'i phreng thogs ma/ nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad ma spyan mnga' ma/ grags ma/ 'od chen ma/ zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs

rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ dzi ni/ g+h+riNi/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ si mi si mi/ ni mi ni mi/ bdag gi mi shes pa thams

cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o/ /dpal gyi

lha mo chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba su d+ha ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bi na tsher ma can zhes bya ba'i nags mchog chen po na/ dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe kau sham+bi'i grong khyer chen po na khyim bdag zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba/ dbang po nye bar zhi ba/ yid nye bar zhi ba/ bu pho dang /

bu mo mang ba/ gza' mi mang po dang ldan pa/ dad cing cher dad pa zhig gnas pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas

nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye

na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces

bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / khyod kyis ji skad dris pa'i dri ba lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das legs
so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dbul por gyur pa las ji ltar dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur

zhing / bro nad kyis thebs na yang bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag khyod ci'i phyir dbul po'i don du 'dri/

de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni dbul ba mang ba dang / gso ba mang ba/ bu pho dang / bu mo mang ba/ bza' mi mang po

dang ldan pa lags te/ de'i slad du gang gi sems can dbul po rnams kyi dbul ba ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / bro nad kyis thebs pa rnams bro nad ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang mdzod

mang po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sdug pa dang / yid du mchi ba dang / mthong na yid du 'thad pa dang / dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag mdzod pas mi 'tshal zhing / dbyig dang / gser dang / nor dang / 'bru'i mdzod dang /

bang mdzod rnams dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rdo rje dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / dbul bas ma 'tshal cing 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi bu smad dang / bza' mi rnams brtan par 'gyur ba'i chos
kyi rnam grangs de bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /khyim bdag 'das pa'i dus bskal

pa grangs med pa 'das par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes

bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang rgya mtsho'i dbyangs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas de bzhin gshegs pa de las nor gyi rgyun ces
bya ba'i gzungs 'di thos te bzung zhing bcangs/ bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rang par byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te/ rigs kyi bu da yang ngas de bshad

par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus mi rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /mi ma yin pa rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /

srin po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /yi dags rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /sha za rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /'byung po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /grul
bum rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /rjed byed rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /gnon po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /lus srul po rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi

byed do/ /lha ma yin rnams rnam par mtho 'tsham par mi byed do/ /zas su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su khrag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang /

zas su rnag 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su gtor khung nas 'bab pa za ba rnams dang / zas su dbug rngub pa dang / 'byung

ba za ba'i bar rnams rnam par 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gi khyim na yod dam/ snying la yod dam/ lag na yod dam/ glegs bam du chud dam/ thos
par gyur tam/ kun chub par byas sam/ bklags sam/ bzung ngam/ rjes su yi rang bar byas sam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de la yun ring po'i don dang / phan

pa dang / dge ba dang / grub pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs par 'gyur ro/ /su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di nam phyed na lan gnyis sam/ lan gsum 'am/ lan bzhi

bton na de'i lha yi rangs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba dang / chos gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / dge 'dun gdags pa byas pas dga' ba dang / chos smra ba la dga' ba dang lhag pa'i bsam pas

bdag nyid 'ongs te 'bru'i char 'bebs so/ /na mo badzra d+ha ra sA ga nir go ShA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM su ru pe/ b+ha dre/ b+ha drA ba ti/ ang ga le/ mang ga le/ mang ga la ba ti/ a le/ a tsa le/ a tsa la ba

le/ ud g+ha ta ni/ ud b+he da ni/ bas+ya ba ti/ dA na pa ti/ d+ha n+ya pra ti/ shri ma ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nir ma le/ ru ru/ su ru pe/ su ru pa ma le/ bi ma le/ tsa le/ artsa na ste/ a nan ste/ bin na ste/ bi shwo ke shi/

bi sho ni shi/ ang ku re/ mang ku re/ pra bang ku re/ bi ra me/ bi ra me/ bi d+ha me/ ri ri me/ di di me/ du du me/ kha kha me/ ta ta re/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra tA ra/ badzre badzre badzre ba me/ Ta ke Ta ke/ Tha ke Tha ke/ ug ke/ bug ke/ Tha ke Tha ra ke/ a

brta ni/ ba ra sha na/ Sha da ni badzra d+hA ra sA ga ra nir go ShA na/ ta thA ga ta ma nu sma ra/ sma ra/ sma ra/ sarba ta thA ga tA sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ d+harma sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ sang g+ha sa t+ya ma nu sma ra/ da Ta da Ta/ pU ra

pU ra pU ra ya/ pU ra ni/ b+ha ra b+ha ra ni/ a ma le/ su mang ga le/ shAn ta ma ti/ shu pA ma ti/ mang ga la b+ha ni/ ma hA ba ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ pra b+ha ba ti/ su tsan dra ma ti/ a gad tshe a gad tshe/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra

swA hA/ a ba ra ni ma nu sma ra swA hA/ pra b+ha ba ma nu sma ra swA hA/ d+hi di ma nu sma ra swA hA/ te dza ma nu sma ra swA hA/ bi dza ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ hri da ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ sarba swa twa bi na ya ma nu sma ra swA hA/ oM ba

su d+ha re swA hA/ oM ba su shrI ye swA hA/ oM shrI ba su swA hA/ oM ba su swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni nor rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs te/ gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus mu ge dang / nad dang / 'chi ngas 'byung bar mi 'gyur

ro/ /rigs kyi bu su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas te/ nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag nub gcig bton na/ de nas dngos
grub tu 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa'i don du bdag gi khyim 'am/ gzhan gyi khyim 'am/ gnas gtsang ma bang mdzod dam/ gnas gang du yang rung bar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sangs
rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gsang sngags kyi lha'i phyir tsan dan gyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas te nub gcig bton na/ rigs kyi bu de'i khyim nor dang / 'bru dang / gser dngul

dang / lo byad thams cad kyi rgyun mi chen po'i mtshan tsam gyis gang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod rab tu sgrims la nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di

zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /ston cig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de khyod kyi yun ring po'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das legs

so zhes gsol te/ khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das las nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di thos nas tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis nor gyi rgyun ces bgyi ba blangs lags/ gzungs su zin lags/ gzungs lags/ bklags lags/ kun
chub par bgyis lags/ rjes su yi rang bar bgyis lags te/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so/ /de'i skad cig tsam la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i bang mdzod rnams

yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo / /

de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim nor dang / 'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdzod chen po dang /

bang mdzod yongs su gang ba rnams la ltos/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas kau sham+bi'i grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / khyim bdag zla ba bzang po'i khyim ga la ba der song ste /

phyin nas nang du zhugs pa dang / nor dang / 'brus yongs su gang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / rin po che phun sum tshogs pa dang / yo byad thams cad kyi mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang yongs su gang bar mthong ngo / /

mthong nas kyang tshim zhing dga' la 'gu zhing yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ya mtshan du

'dzin cing / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gis khyim bdag zla ba bzang po nor mang zhing mdzod chen po dang / bang mdzod rnams kyang nor dang 'bru phun

sum tshogs pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu khyim bdag zla ba bzang po dad cing mchog tu dad cing dge ba'i bsam pa can des nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs

'di bzung zhing rab tu bton te/ blangs shing / bklags/ kun chub par byas/ rjes su yi rang bar byas shing / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs 'di long shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /ston cig /

zung shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /kun

dga' bo su zhig rig sngags 'di las gzhan du smra ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ngo / /lan gnyis su bton tam/ lan

gsum du bton kyang 'gal bar byed pa de ni gnas med do/ /kun dga' bo gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni mi phyed pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo 'di dag ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba zad pa rnams kyi rna lam du grags par
mi 'gyur na glegs bam la yi ger bri ba dang / yid la gzung ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni sems can dbul po dang / nad sna

tshogs kyis gzir ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / sems can sdang bas gnod par byas pa thams cad kyi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / rab tu phye ba dang /

bsngags pa dang / bkrol ba dang / gsal bar mdzad pa dang / bskyed pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas btab pa dang / bstod pa dang / snyan par brjod pa dang / go bar mdzad pa dang / bsnyad pa'i

phyir ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ de'i tshe thal mo sbyar nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ /sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/ /

bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad rnams kyi/ /rnam par smin pa 'ang bsam gyis mi khyab lags/ /zhi ba ci yang mkhyen pa thams cad mkhyen/ /chos kyi rgyal po rga shi mi mnga' ba/ /ye shes pha rol bgrod par phyin

gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshim zhing dga' la mgu zhing yi rangs nas rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni khyim bdag zla ba bzang pos zhus pa zhes bya

bar zung shig /nor dang / 'bru dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gter zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa nor gyi rgyun gyi gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung shig /bcom ldan

'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya tsak+Shur bi sho d+ha ni nA ma bid+yA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i grong rdal bzang po zhig na shAkya rnams kyi nang na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe sta tu sa zhes bya ba na shAkya bde ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa/ chos
dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos la skyabs su song / dge 'dun la skyabs su song / sangs rgyas la gcig tu phyogs/ chos la gcig tu phyogs/ dge 'dun la gcig

tu phyogs/ sangs rgyas la nem nur med cing the tshom med/ chos dang dge 'dun dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam la nem nur med cing the tshom med la bden pa mthong ba/ 'bras bu

thob pa/ mngon par rtogs par gyur pa/ mtshon cha dang / dbyig pa bor ba zhig gnas pa de'i mig la snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i gzugs rnams snang bar ma gyur nas/ de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dad pa skyes te yid la byed

cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snang ba mdzad pa/ sgron ma 'dzin pa/ gsal ba 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ gsal bar

mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mig rnam par sbyong du gsol zhes byas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha'i gnas pa la bzhugs pa/ lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas shAkya bde bas tshig de skad brjod pa gsan

to/ /gsan nas kyang ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la mig rnam par sbyong ba'i rig sngags 'dis shAkya bde ba la bsrung ba gyis shig /yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs

su skyab pa dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /de dang de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po

dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / sems can gzhan gyi mig kyang rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi sbubs rnam par sbyongs shig /mig gi skyon med par gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ hi li mi li/ ki li mi

li/ hi li te mi li/ hu yA hu yA hu yA ma ni/ hu lu hu lu hu lu hu du hu du hu du/ tsak+Shur me bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni mig gi skyon dang / rlung gi skyon dang / mkhris pa'i skyon dang / bad kan gyi

skyon dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa'i skyon sel te/ tshul khrims kyi bden pa dang / brtul zhugs kyi bden pa dang / drang srong rnams kyi bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bden pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden pa

dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa dang / lam gyi bden pa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bden pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bden pas shAkya bde ba'i mig na bar ma gyur cig /mchi ma 'dzag par

ma gyur cig /kun tu mchi ma 'dzag par ma gyur cig /bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur cig swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mig rnam par sbyong ba 'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas drug gis

gsungs pa'o/ /nga yang da lta 'chad de/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi bdag po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo / /kun dga' bo gang gis rig sngags 'di dus gsum du rjod na de la thibs par 'gyur ba 'am/
rab rib 'am/ ling tog gam/ mig nad sngon por mthong ba 'am/ mig gi yul gyi skyon lha las gyur pa rnams sam/ klu las gyur pa rnams sam/ dri za las gyur pa rnams sam/ gnod sbyin las gyur

pa rnams sam/ srin po las gyur pa rnams sam/ sha za las gyur pa rnams sam/ byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs las gyur pa rnams sam/ ro langs dang byad las gyur pa rnams sam/ kun du rgyu las gyur pa rnams

sam/ kun du rgyu dang ro langs las gyur pa rnams kyis tshugs par 'gyur ba ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas

pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams bzung ste

kun chub par byas nas shAkya bde ba ga la ba der song ste/ bde ba mig rnam par sbyong ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la bskur gyis nyin re zhing dus gsum du dran par gyis shig ces de la rgyas par smras so/ /

shAkya bde bas thos ma thag kho nar mig rnam par dag ste/ mig rnam par dag pas dri ma med pa'i mig gis thams cad mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
shAkya bde ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa mig rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i rig sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang

dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ o~M` kA ka ni kA ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa ni/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ tra sa ni tra sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karmA pa ram pa ra ni me+e swA hA/

gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /

lan cig bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang / rmyi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro/ /lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba

rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig snying rjes non te/ ri dgas dang / bya dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i tshe rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /yang na shi ste dus

las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te/ de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya 'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum du brjod na sems can de sems can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyur ro/ /sa 'am/ til
