lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu bsreg pa 'am/ yang na 'chad pa'i nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris te mgo

bo la btags na des ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig zla ba nya

ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/ dus gsum du gos brje zhing / kha zas mi za 'am/ yang na kha zas dkar bag za zhing / sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas

brjod byas na/ de ngan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi

snang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing / mchod rten 'bum byas la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po 'am/ yang na

chu klung du btang na/ des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur ro/ /yang na de ltar mchod rten byas nas mjug tu lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan

la sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la yang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas/ 'di che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig /'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten

du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/ des de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing / legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba

'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba btab pa yang rung ste/ 'chi kar brtsig pa la gzungs 'di bris pa mthong na yang de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa lta ci smos te/ de

bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba an ta ra sa~M grA sa d+hA ra NI man tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni dug dang / mtshon gyis 'chi ba dang /

ltogs pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / gcan gzan ma rungs pas za ba dang / mes tshig pa dang / chur 'chi ba dang / 'go ba'i rims gzhan ya nga ba dang / mdze'i nad dang / gsor mi rung ba'i nad ya nga ba dang / g.yang

la lhung ba dang / gzhan gyi byad dang / zas kyis brnangs pa dang / bdag rang gis gsod pa dang / de ltar gshis ngan du 'chi ba bcu gsum gyis rkyen byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang /

'chang ba dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de la ni sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i bgegs dregs pa can ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /phyag na rdo rje gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / bzlas rjod byed pa de la las kyi

sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing dag ste/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la hU~M phaT/ sarba big+han an ta rA sa bi na sha ka ra mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces brgya rtsa brgyad

brjod na 'grub pa'o/ /nges par 'grub pa'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa bar du gcod pa thams cad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ dak+Shi NA pa ri sho d+ha ni nA ma/ bod skad du/ yon yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang

ldan pa blo dang ldan pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na maHsa man ta pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar ha te b+h+yaH/ sa myag sa~M bud d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shrI ye/ ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/

ma hA sa twa ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M` ni rA lam be ni rA b+ha se/ dza ye dza ya la ba d+he/ ma hA ma te dak+She dak+ShI NA~M me pa ri sho d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di lan cig brjod pas sdig pa thams cad

byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yon mang po la sbyang bar yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /yon bdag de'i yon yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur zhing tshogs thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang mi

'byung ngo / /'dul ba lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongs su sbyong ba/ rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ su me ru kal pa rA dzA ya/ ta tha

ga tA ya/ ar ha te sa myag sa~M bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya ya thA/ o~M` kal pe kal pe/ ma hA kal pe/ kal pe pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas ri rab tsam gyi yon yongs su sbyong bar byed par gsungs pas lan lnga
'am drug tsam bzlas so/ /yon yongs su sbyong ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // bcom ldan 'das ngan song thams cad yongs su sel ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M` sho d+ha ne/ bi sho d+ha ne ma ma sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ne/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sarba karma A pa ra Na bi shud d+he swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis gzungs 'di'i yi ge 'am/

tshig gam/ ming ngam/ thams cad byang chub par 'dzin na mi de bskal pa 'bum phrag bcu bzhir tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byang la myur du phyir mi ldog pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi

snying po'i bar du bsod nams zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ro ga pra sha ma ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan

mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs

shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig /tad+ya thA/ tsi le mi/ tsi le mi/ pan na ko ki li/ shrI ma ti/ kuN Da le dun du b+hi/ in dra ni mu le swA hA/ 'di dag ni zas ma zhu ba dang /

sbos pa dang / khrag dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang / gzhang nad can dang / za khu dang / lud pa can dang / rims nad can dang / klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba dang / yi dags kyis zin pa'i

gsang sngags gzhi yin te/ kun dga' bo gang gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa de ni ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /tshe zad pa ni ma gtogs so/ /gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs

pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni sems can thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'dod chags dang bral ba ni chos thams cad kyi mchog go/ dge 'dun ni tshogs thams

cad kyi mchog go/ bden pa'i tshig dang / bden pa'i ngag 'dis bdag gis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar zhu bar gyur cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog

gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje bla ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ badzra badzra/ ma hA badzra/ sarba

b+h+ya d+hi ha na ha na/ badzra na swA hA/ 'phags pa nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed ba

zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po'i bsil ba'i tshal na

bzhugs te/ de nas dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong des bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can rims nad kyis rnam par gtses pa dag mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bsrung du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

snam logs su gzigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'di na me lce phreng ba zhes pa'i rims gnas te/ de sems can rnams la nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum

pa dang / nyin bzhi pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'tshe bar byed de/ de bsrung ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di dag yin no/ /tad+ya thA/ dz+wa la ni dz+wa la ni/ pra dz+wa la ni/ pra ti pa ni/ pra sha ma ni/ bdag gi rims nad song shig /

ma 'dug shig swA hA/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bla na med pa dang / 'jig rten na chos dang / dge 'dun bla na med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi rims nad song

ma 'dug shig swA hA/ sid d+h+ya~M tu man tra pa dA/ ta ra tu/ bid d+h+ya ta~M basma A nu mo taM swA hA/ skud pa nag po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dor ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/

dge slong de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang /

dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ i

li me ti me li/ ha ne su ha ne/ che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban d+ha mi/ e ka hi kan/ tri hi kan tsa tur rtsa kan/ ni t+ya dz+wa ran swA hA/ cho ga ni 'di bris te mgul du btags na rims med par byed do/ /rims nad zhi ba'i
gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ak+Shi ro ga pra sha ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams

cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der

song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po 'dir mig nad dag byung na de dag la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

nag po mig nad kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di dag yod de/ tad+ya thA/ ru ti re phu/ re d+hi ra ak+Shi phu/ ru d+hi ra pi ga le phu/ bA te phu/ ba te le phu/ han te phuH/ mA~M sa dun du b+hi phu/ pad ma ak+Shi phu/ pad ma daN Da ha ri ni ye phu swA hA/
bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nag po yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /cho ga ni 'di yin te/ srad bu dkar
po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun dor ro/ /chu la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la lag pas byabs na mig nad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /he b+ha ga bAn/ many+dzu shrI ku mA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ ba la bi d+hid nya/ sarba ta thA ga tA nan/ na ge sti sti Sha/ sarba sa twa nan swA hA/ 'brum bu'i nad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/

rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya aR+sha pra sha ma ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa'i tshal na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom

ldan 'das bcwa lnga'i gso sbyong zla ba nya ba de nyid kyi tshe/ dge 'dun gyi mdun du gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rnga yab thogs/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yob

cing 'dug par gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'di na dge slong gzhang 'brum can mang po dag gzhang 'brum gyi bro nad kyis gzir te/ sdug bsngal mi

zad pa drag po mi bde ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar gyur na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la

'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo khyod kyis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo 'di long shig /kun dga' bo gang la la zhig gis gzhang 'brum sel ba'i mdo'i ming dang / tshig dang / yi ge shes na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhang 'brum

gyi nad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ a lan ne/ a la me/ shwa li tsi ni ku shi sam b+ha be swA hA/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ byang phyogs na ri'i rgyal po

gangs zhes bya ba de na sa la'i shing rnam par rgyal byed ces bya ba de'i me tog gsum yod de/ gcig ni 'phel ba zhes bya/ gnyis pa ni 'jam pa zhes bya/ gsum pa ni skam pa zhes bya ste/ ji ltar de skam pa de bzhin du sems

can rnams kyi rlung gi 'brum bu bskams par gyur cig /mkhris pa'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /bad kan gyi 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /khrag gi 'brum bu skams

par gyur cig /'dus pa'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi bad kan gyi 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /mi gtsang ba'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /khrag gi 'brum bu skams

par gyur cig /'dus pa'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /sna'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /'phyang ba'i 'brum bu skams par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ sha me sha mA ne/ sha me sha ma ne swA hA/ na bar ma gyur cig /rengs par ma gyur cig /sgra 'byung bar ma

gyur cig /'dzag par ma gyur cig /sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /rab tu sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig /zag par ma gyur cig /rab tu zag par ma gyur cig /'di nyid du zad pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / med par

gyur cig /sa'i 'og tu song shig /na mo b+ha ga ba ti/ bud d+ha sa t+ya bA ti na~M/ sid d+h+yan tu man tra pA da ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te/
bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /de la cho ga ni 'di yin te/ bklags pas grub pa 'di srad bu dmar po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas la/ mdud pa bdun bor te mgul du gdags so/ /'phags pa

gzhang 'brum rab tu zhi byed pa'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes bsdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsreg gsol 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ hu re hu re/ hu Ta ga

ta ne swA hA/ cho ga ni lag pa la bzlas brjod byas nas lto mnyes na ma zhu ba'i nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ma zhu ba'i nad 'byang ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun du gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ dI ri tiSh+Tha/ taska ra bad d+ho si/ ma tsa la ma tsa la swA hA/ lan bdun brjod de 'phags pa
'jam dpal la gsol ba btab na mi thams cad byams par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa sdang ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ku mA ra rU pa d+hA ri NI bi shwa sa~M b+ha a gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ la g+hu la g+hu/ b+h+rU~M b+h+rU~M/ hU~M hU~M/ dzi na dzi ka many+dzu shrI ye/ ta ra
ya mA~M/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ a mi tod b+ha bod b+ha ba/ pA pa~M me na sha ya swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ sarba duHkha pra sha ma na ka ra nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan na 'khor thams cad la chos ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi sdug

bsngal zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la phyi nang gsang ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar 'dod pas 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge zla ba drug tu

bsgoms pa'i sbyor bas A li kA li las byung ba'i sngags 'di brjod do/ /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo many+dzu nA thA ya/ na mo ya mAn ta kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ o~M` many+dzu b+ha ra/ many+dzu g+ho Sha ha na/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa

pa tsa/ be tse be tse/ b+hi ta b+hi ta/ i phu ta i phu ta/ her te sod ta ni/ na maHsod ta ni/ pri pi sha le tang / pri ta ha sa pra b+hin ta dza ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/ her de sod ta ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ o~M` bA gi shwa ra mu~M/

many+dzu g+ho Sha ha na/ ba ti sing ho ha ri ni swA hA/ sngags de lan cig brjod pas mi des tshe'i gzungs thob bo/ /bcu brjod na shes rab phyogs med du 'grol lo/ /brgya brjod na 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad

g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ /stong brjod na 'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs so/ /khri brjod na sdug bsngal thams cad rab zhi'o/ /'bum brjod na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhal mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
mngon par bstod do/ /sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//

oM ba ga ba tse/ dza~M b+ha ni/ sta~M b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ sarba ro sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug la sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas sna bdun gdong la byugs nas tshogs kyi nang du song na khros pa dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /

khro ba zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ka te bi ka te/ ro sha pra sha ma ni swA hA/ gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod na de'i khros pa

zhi nas nges par 'ong ngo / /'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ uSh+NI Sha ya d+ha re/ ran te swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang

las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'gi'u wang la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang bltas pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mig rtsi la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te mig la bskus na gang dang phrad par bya

ba de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor gang la lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na ma bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /tshogs pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gi gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song na tshig btsan par 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsan pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a le kA li a le kA li mud tsi te
swA hA/ kha nyi ma la bltas te chu la sngags 'di lan bdun btab ste phyogs bcur gtor na bdag bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag srung ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshes grangs dang rgyu skar dang yud tsam gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ nak+Sha tre/ sarba ti thI mUr te/ na sha tra ni/ me sa mi ta d+ha ni/ ba b+han

du swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste/ des lan bdun brjod nas song na don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag

'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo ha ri d+hi ye/ ha ri d+hi ku ma ri/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ tsaN Da li/ ma ta~M gi/ ka li ka li/ che ge mo zhig gi mo he hi/ kha ra kha ra/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a ba d+ha ya/ mur tsA ya/ che ge

mo zhig gi me sha ma nA ya swA hA/ oM bur bu bA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ dz+wa li ma nA ni/ de bi sarba sa~M ska ra ka ri na dze/ ta le ta le/ dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni bklags pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las thams cad 'grub par

'gyur te/ klad nad dang / rims ldang du ba can dang / ro langs dang / gdon rnams pham par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis de dag thams cad kyis btang bar 'gyur ro/ /bkres na grong du song ste lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te

gdong la byugs na zas rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /lce la bzlas brjod byas na shags 'gyed pa'i tshe lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /lo ma 'am/ me tog gam/ 'bras bu la bsngags nas su la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /las grub

pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri mi ri/ d+ha da~M me/ b+ha hu pha la~M b+ha ba tu swA hA/ gos phrugs gcig la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rabs sam/ slob dpon

nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba cig la byin na zla ba phyed phan chad kyi gos phrugs brgya thob par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o/ /gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

oM na ma sha ba ra na ma swA hA/ so rtsi la sngags 'dis btab ste/ khar bcug na gang la bltas pa de dag dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ uSh+NI Sha yA/ d+ha re d+ha

ra na ti ye swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste/ gi wang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /ti tsa la sngags te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa mig sprad 'thun no/ /chu la sngags

te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod do/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti smri ti/ ba la ba pa ra ma sid d+he swA hA/ cho ga ni

zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ga sum brgya lobs so/ /zla ba gcig gi bar du byas na mi 'am ci

dang 'dra bar mgrin pa snyan par 'gyur te/ the tshom za bar mi bya'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ta re ta re ta ra ya/ b+ha ga ba ste/ ban d+ha mo tsa ni swA hA/
'phags pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar byed do/ /bcings pa las grol ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ a gra bid+yA man tra/ bod skad du/

mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa 'khor 'phel bar

byed pa tshe 'phel bar byed pa dgra zhi bar byed pa gegs zhi bar byed pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa phul la/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ na maHsarba

ta thA ga tA nA~M/ tad+ya thA/ oM shang khi ni de bI/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ne/ d+ha na dz+wa ye/ brI brI/ brid d+hi ka ri/ d+h+ri d+h+ri d+h+ri ti ka ri nan/ bi bid+yA/ be sha bsta/ a yu d+ha ra ni yu yu/ a yuSh+bA la ne/ ta thA ga

tA sma ra bo d+hi tsita ta/ ma tI la~M bo da ra/ de hi me ba ran shang khi ni swA hA/ bdag dge ba 'di nyid kyis sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig /stong pa nyid kyi don byed
par gyur cig /'di brjod pas bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa mchog thob pa rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA
ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan
zhes bya ba ri rab kyi ngos la bzhugs te/ ri rab la gnas pa'i lha'i bu thams cad kyis bskor nas mdun du byas te chos ston to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can
gyis thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can shes rab rtul po/ blo zhan pa/ yid mi gzhungs pa rnams kyi slad du shes rab skyed pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs

bshad du gsol/ bshad pa/ hU~M pi bu pi bu/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni dza ra dza ra/ me d+ha bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+hA ni swA hA/ gang zhig gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir

'jug pa dang / chung ngu na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang de'i tshe 'di nyid la shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /gang gis zla ba drug gi bar du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la rig pa 'di lan bdun btab ste/

nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong stong 'dzin to/ /lan cig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin gcig bzhin shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du brjod pa tsam gyis dran pa dang yid gzhungs

par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+ya ka ra si~M ha dang / zhu

chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dA+e ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+hA ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma A r+yA

a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ s+kha la te s+kha la te ma ni te swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te khyor chu la lan gsum bzlas te 'thungs na zhag bdun nas thos pa

'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra si~M ha dang / zhu chen

gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma

Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+yA thA/ a bi ba bi ba/ pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dza ra dza ra/ me d+hA bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swA hA/

rig sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ nang re zhing rtsab mo khyor gang la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar b+ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra si~M ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de dA+e ba tsan dras zhus te gtan la phab pa// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag

'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smri ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wa bid+yA/ hu ru me hu ru hu ru me kriSh+Na hu ru me swA hA/ shu dgas nag

po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ma ti ba hu l+ye/ ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na/ dar she ne pradz+nyA pa ta/ gam b+hi re/ bo d+hi maN+Da nu sa ri ni/ a bid d+ha/ ta mon d+ha/ ka ri bar d+ha ma ni/

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pradz+nyA dI pe/ me d+ha pa di na sarba a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ su ru su ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma d+ha a na ya swA hA/ cho ga ni nang par zhing bzlas brjod byas na lobs skyen par 'gyur ro/ /sman
bram hi snyim par bcug ste dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas pa byas te zos na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ ba li ki ni/ pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzi ba ha pa ri shro d+ha ni/ d+hi da

ni ya ga me/ a sha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba sa twA ma nor the/ ka ya sid d+he shru hi d+hA ra NI smri ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas
te nang re zhing zos na nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du byas na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sho lo ka brgya lobs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ kha li kha li ba li te swA hA/ gdong khru ba'i tshe chu

khyor gang la sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas te 'thungs na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka brgya lobs par 'gyur te/ sngon lobs pa rnams kyang brjed par mi 'gyur ro/ /sho lo ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bI re bI re/ ma hi te dze/ te dza ma ti d+hA ra

NI/ shru ta d+hA ra Ni/ dza yan ti bi dza yan ti/ ma ti d+hA ra NI swA hA/ sman bram hi zho gnyis zhib tu btags te/ 'o ma'i nang du bskol la sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te zhag bdun gyi bar du
'thungs na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'am/ bstan bcos kyang rung ste/ thos na nyin zhag gcig la sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /rdzogs s+ho// //

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tri shI tri shU la sha khi/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ adz+nyA pa ya

ti/ ba re na bu ha la/ mrid d+hA tu swA hA/ cho ga ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du dkyil 'khor byas te/ ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la chu la sngags kyis btab ste bzhag nas/ nang par chu la lan

bdun bzlas brjod byas te dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te zos na zhag bdun lon na nyin gcig kyang sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /yid ches pa'i rtags yod do/ /sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i gzungs/

rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ ka ba tsa kar+Na la la te swA hA/ chu la lan bdun bzlas te gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i cho ga la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar

chu bzhag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs la/ dro khar kha zas 'o ma dang spags te bza' ba de lta bur zhag bdun gyi bar du byas na nyin gcig kyang yi ge sho lo ka stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /sho lo ka stong lobs pa'i
gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

tad+ya thA/ oM mu ni kan te mu ni pra b+ha swA re swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor byas te/ shu dag mthe bong tsam blangs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas zos na

thog ma'i nyin mo yi ge sho lo ka stong bklags pa tsam gyis lobs par 'gyur ro/ zhag gsum lon pa'i nyin mo sho lo ka sum stong lobs par 'gyur ro/ /zhag bdun lon pa'i nyin mo thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /
sho lo ka sum stong lobs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smri ti ma ti ma ti/ te dz+wa bid+yA/ hu ru me ha ra hu ru kriSh+Ni hu ru me swA hA/ shu dag dkar po la sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas te zos na gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /mi brjed

pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te/ phyag gsum byas na/ sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsams

pa dang / bsgoms pa'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma re re phyag gsum gsum byas na/ tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thob kyi bar du mi dang mi ma yin pa dang

'byung po dang / nad rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /o~M` na mo many+dzu shrI ye/ na mo su shrI ye/ na mo ud ta ma shrI ye swA hA/ phyag bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa rims dang srog chags

kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM dza dza re/ paR+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsing ha bya g+ha/ rak+Sha ta rak+Shu/ kha thin drA me kha me kha/ tsan ti ti pa ta ye/ ro ga ni dI pa sa ta ye swA hA/ dril

bu la lan bdun sngags te/ gang gis sa phyogs su dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan zan dang / srin bu dang / byi ba dang / rims nad thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs so// //

dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM su ru su ru ka /ba ra ba ra ke/ bi ri hi ri/ shud d+he bi shud d+he swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

kyi bden pa dang gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gcan zan mche ba'i dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo zhes brjod par bya'o/ /

dug thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// // mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa zhes bya ba/ bai d+'ur+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM ma ma rak+Sha/ sA ga re ma hA sa ga re/ pu ru tse pu

ru tsu re sa ma ne me/ de ba hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / b+hi su nag po la 'de gu byas te/ lkog mar thig le byas te sngags lan bdun bzlas na/ 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/

blta bar yang mi nus so/ /rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa bdud thams cad skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma ni sha ta d+hi pa ti/ dz+wa la

dz+wa la d+harma d+ha du ga /ma ni ma ni ma hA ma ni/ hri da ya ma ni swA hA/ sngags 'di brjod pas dkar po'i phyogs kyi lha rnams dga' zhing bsrung ngo / /nag po'i bdud thams cad dngang zhing brgyal lo/ /dregs pa ma
rungs pa rnams skrag pa dang brgyal lo/ /bdud skrag par byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

oM u ba sa u ba sa/ su ma su ma/ sarba nan rbad swA hA/ hU~M phaT/ ma ma shan ti ku ru swA hA/ lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugs na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / rtsa chad pa dang / klad pa

chad pa rnams sos par byed do/ /rdzogs s+ho// // me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs/ bsil mdzad chu yi lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM b+h+ra ma ni b+h+ra ma ni/ dz+ho ri b+h+ra ma ni swA hA/ zhes lan
bcu gcig brjod de mchil ma byugs na mes tshig pa'i zug rngu zhi'o/ /rdzogs s+ho// // mkhris pa'i nad sel ba'i sngags/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
na mo hi tu he ge swA hA/ bsil yab kyis lus la g.yabs na mkhris pa'i nad dang / mig ser dang / g.ya' ba'i nad sel bar byed do/ /rdzogs s+ho// // bad kan gyi nad sel ba'i gzungs sngags/

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /o~M` shan ti shan ti/ b+hi ti shan ti/ sarba bi ti mul myags swA hA/ zas ma zhu ba dang / sbos pa dang / skran nad dang / chu dang / khrag skyugs pa dang /

bad kan gyi zug gzer rab tu sel lo// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i sngags/ na mo hi tu he ke swA hA/ lus la nad 'du na nad khong skems kyis btab na bsil yab la chus gtor
te/ lan drug bcu rtsa gcig sngags nas de'i lus la g.yabs na nad med par 'gyur ro/ /k+Sha ya'i nad sel ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sAd ya the dan/ kha Te kha Te/

kha Ta bi kha Te/ tsa le bi tsa le/ bi lam be ba le ba la ba te/ tsan dre tsa ra Ne a mri ta nir g+ho she/ rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa zhi bar gyur cig / swA hA/ nad pa'i sman la gdab bo/ /stong chen mo nas phyung ba sman la

sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi lha bai dUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M` b+he Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye/ ma hA b+he Sha dz+ye b+he Sha dz+ye sa mud ga te swA hA/ sman gtong ba'i tshe sman la sngags kyis gdab pa rdzogs s+ho// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM mo kha mu khi/ ti mu

khi/ tri mu khi/ ma hA sra mu khi/ ta thA ga tA mu kha s+t+wi ha na/ tshin da tshin da/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ swa thA nA~M gats+tsha slA he swA hA/ mad si dang / brta ka dang / ga gon ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te gshags na mtsher ma'i skran zhi
bar 'gyur ro/ /the tshom med do/ /skran zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA TI ya ma sU tra nA ma ma hA sU tra/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba

ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga'

ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog

'khor gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi

bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs

sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag

'tshal/ /khyod la 'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchis/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dang / nags mdab dag

dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de la gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang

mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan

'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang /

bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyi ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i

slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing / kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang /

bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos

phyag 'tshal te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher gsol to/ /skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / /

phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pas/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas

'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun

gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis

rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la mdud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas

gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan

'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi dags zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /

srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /

glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs

po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /

mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren

pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar lho yi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /

rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu

sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu

rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming mthun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /

kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing

phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs

rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid cing / /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga'

zhing lhun chen lta mdzes dang / /gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sa lu kha

dog dang / /dri dang ro dang ldan pa dang / /dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshol sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/ /

phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /

gnod sbyin rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan

gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing

phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /

sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul

'khor bsrung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni

skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog

dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu

yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags

so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che'i/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /bzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/

kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang / sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang

mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad ma can dang / pad ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag kyang mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur

pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun pa grong khyer u sha ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yangs rgyun

lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba de mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /

rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang / /'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag kyang / /gau kum

b+ha dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor

mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni khyu mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li

mi li/ i li mi li/ kid Ti mU le/ hi li kid Ti mU le/ hu du me/ hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ go do ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i

sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / /glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams

dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos dang dga' byed dang / /ud dpal pad ma zla ba dang / /lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/ /tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang

phur bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag bdag gi spun lags te/ /de dag la bdag dri za 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe

ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/

kun tu le/ kun tu la/ kun tu le/ e hi e hi/ sa d+ha ma ra ti ke/ sa d+ha b+han Ti ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge

bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/

dri za mo 'am/ dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/

glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang

lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang

la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/

sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/ sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags

lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo

can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hu mi le/ hu mi lA ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan

'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha /rtsib logs che dang gsus po

che/ /lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / /sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba sbed/ /

la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mig bkra bo/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag ni spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing

de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig

ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ kriSh+Na tsha ga li/ ka rA Di ping ga li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba

ma lags pa dang / 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum 'am/ grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgan po 'am/

grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho 'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing

glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing / nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang

gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags

pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dags sam/ yi dags mo 'am/ yi dags rgan po 'am/ yi dags rgan mo 'am/

yi dags kyi bu pho 'am/ yi dags kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dags kyi 'khor pho 'am/ yi dags kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dags kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dags kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar

mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dags rnams kyi yi dags 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i

dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi lA ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang /

klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyas dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / /dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang

mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag /ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang / /yangs pa can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/ /gdengs ka che dang skar dga' dang / /nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag

po dang / /sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /

bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi le bi tsi le/ tsi li bi

tsi li/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ ma ta~M gi tsaN Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags

dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu pho 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor pho 'am/ klu'i 'khor

mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi

klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma

'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid

pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul rgan po 'am/ lus srul rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i

mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul

po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags

so/ /tad+ya thA/ a be/ ba ha ne/ ba ha na ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod

par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /ba ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser

can gang po dang / /seng ldeng pa dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba'i khyu mchog mi rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdud ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring

po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum pa mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi

zhing de dag la bdag go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags

kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi le mi le/ kIrti mU li/ hi li kIrti mU le/ o tum be tum be/ o tum ba tum be/ o g+he mo g+he/ go do he/ b+h+ring gA re/ ri Shi sa t+ya me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos

dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par

bgyid pa de la/ gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag

gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod

sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma

'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/

gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgan po 'am/ srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid

pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo

can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu me le/ yu mi la bA tI ye swA hA/

de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher brjod nas/

bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtso la/ gdan gshams pa de nyid la bzhugs so/ /bzhugs nas kyang

bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu kha dog 'phags pa/ g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag du ma dang / g.yog 'khor

gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa nam sros pa dang / nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/ nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal

thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar gyur to/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /blo ldan khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /

lha rnams kyis ni de ma 'tshal/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa dang / /da ltar byung dang ma byon pa/ /thams cad la ni bdag phyag 'tshal/ /khyod la 'ang bdag ni skyabs su mchi/ /btsun pa bcom ldan

'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang dag gnas mal dgon pa dag dang / nags mdab dag dang / bas mtha' dag na gnas pa dag kyang mchis la/ de na gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa

gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par dad pa dag dang / mngon par ma dad pa dag kyang mchis te/ gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab

la mngon par dad pa de dag ni shin tu nyung la/ gnod sbyin dang / mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la mngon par ma dad pa de dag ni ches mang lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge

slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bgyid pa dang / gnod sbyin dang mi ma lags pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa

mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bgyi ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang slar zhing 'phel bar bgyi ba'i slad du kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal

bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher 'dzin cing kun chub par bgyid na legs so legs so zhes gsol pa dang / dge slong dag ngas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la cang mi gsung bas gnang bar mdzad do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus ngas cang

mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ nga'i spyan sngar kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher

gsol to/ /skye bo gang dag gtong phod cing / /phra ma mi mchi ser sna bral/ /gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchis pa/ /mi de rnams kyis rnyed pa lags/ /gang gi 'char la brten nas ni/ /des na nyin mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor

can/ /nyi gdugs gang nas 'char 'gyur ba'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /

dri za rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /dri za rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /

kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /

rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /

sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar shar gyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na yi dags zhes bgyi ba/ /

rgyab kyi sha 'tshal phra ma can/ /srog gcod bgyid pa ma rungs pa/ /'jungs shing mi snyan smra bgyid pa'i/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /

de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /grul bum rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /grul bum rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po

zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal

zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal

la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchis/ /de ltar lho'i phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags shes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /

rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang zhig nub pa kho na las/ /des na mtshan mor brjod pa yi/ /nyi ma chen po dkyil 'khor can/ /nyi gdugs gang du nub 'gyur ba/ /de na mtsho chen zab mo ni/ /shin tu 'da' bar dka' ba ste/ /de ni chu sngon rgya mtsho zhes/ /

skye bos rtogs pa mchis pa yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /klu rnams kyis ni

yongs bskor cing / /klu rnams kyis ni mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis

mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /

bdag la dge bas gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan

pa/ /mya ngan 'das la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar nub kyi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /gang na byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /dga' zhing lhun chen blta mdzes

dang / /gang na mi rnams tshe lo ni/ /brgya phrag bcu pa skye 'gyur zhing / /de dag mi rmo mi 'debs la/ /gshol yang 'cha' bar mi bgyid cing / /tshe ring mdog dang ldan pa dang / /nges par yongs su spyod bgyid cing / /zas su sa lu kha dog dang / /dri dang ro

dang ldan pa dang / /dri bda' me tog tshogs 'dra zhing / /lha yi bdud rtsi 'dra ba 'tshal/ /na li ke ra bskol bgyis nas/ /tshod mar de 'tshal sran tshod min/ /gang na me lce'i rtse 'dra ba'i/ /sman dag 'khrung bar 'gyur ba yi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong

bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs bskor cing / /gnod sbyin rnams

kyis mdun gyis bltas/ /de la bu ni mang mchis te/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed pa/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub lags/ /de dag rnams

kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sangs rgyas nyi ma'i gnyen mthong nas/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal zhes/ /mi yis phyag bgyis khyod la ni/ /rgyang ring gnas shing phyag 'tshal lags/ /bdag la dge bas

gzigs su gsol/ /khyod la mi min phyag 'tshal ba/ /de skad yang dang yang du thos/ /de slad bdag ni 'di skad ces/ /'dren pa rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /gau tam rgyal la phyag 'tshol cig /sangs rgyas rig dang zhabs ldan pa/ /mya ngan 'das

la phyag 'tshol mchi/ /de ltar byang gi phyogs de ni/ /bzang ba lags zhes skye bo mchi/ /phyogs de mngon par skyong bgyid pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa lags/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub

phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag gi mngag gzhug pa/ /gnod sbyin 'dod

dgur mchi ba rnams/ /de dag glang po che 'tshal zhing / /phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyu/ /de dag ni chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma

la 'tshal zhing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /glang po che gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /chibs rta dang / rnga mo dang / khyu mchog dang / ma he dang / ra dang / lug dang / sbrul dang / bya dang / skyes pa

pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / gzhon nu ma gcig gis shing rta drangs shing phyogs phyogs dag tu yang mchi lags so/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin 'dod dgur mchi ba rnams/ /gzhon pa de dag 'tshal nas ni/ /

phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar bgyid/ /rgyal po dag ni grong khyer dag /sna tshogs mkha' la rgyu ba mchis/ /'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / sa la kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang / gar bcas sa steng kun tu rgyu ba dang /

sbubs can dang / grong khyer sbubs can zhes bgyi ba dag lags so/ /byang phyogs na mtsho ka pi bang ka zhes bgyi ba yang mchis lags so/ /nub phyogs na grong khyer sar pa gser ldan dang / gos can dang / gos mchog can dang / pad ma

can dang / pad ma bzang po can dang / sa gzhi can zhes bgyi ba dag mchis lags so/ /chab rgyun mang po'i gnas gyur pa/ /'dzin pa zhes bgyi'i mtsho mchis te/ /chab rgyun tha dad de las 'byung / /de las dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ /btsun

pa grong khyer u sha ra'i sbubs kyi pha rol na/ lus gnas dang ni gnas yangs dang / /de bas gnas yangs rgyun lugs can/ /rgyun lugs mang dang de bas mang / /bar snang mkha' la bya ltar gda'/ /btsun pa grong khyer sbubs can gyi

pha rol byang phyogs na mdun sa bya gar can zhes bgyi ba yang mchis te/ der ni gnod sbyin rnams 'du zhing gnas lags so/ /rkang mi sdug la mchu 'phyang dang / /'jigs rung lto spu can dag mchis/ /de na ljon shing 'bras bu rtag /

rma bya khrung khrung sgra snyan dang / /khu byug sgra skad chen po dang / /shang shang te'u dag sgra 'byin cing / /rma bya rnams kyi sgra dag dang / /gau kum b+ha ba dang chun lag dang / /bya rnams sna tshogs skad 'byin cing / /me tog sbrang rtsi'i ro la dga'/ /

lus ngan po de glu gar gyis/ /pad ma can dang lhan cig rtse/ /btsun pa grong khyer lcang lo can gyi pha rol na rgyal po dpa' bo zhes bgyi ba yul 'khor mu khyud na mchis lags so/ /bdag gang na mchis pa'i mdun sa de ni mkhyu

mchog can zhes bgyi ste/ bdag gi ming ni rnam thos kyi bu zhes bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ i li mi li/ kid Ti mU le/ hi li kid Ti mU le/ hu du me/

hu dur du me/ gau ri/ gan d+ha ri/ go to ha ni/ o ke mo ke swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis dri za rnams dang / dri za chen po rnams dang / dri za'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod

par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ 'dod myos dga' bas myos pa dang / /glu yis myos pa spun dang ni/ /phreng bas myos dang sbrang rtsis myos/ /me tog myos pa spun rnams dang / /rtag tu myos dang dpal gyis myos/ /nor gyis myos

dang dga' byed dang / /uta dpal zla ba pad ma dang / /lnga 'dzin dang ni khu byug sgra/ /tum bu ru dang gtsug lnga dang / /gser spyod bu mo gser can dang / /pa ba sangs dang phur bu dag /'gro gnas ji snyed rgyal po lags/ /de dag ni bdag

gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag dri za 'di bdag la 'tshe'o/ /dri za 'di dag ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i dri za dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i dri za yis/ /legs par

smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ kun tu le/ e hi e hi/ sa d+ha ma

ra ti ki/ sa d+ha b+han Di ni ke/ tiSh+Tha duSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang

mthun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te dri za 'am/ dri za mo dang / dri za rgan po 'am/ dri za

rgan mo 'am/ dri za'i bu pho 'am/ dri za'i bu mo 'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho 'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ dri za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi

zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ dri za rnams kyi dri za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza
ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu

ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te sha za 'am/ sha za mo 'am/ sha za rgan po 'am/

sha za rgan mo 'am/ sha za'i bu pho 'am/ sha za'i bu mo 'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho 'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ sha za'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig

nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ sha za rnams kyi sha za 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo

ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ hu me hu me/ hu mi le/ hu mi lA/ ba tI ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag

gis grul bum rnams dang / grul bum chen po rnams dang / grul bum gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ byin dang nye byin kri mi sha /rtsib logs che dang gsus po che/ /

lag bcu dang ni sa la rgyu/ /g.yon phyogs nag po dmar po dang / /sprin mdog dang ni dri med dang / /rna ba ring dang 'brug sgra sgrogs/ /ral pa can dang stobs bcu dang / /srid sgrub dang ni 'dod dgur mchi/ /'jog po dang ni bya ba

sbed/ /la ba bzang ldan gsum po dang / /tshon kun dang ni mi bkra bo/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag grul bum 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /grul bum 'di ni bdag mi gtong

ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i grul bum dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i grul bum gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka'i yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la

gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ si re bi si re/ si re bi sa re/ si re bi sa re/ kriSh+Na tsha ga li/ ka rA Di ping ga le swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen

ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te grul bum 'am/

grul bum mo 'am/ grul bum rgan po 'am/ grul bum rgan mo 'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo 'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor pho'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo 'am/ grul bum gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ grul bum gyi

mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ grul bum rnams kyi grul bum 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud

cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen

ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te yi dags sam/ yi dags

mo 'am/ yi dags rgan po 'am/ yi dags rgan mo 'am/ yi dags kyi bu po 'am/ yi dags kyi bu mo 'am/ yi dags kyi 'khor po 'am/ yi dags kyi 'khor mo 'am/ yi dags kyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ yi dags kyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar

bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ yi dags rnams kyi yi dags 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang

lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ yu me yu me/ yu mi le/ yu mi lA ba ti ye swA hA/

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis klu rnams dang / klu chen po rnams dang / klu'i sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta ste/ dga' dang nye dga' kun dga' dang / /nor rgyas
