dang ni 'dzam bu bzang / /ser po dang ni zho rna dang / /dbang po'i lag dang bkra shis dang / /mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ /rab grol dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag /ngos yangs po dang ngos bkra dang / /yangs pa can dang bkra 'dud rgyal/ /gdengs ka che dang

skar dga' dang / /nag po che dang lag 'gro dang / /ra skyong dang ni 'jog po dang / /g.yon phyogs de bzhin nag po dang / /sngo bsangs dkar dang 'grogs pa ni/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la

bdag klu 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /klu 'di ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i klu dag dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i klu rnams kyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog

pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi li bi tsi le/ tsi le bi tsi le/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ mA ta~M gi/ tsaN Da li swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos

dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung

mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ klu rgan po 'am/ klu rgan mo 'am/ klu'i bu po 'am/ klu'i bu mo 'am/ klu'i 'khor po 'am/ klu'i 'khor mo 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ klu'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar

bgyid pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ klu rnams kyi klu 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang

gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun

tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te lus srul po 'am/ lus srul mo 'am/ lus srul
po rgan po 'am/ lus srul po rgan mo 'am/ lus srul po'i bu po 'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho 'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo 'am/ lus srul po'i mngag gzhug pa 'am/ lus srul po'i

mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ lus srul po rnams kyi lus srul po 'du ba'i nang du

mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ A be/ ba ha ne/

ba ha na ba te ye swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag gis gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon rnams dang / dmag dpon rnams kyi ming brjod par bgyi lags so/ /'di lta

ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /ba ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /stobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / /seng ldeng

pa dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin bskyong 'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /

'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro gnas ji snyed mchis pa lags/ /de dag ni bdag gi spun lags te/ de dag la bdag gnod sbyin 'di ni bdag la 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di dag ni bdag mi gtong ngo zhes mchi zhing de dag la go bar

bgyid lags so/ /bdag la 'tshe ba'i gnod sbyin dang / /bdag mi gtong ba'i gnod sbyin gyis/ /legs par smras pa 'di thos na/ /ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin/ /de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /

tad+ya thA/ hi le mi le/ hi li mi li/ kIrti mU le/ hi li kIrti mU le/ o tum be tum be/ o tum ba tum be/ o g+he mo g+he/ go do hi/ b+h+ring gA re ri Shi sat+ya me swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge

bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/

gal te gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan pho 'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo 'am/

gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/

gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

kyi nyan thos dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma lags pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di

nyid rgya cher lung mnos shing 'don par bgyid pa de la/ gal te srin po 'am/ srin mo 'am/ srin po rgan po 'am/ srin po rgan mo 'am/ srin po'i bu pho 'am/ srin po'i bu mo 'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho 'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo 'am/ srin po'i

mngag gzhug pa 'am/ srin po'i mngag gzhug ma 'tshe bar bgyid pa/ glags lta zhing glags tshol ba la la zhig nye bar mchi zhing nye bar 'greng ngam/ nye bar mchis par gyur na/ glags mi rnyed cing gnas mi rnyed la/ srin po rnams

kyi srin po 'du ba'i nang du mchir mi chud cing / rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du yang gnas mi 'thob ste/ de'i mgo ardza ka yi dog pa bzhin tshal pa bdun du 'gas lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /

tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ hu lu hu lu/ yu me yu mi le/ yu mI lA ba tI ye swA hA/ zhes rgya cher smras nas/ nga'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag khyod kyis 'di ltar bdag nyid bsrung

ba dang / bskyab pa dang / bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi ma yin pa gdug pa gnyug mar gnas pa mngon par ma dad pa dag mngon par dad par bya ba dang / mngon par dad pa rnams kyang phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir kun tu

rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo/ rig sngags dang / srung ba dang / sug pa rkang pa la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba 'di nyid long shig /zung shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal

nas/ dge slong de dag yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bar sdom ni/ i/ ku/ hu/ si/ yu/ tsi/ A/ hi/ hi/ gsang sngags kyi tshig rnam pa dgu smos pa dang go rims bzhin du sbyar ro/ /mdo chen

po kun tu rgyu ba dang kun tu rgyu ba ma yin pa dang 'thun pa'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
phab pa/ / rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa mA dza sU tran nA ma ma hA sU tra~M/ bod skad du/ mdo chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su

thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang

ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen

bkur byed do/ /de nas tshangs ris kyi lha tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa bzhi zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni shAkya rnams kyi ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal na/ dge slong lnga brgya

thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs

gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun la mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi gtam ston par mdzad de/ de'i tshe na phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag nas dbang che bar grags pa

dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dag lhags nas bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed kyis bdag cag kyang song la bcom ldan 'das la re re nas tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/ /

de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las brkum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das

kyi spyan sngar lhags te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas tshangs ris kyi lha gcig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dus pa che la gzhol ba yi/ /lha tshogs kun nas lhags gyur pas/ /gzhan gyis mi thub dge 'dun la/ /blta ba'i

slad du bdag cag mchis/ /tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ drang por gyur pa'i sems kyis ni/ /'di na dge slong rab brtson pa/ /kha lo ba ltar mig blangs shing / /dbang po rnams ni legs sdom bgyid/ /

tshangs ris kyi lha gsum pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dbang phur 'od pa 'obs 'dra ba'i/ /phur bu rab bcom bkrir mi tshugs/ /de dag sred bral dag spyod cing / /'dren pas glang po gzhon ltar btul/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi

pas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs mchi ba/ /de dag ngan 'gror mi mchi zhing / /mi lus spangs par gyur nas kyang / /lha yi lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /tshangs ris kyi lha bzhi po dag gis de skad ces gsol nas de nyid

na bag bcum ste 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor thams cad la rnam par gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams kyi 'dus pa 'di ni che ba yin no/ /dge slong dag kye ma lha rnams

kyi 'dus pa 'di ni shin tu che ba yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga'i lha

rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang 'di lta

ste/ dper na da ltar nga'i lha rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po 'di kho na lta bu dag 'du bar 'gyur ro/ /dge slong dag lha rnams kyi ming dag brjod par byas/ lha rnams kyi ming dag zung shig /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas

pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ /sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /kun nas 'dus par gyur pa ni/ /spu dag zing zhes byed pa yin/ /gang dag sa la gnas pa dang / /gang dag ri khrod gnas pa rnams/ /seng ge bzhin du tha dad la/ /

sems bsdus mnyam par bzhag byas shing / /kun nas 'dus gyur spu zing zhes/ /byed pa bdag gis brjod par bya/ /yid byang dag cing rab dang la/ /rnyog med 'chi bdag spangs pa rnams/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mthar thug pa'i/ /lha dang

mi yi bar na 'khod/ /slob pa lnga brgya phrag gnyis dang / /gzhan yang brgya dang bcu dag dang / /stong phrag du ma rnams dag gi/ lha rnams 'dus par gyur pa dag /mtha' nas mtha' ma mi mthong zhing / /phyogs rnams thams cad khyab gyur pa/ /

sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la dge slong dag /lha tshogs mngon par lhags gyur gyis/ /nges par rtogs shes bka'

stsal pa/ /tshigs su bcad pas mthar chags kyis/ /de dag rnams kyi ming brjod kyis/ /rtse gcig gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nga yis bshad pa mnyan par gyis/ /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal gyis/ /gnod sbyin stong phrag bdun po dag /

ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag

'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gser can stong phrag drug po kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang

ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs rnam rgyal tshal gyi ni/ /ri mnyam stong phrag

gsum po dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par bzhugs/ /de ltar stong phrag bcu drug kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /

de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin chu srin rgyal po'i khab/ /yangs pa la ni

rtag gnas shing / /brgya stong phrag ni mang po yi/ /gnod sbyin bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /kun gyi bshes gnyen lnga brgya dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po kun gyi lha/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de gnyis kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /dri za'i bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni yul 'khor

srung zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /da yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal

zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /

gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lho phyogs

mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /grul bum bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i

nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag

ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /nub phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /klu yi bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni mig mi bzang

zhes bgyi/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal

zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi

thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /

byang phyogs mngon par skyong byed pa/ /rgyal chen grags dang ldan pa ni/ /gnod sbyin bdag po rgyal po ste/ /ming ni lus ngan po zhes bya/ /de ni nye du lhan cig tu/ /glu dang gar gyis rtag tu rtse/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang

'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de la bu ni mang yod de/ /brgyad bcu dang ni bcu dang

gcig /de dag ming 'thun grags pa ni/ /dbang po zhes bgyi stobs po che/ /lha dang lha min g.yul 'gyed par/ /kun tu gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od

dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /

byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po de bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs po che/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul

ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /de dag gi ni khol po rnams/ /mchod rten mang la gnas bcas pa/ /slu byed g.yon can sgyu ma can/ /

sgyu ma shes dang rnam shes dang / /ngan spong khro gnyer lhan cig tu/ /de tshe rdzu 'phrul ston cing lhags/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon dang / dmag dpon 'di dag kyang der kun nas lhags te 'di lta ste/ dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / /ba ra dwa

dza skye dgu'i bdag /dbang ldan tsan dan 'dod gtso dang / /mgrin ngan dang ni mgul nges dang / /spobs ldan nor bu nor spyod dang / /sgra rab dang ni nye lnga dang / /ri mnyam gser can gang po dang / /seng ldeng ba dang g.yon can dang / /gnod sbyin ba skyong

'brog gnas dang / /rgyal ba khyu mchog mi'i rgyal po/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /lcags mdung ring dang ma ldan dang / /tshig lnga ser po yid dga' dang / /gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas/ /'bras bu gsum dang mgul gsum pa/ /'gro

gnas ji snyed yod pa yin/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par

lhags/ /lhan cig 'byung ba'i klu dang ni/ /'jog po dang ni yangs pa 'ang 'ongs/ /la ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dag /srung byed 'gro dang lhan cig lhags/ /klu bdag bran bzang bu dang ni/ /yul 'khor srung dang glang po che/ /'jigs

byed che dang sa srung bu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i klu yang 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /

'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /gang zhig klu rgyal zil mnan len/ /stobs ldan mig rnon 'dab chags bya/ /de min 'dab bzang khra bo yang / /mkha' las tshal du mngon par 'ongs/ /de tshe klu rgyal mi 'jigs byin/ /ston pas 'dab

bzang bde mdzad cing / /gsung 'jam brjod pa de nyid la/ /sangs rgyas skyabs su nye bar song / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lag na rdo rjes pham byas shing / /rgya mtshor rten pa'i lha min rnams/ /thams cad nor lhas skrag gyur cing / /mtsho la skyabs su 'du shes pa/ /thags bzangs ris dang rab bkra dang / /

rab sim byed dang btang bzang dang / /stobs ldan bu ni brgyad po kun/ /rnam snang byed pa'i bu rnams dang / /stobs ldan sde dang sgra gcan bzang / /dpa' chen khyod kyi dus lags zhes/ /dge slong 'dus pa'i nags tshal du/ /go cha bgos te lhags

pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /

chu lha mo dang bu mo dang / /zla ba mo yang phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /mdza' bshes ma dang chu lha can/ /lha mo grags ldan nyid kyang 'ongs/ /sa dang chu dang rlung gi dang / /mi yi lha mo 'ang 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs

ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /khyab 'jug lha dang gshol can lha/ /mtshe ma gnyis kyang lhags par gyur/ /zla la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis/ /zla ba nyid ni mdun du bdar/ /nyi la gnas pa'i lha

rnams kyis/ /nyi ma nyid kyang mdun bdar cing / /char pa 'bebs par byed pa dag /rgyu skar rnams kyis mdun bdar lags/ /thams cad bzang po rdo rje can/ /brgya byin khyer 'jig 'ongs gyur te/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /

kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /

dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha mo tshogs can ma dang ni/ /me lce'i rtse 'dra 'chi ltas can/ /zhi ba mo dang dka' zlog ma/ /me tog gos can 'ongs gyur cing / /rgyu ba mo dang mtshan chings bzang / /

'chi med rnam pa du ma dang / /gang zhig phyogs su char 'bebs pa/ /'dod lha'i dbyangs can ma yang 'ongs/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te

'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par

zhugs/ /sngo bsangs sngo bsangs chen mo dang / /mi 'dra mi 'dra dam pa dang / /rtsed mos myos dang de bzhin du/ /yid 'khrug ma yang 'ongs gyur cing / /phag mo phag mo chen mo dang / /slong ma des ma lhan cig lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs

bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od

dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dkar mo rgyags byed snying rje dang / /gos sngon mo yang 'ongs gyur cing / /skra dkar mo la sogs pa dang / /

gos ser mo yang 'ongs par gyur/ /'phrog ma rtag tu myos pa dang / /spel ma rnam pa du ma dang / /dag pa dang ni 'od can ma/ /lha mo grags ldan rnams kyang lhags/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser

skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag

'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /bde byed dga' ldan 'thab bral dang / /nag po btab pa du ma dang / /lum bi ni dang lum bi mchog /skar ma zhes bya legs smon dang / /'phrul dga' rnams dang de bzhin du/ /dbang

sgyur rnams kyang lhags par gyur/ /bcu tshan tshogs bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus

par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /lha tshogs drug bcu de dag kun/ /kha dog sna tshogs ldan pa dag /

ser skya'i gnas kyi nags tshal ni/ /snang bar byas te 'khod pa dang / /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong

rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong dag gi/ tshangs pa chen po zhes bya ba/ /kun 'gyed gzhon nu skar rgyal de/ /so sor dbang sgyur dbang phyug bcu/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de dag dang / /

lhan cig 'grogs te der lhags pa/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de dag kyang ni 'dus par lhags/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal

du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang sgyur byed pa'i 'phrog ma mo/ /kha dog gzugs mchog ldan pa yang / /bu rnams kyis ni yongs bskor cing / /de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'ongs/ /gang dag de yi 'khor rnams dang / /de yang 'dus pa'i

nang du 'ongs/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags ldan rnams/ /dge slong rnams la phyag 'tshal zhing / /'dus pa'i tshal du mngon par zhugs/ /dbang por bcas dang dbang ldan bcas/ /skye dgu'i bdag dang bcas

pa yi/ /lha rnams de dag der lhags shing / /dge slong rnams kyang der lhags so/ /nag pos smras pa'i tshig la ltos/ /'dod chags kyis ni 'di zung la/ /bcing ba gyis dang khyed la legs/ /'di dag kun nas yongs bsdus la/ /

'di dag gson por ma btang zhes/ /de na nag po sde bo che/ /sde rnams la ni skul byed cing / /khros shing rang dbang med gyur nas/ /rang yang mngon par zhugs gyur te/ /lags pas sa la brdabs nas ni/ /shin tu 'jigs pa'i

sgra phyung ste/ /ji nas lha yis sprin phreng dang / /glog dang bcas pa'i char yang phab/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni de mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas rnam gzigs te/ /de nas ston pas bstan dga' ba'i/ /nyan thos rnams la

dge slong dag /bdud sde mngon par lhags gyur gyis/ /mngon par rtogs zhes bka' stsal pa/ /brtson par byed pa de dag gis/ /sangs rgyas gsungs pa thos nas ni/ /de dag spu yang mi g.yo bas/ /de dag chags bral yin par rtogs/ /

rgyal sras nyan thos de dag ni/ /slob ma rnams dang lhan cig dga'/ /de dag g.yul las rnam rgyal zhing / /'jigs bral grags dang ldan pa yin/ /bar gyi sdom ni/ bdun stong gser can ri mnyam dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin chu

srin dang / /kun gyi bshes dang rgyal po rnams/ /de bzhin khol po gnod sbyin dang / /klu dang mdab bzangs lha min dang / /chu lha mo dang khyab 'jug dang / /tshogs can ma dang sngo bsangs dang / /dkar mo bde byed dbang phyug dang / /kun bgyed

gzhon dang 'phrog ma dang / /dbang bcas bdud dang dge slong ngo / /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha shin tu dbang che bar grags pa rnams mdo sde bstan pas yi rangs par gyur nas de'i tshe tshig 'di dag gis 'dus pa chen po'i mdo bshad do/ /bcom

ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang tshig 'di dag gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par bsnyad par bgyi zhing / yang dag par brjod par bgyi lags so/ /de la gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ te dze te dza ba ti/ tsid tre tsid tra

ba ti/ la te la ta ba ti/ kha me kha ma ba ti/ k+She me k+She ma ba ti/ b+ha dre b+ha dra ba ti/ ya she ya sha ba ti/ dU te dU ta ba ti/ tsa pa le tsa pa la ba ti/ kha tse kha tsa ba ti ti/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig

rnams lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag rmongs pa ma mchis par 'dzin par bgyid na de ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /

'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la bro nad thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog pa der dge bar 'gyur zhing / de dag la dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/ /

ji tsam 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'bab par 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung ser 'bab par yang 'gyur/ 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad thams cad la byab par bgyis sam/ chab la bzlas brjod bgyis

te stsal na/ des de'i bro nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma dag ma gtogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyi rig sngags kyang

'di lags la/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo yang 'di dag lags so/ /'di ni 'dir mdo sde yongs su 'dzin par bgyid lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ b+ha le b+ha la ma le/ dur du le/ hi me/ phub phi se/ kA tsA k+Shi ku tse sI/ ma mi nI She re tho ra Ni

pa ma phi pam po Ti ste ke/ ta ra ke/ gu ru ga ro/ gug gu mi Ti ta re/ rak+Sha sU tra ma nu pa la ya tha/ 'di ni bdag cag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo lags te/ gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur

ma gyur par 'dzin tam/ klog par bgyid na de la mi dang mi ma lags pa dag mchi bar mi 'gyur zhing gdug pa yang mi mchi sbrul yang mi mchi/ dug kyang mi mchi la/ de'i lus la gnod pa dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po

thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'byung po thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par yang 'gyur lags so/ /gang klog par bgyid pa dang / gang nyan par bgyid pa de la dgung lo bdun du srung ba bgyis par

'gyur lags so/ /chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du stsal na/ de'i bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dod pa'i bdag po thams cad kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das

'di ni bdag cag gi yul yang lags te/ mdo sde 'di yongs su gzung ba'i rig sngags ni 'di lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ lin te/ li pe/ lo pe/ li pe/ ba~M ke ka me/ kA tse kA tsa k+Shi/ ka tsa bi~M ga le/ du me du me du me/ ta Te tad tra Te/ tra trA k+Shi/

ko la/ ko li/ ki ka ko li ke/ sA d+hU/ sU tra ma nu mA la ya tha/ ud grih+Na tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang / mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang ma nyams par bzung ste/

srung bar bgyid na de ni thams cad las bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /ji tsam 'tshal ba de tsam gyi dgung char 'bab par yang 'gyur 'chad par yang 'gyur/ dgung

ser 'babs par yang 'gyur 'chad par yang 'gyur lags so/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las yongs su thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'byin par yang 'gyur lags so/ /chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te gtor tam 'tshal du

stsal na des bro nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang de bzhin du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid cing / 'dod

pa na spyod pa'i lha gong ma rnams kyis ni rjes su yi rang bar bgyis la/ 'og ma rnams kyis kyang legs par rjes su yi rang bar bgyis pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bI re bI ra ba ti/ to Te to Ta ba ti/ b+ha dri b+ha dra ba ti/ go ne go na ba ti/ me g+he me g+ha ba ti/ dz+wa la ne dz+wa la na ba ti/ b+hu te

b+hu ta ba ti/ kho ra te kho ra ta ba ti/ i dan sU tra ma nu graN+ha tha/ a nu pa la ya tha tse ti/ bcom ldan 'das gang zhig mdo sde 'di dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dum bur ma gyur par 'dzin par bgyid na/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du

'byung po thams cad las srung bar bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /de la mi dang mi ma lags pa 'ga' yang 'tshe bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog pa der ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung ba bgyid par 'gyur lags so/ /sems

can thams cad kyang dga' bar 'gyur lags so/ /de la zil gyis gnon pa 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de'i lus la bro nad rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur lags so/ /sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs par

yang 'gyur lags so/ /gang du klog par 'gyur ba der dgung lo bdun du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang gdon rnams las thar bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /dug 'joms par yang 'gyur lags so/ /bro nad thams cad sel

bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /skud pa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam gtor na bro nad thams cad dang bral bar yang 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po

chen po bzhi'i rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin cing grub par bgyid pa lags so/ /rnam thos kyi bus gsol pa/ tad+ya thA/ ku re ku ra NI/ mo re mo ra NI/ kA tse kA tsa NI/ kri mi kri mi NI/ yul 'khor srung gis gsol pa/ pu re

po re pu ra tI/ ho re ho ra NI/ pra ho ra ho ra Ni/ 'phags skyes pos gsol pa/ ke she ke sha ba ti/ ke sha ni ma ke/ sha The ti The ba ti/ mi ri ti/ mig mi bzang gis gsol pa/ tsakre/ tsakri ni/ tsakra bA gi ni/ b+hi ti rirmi ni/ shi mi shi mi sham ne ti/

bcom ldan 'das gang zhig rgyal po chen po bzhis brjod pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga zhib mo 'di bzhi dang mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur pa dang / ma bkol bar legs par bzung ste srung bar bgyid na de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur

lags so/ /de la 'byung po thams cad dang bro nad thams cad kyang slar mi ldog par 'gyur lags so/ /gdug pas zin pa dang / dug thams cad las kyang thar bar 'gyur lags so/ /skud pa 'am chab la bzlas brjod bgyis te bcings sam/

gtor cing 'tshal du stsal na cho ga des de la 'grub par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha ma yin dang / rlung lhas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig sngags 'di yang mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa

lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ ga le ga ga ga le/ ga la ga ni/ khi ni khi ni/ g+hu Shu/ g+hu Shu g+hu g+hu Shu/ kha ne kha khe ne/ kha na kha ni/ lu pe lu pi/ lu pa lu pe ti/ bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags 'di dag dang mdo sde 'di dum bur ma gyur cing ma bkol

bar bzung na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srung bar 'gyur lags so/ /de'i bro nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur lags so/ /lus la dug gis mi tshugs par yang 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnas gtsang ma'i ris

kyi lha rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa mdo sde 'di'i dgongs pa yongs su gzung ba'i slad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas lhags pa rnams kyis rig sngags dag smras lags na/ bcom ldan 'das

nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang yang dag par rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing kun tu bzung ba dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag legs par bshad du gsol/ de ltar na rigs kyi bu de dag gi sbyin par bgyi ba'i chos kyi mdo sde 'di 'bras bu dang

bcas par 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gsang sngags kun tu bzung ba 'di ni grub pa yin te/ nga nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas kyang mdo sde 'di'i grub pa dang bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bshad

par byas/ de nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin lags te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas pas mdo chen po 'di grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa

dag bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di grub par bya ba'i phyir bsrung ba dang bsgrub pa dag bka' stsal pa/ de la rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /tA la tA la/ tA na tA la/ ta to ta le ma te/ lan

cig phyir 'ong ba'i rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /sa le sa sa li ti/ phyir mi 'ong ba rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /la te la te lo la ti/ dgra bcom pa rnams kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /d+hu pu d+hu pu/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ka tsa bi ka tsi ka tsa bi

ka tsa ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grub pa ni 'di yin no/ /d+ha me d+hu me/ d+ha se d+ha se/ d+ha so d+ha se/ d+ha re d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ro d+hid d+hi ti/ de la bsrung ba ni 'di yin no/ /tin ti ri/ tsi rak+Sha/ bi ga la k+Shi rak+Sha/ mtshams gcad pa ni 'di yin no/ /

bad d+ha/ bad d+ho ti bad d+ha/ si ri mi ti bad d+ha/ g+hu She bad d+ha/ g+hu g+hu she bad d+ha/ g+hu Sha ga She ya ma bad d+ha b+hi/ bsgrub pa ni 'di yin no/ /pi khe sA d+ha ya/ tu tu le sA d+ha ye ti/ zhag gsum bsnyung ba byas pas tshes bcwa lnga'i nyin par

gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang mdo sde 'dis bcom ldan 'das la mchod par byas te/ kha shar phyogs su bltas la bsrung ba lan brgya brjod par bya zhing / bzlas brjod lan brgya byas la mdud pa re re la brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bsrung ba byas pa yin zhing /

lan gsum spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu gnyis la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas la skud pa de lag tu blangs te bzlas shing mtshams gcad par bya

ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te mtshams gcod par byed na lan bdun spu zing zhes byed par yang 'gyur ro/ /lho phyogs nas lce spyang mos lan gsum sgra phyung ste 'dug par gyur na de nas mtshams gcad par shes

par bya'o/ /des de bzhin du smyung ba byas te/ tshes bcwa lnga'i nyin par khrus byas la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te skud pa blangs la/ nyan thos kyi tshig rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi cho ga zhib mos lan bdun bzlas te/ bzlas

brjod lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod cing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas la/ skud pa lag tu blangs te rig sngags thams cad lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing sgrub pa byas na char pa chen po dang rlung chen po yang 'byung ste/ mtshams kyi phyi rol du

ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur la skad cig gis 'chad par yang 'gyur te lan bdun gyi bar du yang brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha'i bu sprin chen zhes bya ba dang sprin bzangs shes bya ba gnyis 'ongs te/ de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

zhing grub pa sbyin pa dang / rjes su yi rang bar yang 'gyur ro/ /de la grub pa ni 'di dag yin te/ ku tsu ku tsa zhes bya'o/ /sprin bzangs kyi ni 'di yin te/ ka ra ka ra ka ra ra zhes bya'o/ /tshig 'di dag dang / skud pa lag tu blangs pas

mdo sde dang / gsang sngags rnams bsams na gang bya bar 'dod pa de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi mdo sde dang / rig sngags 'di dag thams cad kyis chu 'am/ skud pa la bzlas na gang byed par mi 'gyur

ba de med de/ las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bdag dang gzhan dag bsrung ba'i phyir mdo sde 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag yi rangs te/

bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la 'khod pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed cing / /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /mdo chen po

'dus pa chen po'i mdo zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ // /

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA me g+ha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sprin chen po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga'i

gnas na nor bu rin po che'i dpal gyi snying po sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po'i tshogs chen po 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye

dga' dang / rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / gzi can dang / chu lha dang / 'jog po dang / yul 'khor srung dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / klu'i rgyal po btang bzung dang / sa srung gi bu dang / mdongs bu dang / dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / dpal bzang dang / glog

gi phreng ba dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / gtsug na nor bu thogs dang / snang ldan gtsug phud can dang / gtsug phud 'ja' can dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / dbang po'i mchod sdong dang / 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis ldan dang /

dkyil 'khor chen po can dang / lag gis 'gro chen po dang / skar mdog dang / zla ba'i gzi brjid dang / dpal gyi blo gros dang / zla mthong dang / klu'i rgyal po legs mthong dang / shin tu brtan pa dang / mgul na nor bu dang / sprin byung dang / char rgyun

dang / rab 'joms dang / rnam par 'joms dang / mthu bsgyings dang / gdengs ka chen po dang / dbyangs zab dang / klu'i rgyal po cher sgrogs dang / rnam par sgra 'byin dang / ud dpal dang / rtsal chen dang / gshol mda' 'dzin dang / sna tshogs sde dang / zhags pa

chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang / kun tu snang dang / rna rtsub dang / dung dang / dar dar dang / klu'i rgyal po u pa dar dar dang / bde byed dang / lag 'gro dang / lag 'gro chen po dang / dri ma chen po dang / 'phur lding dang / sog ma med dang / 'phyang ba dang /

srin bu gnas dang / nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po dbang po sde dang / 'dam bu dang / nye ba'i 'dam bu dang / dung thogs dang / 'gro lding dang / rab mdzes dang / glang chen rna dang / rnon po dang / ser skya dang / glog 'bar dang / glog 'od chen po dang / stobs lha dang / chu

stobs dang / klu'i rgyal po dam pa 'gebs dang / bdud rtsi can dang / mu stegs can dang / bai d+'ur+ya'i 'od can dang / gser mdog sgra dang / gser 'od dang / zla ba'i rgyal mtshan 'od dang / nyi 'od dang / 'char ba dang / bal glang mgo dang / klu'i rgyal po dkar po dang /

nag po dang / gshin rje dang / dge tshul dang / sbal pa dang / ngang pa'i gzi brjid dang / mu khyud 'dzin dang / sa 'dzin dang / mgo stong can dang / gtsug na nor bu dang / klu'i rgyal po don yod mthong dang / sprin chen dang / sde bzang dang / sa skyong dang / mis byin dang /

rnam par dul dang / dga' ba 'byung dang / chu srin kum b+hi ra'i gdong dang / dug 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po myur gdug dang / pad ma ka dang / mjug ma dang / rab 'phyang dang / 'jigs byed dang / gzi brjid mdzes dang / mgo lnga po dang / bal li ra dang /

shing rtas rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po bla ma dang / klu'i rgyal po mjug rings dang / mgo bo che dang / bim pi ka dang / bi ta ra dang / mgyogs 'gro dang / klu'i rgyal po mgo gsum pa dang / klu sde dang / gzi chen dang / 'dam bu byin dang / klu'i rgyal po skrag byed

dang / 'od 'bar dang / mgo bdun pa dang / stong chen dang / mthong dga' dang / rab tu cher gtum dang / dri med gzi brjid dang / mig bzang dang / drag po chen po dang / 'od 'phro phung po dang / klu'i rgyal po gtum po dang / khro bo drag shul can dang /

rin chen chu sbyin dang / chu srin sprin chen po dang / dbang po'i 'od dang / rkang pas 'thung dang / sprin zla dang / rgya mtsho'i sprin dang / me tog dri chen dang / ku mu da'i 'byung gnas dang / klu'i rgyal po rin chen mig dang / tog chen po'i rgyal

mtshan dang / sprin chen snying po dang / kha ba can dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / sprin mthu can dang / mtshan mo 'dzin dang / chu sbyin dang / chu sbyin chen po dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi brjid me 'dra dang / sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / khro med dang / sa'i bum pa

dang / klu dpal dang / chu 'dzin dang / sprin gdugs dang / ing gi ra'i gdong dang / gzi brjid can dang / sprin las mngon byung dang / klu'i rgyal po gom stabs mtha' yas dang / cha byad mdzes dang / lus chen dang / spyang lto dang / zhi ba dang / dpa' ba dang /

gser ngad can dang / mchog tu brtson dang / dug can dang / dbyangs snyan dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud rtsi snying po dang / rab tu char 'bebs chen po dang / rnam par g.yo dang / 'khrugs sgra dang / rnga sgra dang / bdud rtsi'i rgyun dang / dga' bar byed pa dang / 'brug

sgrogs dang / dpa' sde dang / sred med kyi bu dang / rgya mtsho'i klong dang / klu'i rgyal po yon po dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po de dag la sogs pa klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi dag 'dus te 'khod pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe

klu'i rgyal po de dag 'khor dang bcas te stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bla ma la gus pa dang / phu dud chen po

byed pas/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dar gyi lda ldi dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs dang / rin po che'i me tog

dang / rin po che'i lda ldi dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / klu'i me tog dang / mu tig gi dra ba mchog tu mdzes pa rnam pa sna tshogs dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag /bcom ldan 'das la phul nas bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs

gcig tu 'dug nas smon lam rnams btab pa/ lus rgya mtsho'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten

gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho thams cad dang / sa dang / chu dang me dang / rlung thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams dang / gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams las rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la yang lus kyi sprin rgya mtsho bgrang ba'i rgya mtsho

thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa las yang dag par 'das pa dag dang / lus re re la yang lag pa rgya mtsho'i sprin phyogs kun gyi rgyun tu mngon par

phyogs pa dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi cha re re las kyang mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho phyogs kun gyi gzhi rgyas par 'gengs pa ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad la mchod pa bya'o snyam pa 'di lta ste/ kun tu spyod pa'i lus rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis

brlabs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang 'od zer stug po dang nyi ma dang zla ba thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng

ba dang me tog gi rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi snang ba chen po'i snying po khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / phye ma dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / bdug pa thams cad kyi

gzugs kun tu ston pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra thams cad sgrogs pa'i rol mo'i sgra rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ de la

sogs pa mchod pa thams cad kyi sprin rgya mtsho dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa/ ma 'dres pa rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar

bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yul thams cad du bkod pa rnam par snang bar byas pa'i snying po can gyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams

cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /thams cad kun du snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i char 'bab pa bkod pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba dang ldan pa

sangs rgyas la nges par gyur pa'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu sgras 'gengs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo rin po che 'od zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi

sprul pa snang bar byed pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma 'dres pa rnams su bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od 'phro ba sgron ma sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad kyi rjes su

'jug pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal med khang snang ba kun tu ston pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad

kyi rdul la dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku snang ba rnam par snang bar byed pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti

stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi khang pa brtsegs pa ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po kha dog mtha' yas pa thams cad

kyis rab tu brgyan pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i sgron ma dang / spos kyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig thams cad kyis rnam par spras pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang / me tog thams cad kyi ze ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba mtha' yas pas legs par brgyan pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas phyogs bcu kun tu 'od

zer snang ba'i snying po can bkod pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyis rab tu brgyan pa bkod pa du ma kun tu ston pa khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod

pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgo kun tu me tog gi rta babs dril bu'i dra ba dpyangs pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs

te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /gser dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi tshong tshong dang phreng ba dang / rin po che'i mgul gdub kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri

rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog snang ba ltar sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil dang 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i

sgron ma'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che snang gsal rgyal mtshan gyi pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po ches brgyan pa'i pad ma sna tshogs kyi snying

po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil mdzes par 'bar ba'i 'od zer ldan gyi pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / 'od zer 'bar ba zad mi shes pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po

can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar bar thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'bar ba mchog dam pa thams cad byung ba'i pad ma'i snying po can

gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung sgra'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / nor bu sna tshogs thams cad kyi shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgo lo ma las thal mo sbyar ba'i sprin 'byung ba'i spos kyi shing

ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / shing ljon pa thams cad kyi gzugs mtha' yas pa bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi sprin rab tu 'phyang ba'i shing ljon pa lta bu rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod

pa thams cad 'byung ba'i mdzod mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi dkyil rnam par snang bar byed pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lus phyed

tsan dan thams cad kyi phye mar kun tu ston pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po thams cad kyi bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'od can gyi shing ljon pa'i rin po che'i gos thams cad kyi mdzod nyi ma ltar snang bar

byas pa dang ldan pa'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sgra dbyangs thams cad sgrogs pa yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kun tu gtong ba'i shing ljon pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng

ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun tu mngon par phyogs pa'i nor bu'i rgyal po snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho

sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i phreng ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / kun nas sgra rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'byung ba'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang spos dang me tog dang

pad ma thams cad kyi phreng ba rin po che'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdan bkod pa kun tu ston pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams

cad kyi phreng ba rab tu spyangs pa'i rta babs stegs bus rab tu brgyan pa rin po che'i sprin gyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu rin po che'i yal ga dang phye ma'i mdzod yod pa'i sdong po thams cad kyi snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya

mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba kun nas rgyan nyi ma snang bar byed pa'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang

byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi gzhal med khang rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / an da rnyil gyi ze ba can gyi me tog bkod pa thams

cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos dang / nor bu thams cad kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i sgron ma'i gzugs kyi bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par ston par snang ba'i dbyangs kyi nor bu'i rgyal po bla

re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu sna tshogs kyi gos bkod pa thams cad snang ba kun tu ston pa'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog thams cad kyi chu bo 'bar bar snang ba'i rin po che'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / dril bu sna tshogs kyi sgras kun tu

rgyas par 'gengs pa'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / pad ma 'bar ba kha dog mtha' yas pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i nor bu'i snying po can gyi pad ma'i dra ba'i bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gser gyi dra ba can gyi 'od zer snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi

bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'i 'od mtha' yas pa bkod pa thams cad kyi rgyan bla re rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs te sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang

chen mtsho sprin rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis nam mkha'i dkyil kun tu khebs par byin gyis brlabs la/ rin po che

bcu'i 'od snang ba bkod pa'i me tog gi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig kha dog mtha' yas pa'i mdzod kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje'i sgo'i sgra'i nor bu'i rgyal po'i

gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba'i phreng ba'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che rdul kun tu snang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i dril bu'i dra ba spyangs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu thams cad

kyi sdong po yal ga'i rgyan gyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma rnam par snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba'i nor bu'i rgyal po dang spos dang bdug pa thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma'i mdzod kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i

gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po snang bar byed pa'i kun tu bkod pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gdugs rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /

ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che thams cad snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / me tog gi sprin snang bar byed pa'i 'od

kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar gtogs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang kun nas sgo sangs rgyas kyi yul sgrogs pa rin po che'i yal ga'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bai d+'ur+ya dang / rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu rin po che'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang / sems can gyi gzugs mtha' yas pa dag sems kyi skad cig la kun tu ston pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam las byung ba yid du 'ong ba'i sgra rab tu 'byin pa dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho

sprin rnams dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can 'dul ba'i dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri

mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /nor bu thams cad kyi mdzod kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos sgrogs pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer rgya mtsho

sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rdul gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa sgrogs pa can gyi 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams

dang / rin po che mi zad pa thams cad bstan pa dang me tog thams cad kyi ze ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / khri bstan bkod pa thams cad kun tu ston pa'i 'od zer rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'

rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /rin po che'i 'od 'phro ba'i kha dog mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams dang / kun tu 'od kyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing rgya chen po bkod pa snang bar byed pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / bkod pa thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / sangs

rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi ze ba'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / gos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa'i spyod pa

dbyangs can nor bu'i rgyal po'i 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / mu tig gi sgron ma thams cad kyi 'od 'phro ba rgya mtsho sprin ma 'dres pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho sprin thams cad la sti

stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /spos dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgya mtsho sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang / rin po che 'od 'phro ba thams cad kyi pad mo'i dra ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu

rin po che kha dog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog dang ldan pa'i mu tig gi mdzod rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / rin po che dang / spos dang / tsan dan thams cad kyi phye ma rgya mtsho sprin

rnams dang / rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nor bu'i rgyal po yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa mdzes pa'i dbyangs can rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyi nor bu'i tshogs kyi phreng ba rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang /

rin po che'i mdzod mtha' yas pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams dang / thams cad kun tu bzang po'i lus ma 'dres pa rgya mtsho sprin rnams sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang chen mtsho'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho thams cad la sti stang du bya'o/ /bla mar bya'o/ /ri mor

bya'o/ /mchod par bya'o/ /zhes de lta bu'i smon lam btab nas/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gis yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rang rang gi stan la 'khod

do/ /de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i smon lam gyi stobs can g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /

phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'ongs so/ /de nas klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po stan las langs te/

bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan

pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems

rangs par bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar

na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur/ rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags

tshal thams cad 'khrung bar 'gyur/ 'bru thams cad skye bar 'gyur/ bcud thams cad yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

klu'i bdag po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zhugs te/

de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /klu'i bdag po chos gcig dang ldan na klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal

rgyun chad par 'gyur bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byams pa'o/ /klu'i bdag po byams pa de la gnas pa'i lha dang mi rnams ni mes mi tshig /mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chus mi khyer/ dug gis mi tshugs/ pha rol

gyi dmag tshogs kyis zil gyis mi non/ bde bar gnyid kyis ldog par 'gyur/ bde bar sad par 'gyur/ rang gi bsod nams kyis yongs su bsungs bar 'gyur/ bsod nams chen po'i gzi brjid kyis gzi can du 'gyur/ lha dang bcas

pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur/ mdzes pa dang mthong na dga' bar 'gyur/ 'gro ba thams cad du thags thogs med par 'gyur/ sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad pa dang / rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/ bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang /

mi'i chos bla ma rtogs nas lus zhig pa'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po lha dang mi byams pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phan yon 'di dag go/ klu'i bdag po de bas na byams pa'i lus kyi las dang / byams pa'i ngag

gi las dang / byams pa'i yid kyi las kyis gnas par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ des klu thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed bde ba thams cad

sbyin par byed de/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs par byed rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang nags tshal dang lo tog thams cad skye bar byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la bde ba thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs gang zhe na/

tad+ya thA/ d+hA ra NI d+hA ra NI/ ud tA ra ni/ sam pra tiSh+Thi te/ bi dza ya brna/ sat+ya pra tid nya sa ra ha/ dz+nyA na ba ti/ ud de pA da ni bi nA ma ni/ a b+hi she tsa ni/ a b+hi byA hA ra/ shu b+ha ba ti/ a dzi ma tu/ e hi kum ba la ni/ ba ha hA ra klai shA na/

d+hu na pA pam/ sho d+ha ya margA na/ ni ra ti ka /d+harma ta shud d+ha/ lo ka bi ti mi ra ra tsa sa/ duHkha sha ma na sarba bud d+ha a ba lo ka na a d+hiSh+ThI te/ pradz+nyA dz+nyA na b+he swA hA/ klu'i bdag po gzungs kyi tshig don thams cad sgrub par byed pa chos

kyi sku la 'jug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa bde ba thams cad sbyin pa 'di dag gzung bar bya brjod par bya'o/ /klu'i bdag po gzhan yang sprin gyi rigs las 'byung ba'i byin gyi brlabs bkod pa gzi brjid kyi snying po

sprul pa snang bar byed pa/ ye shes kyi tog gi chu'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor dpal dang ldan pa gser gyi 'od zer rnam par snang bar byed pa/ skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gcig las byung ba'i rus dang rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan gzung

bar bya yid la bya'o/ /de dag gis klu thams cad dang / klu'i rigs thams cad dang / klu'i rus thams cad dang / klu'i cho rigs thams cad dang / klu'i 'byung ba thams cad dang / klu'i skye gnas thams cad dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad dang / klu'i bu mo

thams cad dang / klu'i g.yog thams cad kyi klu'i sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun gcod par byed pa bde ba'i yo byad thams cad sgrub par byed do/ /klu'i bdag po de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad snying po can gyi sprin chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa klu'i rigs las byung ba'i sprin gyis rnam par mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa sprin gyi chu 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal ldan sprin gyi gzi brjid la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'byung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

klung gi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i glog

'bar ba'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen mthu rtsal dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin mdzes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud

chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen seng

ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen gdugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blta sdug sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen pos khebs

pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin las byung ba snang bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu mtho 'gebs rnga'i sgra dbyangs shin tu rab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen

bsil 'byung mi dga' rab 'joms sgra zab sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i chu sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rtsal gyi sprin ltar dpa' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen kun du ston la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa sprin rgya chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'dzag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par sgrogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa sprin ltar 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin lta bu'i na bza' banabs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyis lo tog skyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi gnas la gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa char sprin gyi sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin 'du bar mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin rnam par rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen ud pa la la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen spos kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen 'od mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i sprin lta bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin ltar rnam par 'joms pa la phyag

'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi chu ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin sdud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang lce 'bab pa rnam

par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po ltar nam mkha' mtho nas bsgrags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen sgra 'byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen char bu skyes la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa snyems pa'i gzi brjid sgrub pa'i sprin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ro bro ba drug dang ldan ba'i chu chen po'i sprin

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chu 'thor sprin chen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen rgya mtsho 'gengs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

char mi 'bab pa na sprin gyis kun tu 'gebs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gzugs mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin

chen po thams cad rnam par sgrub pa 'dzam bu'i sprin gyi dpal gyi gzi brjid 'od mdzad pa sprin gyi 'od zer can rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /klu'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod pas klu thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun 'chad

pa dang / bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dus dus su char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa dang rtswa dang shing gel pa dang / sman dang nags tshal dang / lo tog thams cad skyed par byed do de nas bcom ldan 'das la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i klu'i bdag po

g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal pos gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char mi 'bab pa'i tshe gang dag brjod na char gyi rgyun chen

po 'bab par bgyid pa dang / mi bzad pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / chos ma lags pas skye bo 'thab pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang gnod pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / nad dang 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dang / skar ma ma rungs

pa gnas pa'i dus kyi tshe dang / yams kyi nad dang 'tshe ba dang gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa dang / de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags gzhi rnams bshad du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis brlab par gsol/ gang

dag klu thams cad la skul ma 'debs par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ba dang /

gnod pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid pa dang / rgyu skar ma rungs pas bgyis pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis char pa'i bar chad lnga gsungs pa gang lags pa de

dag thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char pa'i rgyun legs par 'bab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams bcom ldan 'das mchog tu thugs rje dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la phan par

thugs brtse ba dang ldan pas bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po g.yog mtha' yas rgya mtsho sprin bkod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dkyil

'khor gdugs lta bu'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /klu'i bdag po khyod sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa legs so legs so/ /klu'i bdag po de'i phyir legs

par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / snying rje chen po las byung ba 'brug chen po'i sgra can bsgyings pa dpa' bo'i tog ces bya ba'i gzungs sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa byin

gyis brlabs pa rjes su yi rang ba bshad par bya ste/ de ni char med pa'i tshe char 'bab par byed/ char ches pa gcod/ 'chi ba'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed/ klu thams cad skul bar byed/ lha thams cad sim par byed/ bdud thams cad rnam par

'joms par byed/ sems can thams cad bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed do/ /tad+ya thA/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ a ba b+ha sa ni/ shri te dzo lag sma dri Ta bi kra ma/ badzra sang ha ta ne/ pa ra ma pi rA dza/ nirma la gu Na ke/ tu sUr+ya pra b+he/ bi ma lAng ga yaSh+Ti/

b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam b+ha ra sam b+ha ra/ du dum bu/ ha na ha na/ ma hA pra b+he bi d+hU ta ma hA mo hA a d+ha ka re/ pradz+nyA gra shud d+he/ pa ri pU ra Na mai tre/ mai tri bi ra ma na skan d+ha/ mai tre ma bud d+ha re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa lAm bud d+ha re/ bo d+h+yang ga ru su me da sha

ba le/ tsa tur bai shA ra d+ye/ aSh+Ta da sha a be ni ka bud d+ha d+harme/ shu b+ha ma ti/ puN+ya rA shi/ shukla d+harma sa ma ni ti/ gam b+hi re/ gam b+hi re/ bi rA dza ske/ bi ma lo/ bi she Sha/ prA ba te/ ni rA sra ba d+harme/ sarba lo ka dz+yes+tha dz+yes+tha/

pa ra pra pa re/ a nud ta re/ a sang ge/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ shAn ta ma te/ shan ta pa te/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ba ra ma bud d+hA nu mi te/ ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi te swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang

mdzad ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char dbab pa'i phyir klu thams cad kyi snying po brjod par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub

sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas char pa'i bar chad byed pa lnga bsal bar bya'o/ /s+yAd ya the dan sa ra sa ra/ si ri si ri/ su ru su ru/ nA gA nAn/ dza ba dza ba/ dzi bi dzi bi/ dzu bu dzu bu/ klu chen po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas kyi bden

pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig /tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ tsu ru tsu ru/ klu'i bdag po chen po dag tshur sheg /kye klu chen po dag sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig /ba ra ba ra/ bi ri bi ri/ bu ru bu ru/

sangs rgyas kyi bden pas klu thams cad dgug par bya'o/ /byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje'i sems dang / dga' ba'i sems dang / btang snyoms kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs dang /

bden pa dang bsam pa chen pos klu'i bdag po dag tshur sheg /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams dran par gyis shig /b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ chu chen po'i chu dang sprin gyi chu

'chang ba can lag gis 'gro ba chen po'i g.yog rnams byams pa'i sems kyis tshur sheg /ston pa'i bstan pa dam pa dran par gyis shig /g+ha Da g+ha Da/ g+hi Di g+hi Di/ g+hu Du g+hu Du/ drag shul can khro ba shugs chen po dang ldan pa dug

chen po'i lce 'byin pa rnams byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa tshur sheg /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig swA hA/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ti Ti ti Ti/ tu Tu tu Tu/ nor bu chen po'i cod pan thogs pa

dang ldan pa sbrul gdug pa'i gzugs can rnams dkon mchog gsum gyi byin gyi brlabs dran par gyis la rdo rje 'chang gi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char phob shig swA hA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ ku lu ku lu/ chu chen po la gnas pa

dang ldan pa sprin chen po brtsegs pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas mngon par 'gro ba rnams tshur sheg /byams pa'i sems kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun thong shig /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin

gyis brlabs kyis lag na rdo rjes bsgo ba/ ra la ra la/ ri li ri li/ ru lu ru lu/ lag gi 'gro thams cad khyed rnams gnyid med par dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bden pas/ g+ha ma g+ha ma/ g+hi mi g+hi mi/ g+hu mu g+hu mu swA hA/

klu thams cad dgug go/ /byams pa'i sems kyis byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro bas/ na ra na ra/ ni ri ni ri/ nu ru nu ru swA hA/ yon po sna tshogs su gyur pa'i mgo stong pa mgo dang mig dmar ba stobs che ba'i lto 'phye chen po rnams dgug

par bya'o/ /kye kye lag gis 'gro chen po dag mchog tu thugs rje can bsod nams thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis brjid pa nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs dran par gyis shig /ga Da ga Da/ gu Di

gi Di/ gu Du gu Du swA hA/ stobs dang pha rol gnod pa dang gzi brjid thogs pa med pa dang ldan pa dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun rnams phob shig /sha ra sha ra/ shi ri shi ri/ shu ru shu ru swA hA/ kye kye klu chen po rnams rang rang gi

rigs dang cho rigs dran par gyis la/ ma shol bar lha thams cad kyi bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char gyi rgyun phob shig swA hA/ tshangs pa'i bden pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu

phob shig swA hA/ brgya byin gyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag brgyad pa'i bden

pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po

dag phyir mi 'ong ba'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag dgra bcom pa'i bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag rang sangs rgyas kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob

shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bden pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ klu chen po dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bden pa dang byin gyi brlabs kyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ lha

thams cad kyi bden pas gnod pa thams cad zhi bar gyis shig swA hA/ klu thams cad kyi bden pas sa chen po 'dir char rab tu phob shig swA hA/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bden pas sems can thams cad srungs shig swA hA/ dri za thams cad kyi bden pas mi
