dran pa dang ldan pas gzung bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha d+ha ra/ kha ra kha ra/ ma hA kha ra/ ma hA ba le/ ba la nA sha nI/ god Ta nI/ kud Ta nI/ kud Ta nI/ sam hA re/ kud Ta daMSh+Te/ ka kha kha re/ ma kud ta d+he re Ni/ mu lug ka /k+She ni ka kai nI ke/ sa me rma sha ni/ ki ni/

gi ri ni/ b+ho gis ri/ sa sA be ta da/ ku mA ra ka /kri ti swA si/ ki na na bi bud d+ha si/ bi bud d+h+ya/ bi bud d+h+ya gri hAn b+he/ kri ta b+hai ra ba/ bi kri ta b+hai ra ba/ ma hA ba ye+e/ k+ni twan/ ha ra si/ ki na na mA ra ya si/ kin na sarba de ba nA ga ya k+Sha/ gan d+har b+ha/ a

su ra/ sarba a su ra/ sarba b+ha ya sha man/ maM sa ra swA hA/ kun dga' bo rig sngags 'di sbyin sreg gam/ skud pas bcings na 'dod pa'i mthar gtogs pa thams cad 'jig par byed/ ltung bar byed/ za bar byed do/ /kun dga' bo ro langs

thams cad rengs par byed pa'i rig sngags zung shig /tad+ya thA/ sa me le/ ma hA ha ha le/ ha ra d+ha re/ g+ho ra d+ha re/ d+ha rad ti/ rid ti/ bi rod ti/ ku Nad ti/ ku ta ni/ sang go tsa ni/ ka tsa ri/ kha tsa ri/ ma ra ne/ hu hu/ ma re ne/ ma hA mA la d+ha re/

na yo na ma ti swA hA/ kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dmod pa drag po dang mtshungs shing 'dra ste/ 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshig pa'i phyir bal gtsang ma'i skud pa la lan nyi shu rtsa bzhir bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa nyi shu

rtsa bzhi bor na log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag zung shig /legs par rab tu gzung bar gyis shig /kun dga' bo gsang sngags 'di gang yang rung bas gzung bar mi nus so/ /

kun dga' bo de lta bas na legs par gzung bar gyis shig /tad+ya thA/ tsad tsa ra/ tsad tsa ra/ ma hA tsad tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri/ bu ru bu ru/ ma hA bu ru/ sam b+ha le/ ma hA sam b+ha le/ ma hA ba le swA hA/ kun dga' bo lha dang bcas/

bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / skye dgun bcas pa'i 'jig rten na gang zhig gsang sngags 'di la mi spro ba ni ngas rjes su ma mthong ste/ srung ba dang / rjes su 'brang ba yin no/ /gsang sngags

'di ni mi bzad pa ste/ sreg par byed/ 'tshed par byed/ 'ching bar byed/ 'joms par byed/ 'bar bar byed pa yin te/ rig sngags lan drug bcu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa drug bcu rtsa gcig bor na sdig pa thams cad rab

tu zhi bar byed/ rig sngags gcod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das legs so/ /legs par bzung lags so/ /mdud pa dor du gsol/ phyag rgya

gzhag par mdzad du gsol/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir/ tad+ya thA/ b+ha b+ha re/ b+ha re/ b+ha ra ni he ra pra ha re/ ha ra ni/ ku tha ni ta Ti/ lid tshad da ti/ tshangs pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /dbang phyug chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcad

do/ /khyab 'jug gis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /brgya byin gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /zla ba dang nyi

mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gza' dang nyi mas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gza' dang rgyu skar gyis byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phyogs nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /phyogs mtshams nas byas pa'i rig

sngags bcad do/ /steng nas byas pa dang 'og nas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /lhas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /klus byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /gnod sbyin gyis byas pa dang / nam mkha' lding gis byas pa'i rig sngags

gcad do/ /grul bum gyis byas pa dang / tshor ba pas byas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gdol pas byas pa dang / kla klo dang / ri khrod pas byas pa dang /

seng ge dang / sbrul gyis byas pa dang / 'gro lding ba'i yid kyis byas pa dang / g.yung pos byas pa dang / to sa la pas byas pa dang / mud ga ri khrod pas byas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rig sngags 'chang bas byas pa'i rig sngags gcad do/ /

tad+ya thA/ ga ga gA ra li phu/ ma hA ga ga gA ra li phu/ bi she phu/ sha ba ra sid d+he phu/ tsaN dA li phu/ ma hA tsaN dA li phu/ tso gi phu/ tsi mi re phu/ tsi tsi mi re phu/ tsakre phu/ tsakra dA re phu/ kri sh+ne phu/ kri sh+ne ru pe phu/ tsan de phu/ so ge phu/ pan tsa pa lI phu/ pan tsa li phu/ b+hi me phu/

b+hi pA pa le phu/ ping ge le phu/ ping ga la a k+She phu/ a nan te phu/ sa man ti phu/ nA sha nI phu/ tshe da ni phu/ bid tshe da ni phu swA hA/ kri sa ni/ bak+Sha ni/ mA ra ni/ pin da ni/ bin d+ya nan/ bak+Sha ni/ nA shA ni/ khAd d+ya ka nan/ gA la b+hi nA shA nI/ dA hA ma si/ b+hasma/ b+hasma ni

ma sa ni/ ban d+ha ni swA hA/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni mtshan mo gzi brjid 'phrog par byed pa'o/ /kun dga' bo nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe ro langs chen po gnod byed ces bya ba zhig yod de/ de ston gyi

dus kyi tshe nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi rjes su zhugs nas/ gang 'od zer de dag gis gang la reg pa 'od zer gyi dra bas reg nas rims su 'gyur te de yang gcad do/ /kun dga' bo ro langs kha gcig pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu

bar bya'o/ /klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin ces bya ba yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdu bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad dang / yi dags dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ nam mkha' lding yang 'di nyid kyi nang du

bsdus/ nor 'dzin yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ rlung lha yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ sgyu ma len gyi bu ba ro ba Ti shi rud dro yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus/ phung po 'dzin dang / mdung thung 'dzin kyang de bzhin du bsdus/ de bzhin du blon

po dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa yang 'di nyid kyi nang du bsdus so/ /kun nas dpag tshad brgya dag tu/ /nga yis chad pa dag byas pas/ /nga la 'byung pos byar ci yod/ /nga yis sdang ba thams cad bcom/ /gsod par gyur pa stobs

po che/ /ro langs dag gis byar ci yod/ /de dag kyang ni nga'i zhags pas/ /kun nas yongs su bskor ba yin/ /zhags pa kun gyis de dag kyang / /rmugs shing shin tu rmongs par byas/ /'di yis bdag gis kun 'grub cing / /

gsang sngags tshig rnams grub gyur cig /na ma sid d+ha nAn/ sid d+h+yan tu man tra pA da swa stir me sarba satwA nan tsa swA hA/ sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi stobs gang dang / /dam pa'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis/ /

bde legs su ni rab gyur cig /'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi gzi yis rtag tu 'jigs pa thams cad la swA hA/ cho ga ni lan drug bcu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ kai me ru dang / bal gtsang ma la sogs pa'i skud pa dmar po la mdud pa dor ro/ /

de bzhin du/ byab pa yang bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad dang / rjed byed dang / sems rnam par g.yeng byed la sogs pa dang / dug byin pa dang / dug byas pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi rnams la kun tu 'gro ba grub pa'i mchog yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa ro langs bdun pa zhes

bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud d+ha sing ha dang / ban de ye shes snying po'i sdes bsgyur/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+ya ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ga Na pa ti hri da ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po'o/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/

bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la la tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'dzin na de'i las thams cad grub par 'gyur ro/ /de bzung bas dgongs pa 'grub cing gsang sngags thams cad kyang dngos grub

tu 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ na mostu te ma hA ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ oM ka Ta ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ da ra da ra/ bi da ra/ bi da ra/ ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ d+hA ba d+hA ba/ b+ha~M dza b+ha~M dza/ sta~M b+ha sta~M b+ha/ dza~M b+ha dza~M b+ha/ mo ha mo ha/ de hi de hi/ dA pa ya dA pa ya/

d+hA na d+hA n+ya sid d+hi~M me pra yats+tsha sa ma ya ma nu sma ra ma hA ru tra ba tsa nI ye swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM tu ru tu ru swA hA/ oM mu ru mu ru swA hA/ pA pa shAn+ti ba su puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ ang gu ta bin du k+Shu b+hi ta tsi ta ma hA bi dA raH sa ma gats+tsha ti

ma hA ba ya/ ma hA ba la/ ma hA ba ra kra/ ma hA hasti/ ma hA dak+Shi Ni ya pra tsi da ya mi swA hA/ oM ku ru ku ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ oM ga ga ga ga ga ga ga gaH/ oM na mo na ma swA hA/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig tshogs kyi bdag po tshogs kyi dbang phyug gi snying po 'di rtsom zhing gsang sngags sgrub pa/ dkon mchog gsum mchod du yul gzhan

du 'gro 'am/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'jug na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la me tog dang bdug pas mchod pa byas te/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po 'di bklags na las thams cad 'grub kyis 'di la the tshom ma za zhig /

'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / khrag khrug dang / yul 'khrugs pa thams cad kyi nang du yang dran par byas na thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas tshig tu bton na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gnod

sbyin dang / srin po dang / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis mdangs 'phrog par mi 'gyur zhing thag ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /
lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa tshogs kyi bdag po'i snying po rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kA la nA ma d+ha ra NI/ bod skad du/ dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa

dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i gdan la bdud btul te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na/ byang chub kyi shing drung la bzhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su lha'i sde dpon chen po tshogs

kyi bdag po ma hA kA la 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug la dbang bsgyur ba dpal mgon po nag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa

bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rig pa 'di 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol/ oM shrI ma hA kA la g+ha Na g+ha Na Ti swA hA/ na maHshrI ma hA kA la ga Ni gu ti shwa ya/ na mo yo ke na Ni na/ tad+ya thA/ o~M` hi le hi le/ ki te ke te ni/ tsid de tsid de ni swA hA/

'di bton pas nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nyes par bsgoms pa thams cad dang / nyes par bltas pa rnams steng du gzhan 'phrul dbang

byed la thug pa man chad bcing ngo / /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug pa yan chad bcing ngo / /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing ngo / /gzhan yang gtsug lag khang dang dkyil 'khor gyi srung ma/ dug gsum nad kyi sman

pa/ rig 'dzin yongs kyi srog shing / rnal 'byor gyi dgra bla/ bdud 'dul rnams kyi dbang phyug /srin po lang ka pu ri'i grong khyer gtan nas rlog pa/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo nam mkha'i glog ma sprin rdul du rlog pa/
dkon mchog gsum gyi bstan pa srung bar khas blangs shing dam bcas pa'o/ /'phags pa dpal mgon po nag po zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims

nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nag po chen po skyes bu nag ser mche ba rnon po/ mche ba chen po rims nad thams cad las thar bar byed pa brjod

par bya ste/ phyogs gang dang gang du bltas pa der bdag la rims nad med par gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na rA dza d+hu te na/ da ha da ha rA dza d+hu te na/ pa tsa pa tsa rA dza d+hu te na/ ba hu pa shra be/ ba hu pa re pa rA+e/ ba hu pa ri sho d+he i ma~M dzA ra tsaN Da

la~M ha na ha na/ oM su~M b+ha/ ni su~M b+ha/ shi ra mu~M tsa/ tsak+Shu mu~M tsa/ shro tra mu~M tsa/ g+h+rA Na mu~M tsa/ dzi hwA mu~M tsa/ kaN Tha mu~M tsa/ grI ba mu~M tsa/ priSh+Tha mu~M tsa/ kA Ti kA mu~M tsa/ ku k+Sha mu~M tsa/ U ru mu~M tsa/ dza nau mu~M tsa/ hasta mu~M tsa/ pA dau mu~M tsa/ a~M gu li mu~M tsa/ a~M ga pra t+ya~M

ga mu~M tsa/ a ba sa ra/ a n+ya si ma~M gats+tsha/ dza ra mu to si bdag la swA hA/ o~M` dz+wa la mA a~M gu li hU~M/ sarba dzA rA nan phaT/ 'phags pa nag po chen po'i gzungs rims nad thams cad las rnam par thar bar byed pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
@/ /rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // @/ /rgya gar skad du/ de be ma hA kA li nA ma d+hA ra
NI/ bod skad du/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par

sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa zhig na byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs so/ /de nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ bdud kyi yum/ gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te
phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo nag mo chen mos gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ba'i rig pa 'di 'bul na/ bdag gi de bcom ldan 'das kyis

bzhes su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bdud kyi yum gshin rje'i lcam mo lha mo nag mo chen mos steng du ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la thug pa man chad bcing bar bya'o/ /'og tu ni sems can dmyal ba la thug

pa yan chad bcing bar bya'o/ /thad ka kho ra khor yug tu ni ri la thug pa tshun chad bcing bar bya'o/ /de'i sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas par bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ o~M` ru ru b+hi tiSh+Tha bud d+ho si ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ 'di bton

pas rims dang / nad dang / mi ngas dang / nyes pa thams cad dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro swA hA/ lha mo nag mo chen mo'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //

// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI de bi kA lI nA ma aSh+Ta sha ta ka / bod skad du/ dpal lha mo nag mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis

thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bden pa'i mtshan rnams ston par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo yang

bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /

bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' srin mo'i cha lugs kyis 'jig rten pa'i don mdzad pa'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge brtson 'grus la
dgongs nas dpal lha mo nag mo la gzigs te 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /thos bsam bsgom la cher gnas pa'i/ /rgyu 'bras rkyen gyi bdag nyid can/ /'gro la phan mdzad mkhas pa'i mchog /dpal ldan lha mo nag

mo 'phags/ /byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ /sa ltar rten pa'i gzhir gyur pa/ /yon tan sdud byed chu dang 'dra/ /byang chub smin byed me lta bu/ /dge ba'i 'du byed rlung ltar g.yo/ /shes rab rnam dag nam mkha' ste/ /

khyod ni 'byung ba chen po 'dra/ /'byung po phal chen rnams kyis bstod/ /bsod nams ye shes rab bsags pa'i/ /las dang rnam smin dag la mkhas/ /nga rgyal gzugs kyis 'dul ba goms/ /shes rab snying rje'i lam du 'gro/ /

khyod ni bum pa bzang lta bu/ /dper na yid bzhin nor bu'i chu/ /kun la phan pa'i dpag bsam shing / /nyi ma 'dra bar khyod la gsal/ /zla ltar gsal ba'i thugs mnga' zhing / /ming ni ri bong rwa dang 'dra/ /rang gi rgyud ni 'khor lo

'dra/ /u dum ba ltar khyod dkon yang / /bdud rtsi lta bur yongs tshim mdzad/ /'gro ba kun gyi bdag mo lags/ /rang bzhin med pa'i chos kyang ston/ /chu dang nam mkha'i tshub ma ltar/ /gdul bya'i srid gsum cis kyang 'dul/ /

dus gsum rgyal ba'i bstan pa skyong / /dam pa rnams dang yang dag gcig /dam pa rnams kyi lam du 'gro/ /lha mo ma mo gnod sbyin mo/ /srin mo klu mo sha za mo/ /gdug mo 'byung mo grul bum mo/ /drag mo rngam tshul glog 'gyu

ma/ /rlung mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma/ /mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhing sgrol ma/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang drag pos 'dul/ /dkar ser ljang nag dmar yang ston/ /rnam pa brgyad kyi dbyibs kyang 'byung / /'gro ba drug po'i tshul yang ston/ /

phung po lnga yang brjod par nus/ /dbang po tshim byed yul lnga 'ang ston/ /rten cing 'brel pa'i spyod pa mkhas/ /yul can rnams ni gsod la mkhas/ /de bzhin ngag rnams gsod pa dang / /lus can rnams ni gsod la brtson/ /
sems ni gsod pa med la mkhas/ /'khor ba las ni ring du song / /de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan te/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong mdzad dpal ldan ma/ /dam chos

'dzin pa rnams la byams/ /o~M` AHhU~M/ shrI de bi kA li sa ma ya dza/ DA kI nI DA ya sa ma ya swA hA/ ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/ /yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad kyang thob/ /dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur/ /yi dags

gnas su mi skye zhing / /byol song skye bas thogs med 'gyur/ /lus 'phags gnas su skyes pa na/ /thog la sogs pa mi 'bab cing / /sgra mi snyan du rlung gis min/ /de bzhin ban glang spyod du yang / /chu dang rlabs kyis

khyer mi nus/ /'dzam bu'i gling du gang skyes pa/ /sna tshogs gnod pas nyen mi 'gyur/ /'dod pa'i lha rnams gnas su yang / /skyes nas chos la dga' bar 'gyur/ /bsam gtan bzhi yi skye gnas su/ /tshad med bzhi
ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /gzugs med gnas ni bzhi por yang / /don med na ni mi skye ste/ /'du shes med par nam yang min/ /'phags pa bzhugs pa'i gnas rnams su/ /khams gsum tshul gyis bdag don spyod/ /

rtag tu yul la chags mi 'gyur/ /sems la 'dzin par mi byed de/ /nyon mongs rtsa ba drug po dang / /de bzhin nye ba nyi shu dang / /mtshams med lnga yang byang bar 'gyur/ /bskal pa grangs med mang por yang / /mi khom brgyad du skye

mi 'gyur/ /mu stegs rtsod pa bzlog pa dang / /mthu stobs phun sum tshogs ldan zhing / /tshe ring nad med dpal dang ldan/ /sdug med bskal pa mang por yang / /nam yang 'khor bar mi ltung zhing / /mya ngan 'das pa thob bya'i phyir/ /

nyan thos sa rnams non pa dang / /rten 'brel bcu gnyis shes par bya/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni/ /rab dga' dri med 'od ces 'phro/ /sbyang dka' mngon gyur ring du song / /mi g.yo legs pa chos kyi sprin/ /sangs rgyas

sa chen bla na med/ /bcu gnyis po yang thob 'gyur te/ /kun tu 'od dang bdud rtsi 'od/ /nam mkha'i 'od dang rdo rje'i 'od/ /rin chen 'od dang pad ma'i 'od/ /las kyi 'od dang dpe med sa/ /dpal ldan sa dang shes rab 'od/ /thams

cad mkhyen dang rang rig ste/ /bcu gnyis sangs rgyas sa rnams kyang / /'di tshe byung na myur du thob/ /sa rnams ma thob bar du yang / /'gro ba rnams la phan pa dang / /shes rab snying rje ldan gyur cing / /chos la dga' ba rnams kyis

srungs/ /dngos grub thob ste de bzhin gshegs/ /rin chen las byung thob par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan byang chub sems dpa' dang / /dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi/ /ming brgya rtsa brgyad gang 'dzin pa/ /yon tan brgya rtsa brgyad thob ste/ /

sku gsung thugs ni grub nas kyang / /khams gsum chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur zhes gsungs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag dang / dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do/ /dpal lha mo nag mo chen mo'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa yon tan dang bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //

lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstod pa/ dus gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po dang / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum gyi rgyus/ /sdig smin las grub lha dang lha ma yin/ /dmyal tshogs me ltar 'bar ba'i gnas 'di
ru/ /sha khrag dmar la rol pa'i lha mo khyod/ /lha yi g.yul ngo rgyal bar zhal 'ches la/ /lha ma yin gyi dpung rnams brlag par mdzod/ /ces bstod do/ /rdzogs s+ho// //

nad kyi bdag mo la bstod pa/ til mar gyis bskus lan bu gcig pa ro nye'i sna chas sgeg cing cha lugs ma lus 'chang / /rgyan du rkang sgrog lcags las byas pa gcig gis rang gi rkang pa mdzes par byas pa ste/

gcer bu bong bu zhon cing 'gro ba 'di na rgyu ba de ni lha mo khyod nyid kyis/ /bdag nyid mdzes par shes kyi gzhan lta khyod kyi spyod pa mtsho chen don dag su zhig shes/ /'khor ba 'jig pa'i tshe na mi rus dag las khrag dang zhag

'dzag dud pa 'thul ba na/ /lha mo mche ba mi bzad khyod kyi zhal du 'gro kun skad cig tsam gyis zhugs par gyur/ /nag mo mi thod thogs pa khyod ni rnal 'byor grub pa'i spyod yul can te dur khrod dgyes/ /khyod ni g.yo can

mnan zhing nad dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs sel zhi la mi bzad dril yang sgrogs/ /khyod ni dpa' bo dag gi mgo bo cod pan legs spras g.yul du mtshon gyis bcad pa yi/ /phreng ba thogs shing gar byed lag pa mnyen brkyang rkub tshos che la klu

dbang gshigs pa yis/ /ska rags 'ching zhing lag na mdung dang ral gri thogs la khrag gi chang gis myos gyur pa/ /mig rtsa dmar por gyur cing mtshan mo dur khrod 'gro ba 'byung po phal chen rnams kyis mthong / /ko rlon sar pas

dril te brgyang ba'i gos kyis snam phyi phyed g.yogs phyed ni re ldes dkris/ /mi yi rgyu ma sar pa'i sbubs kyis zhal gyi zla ba brgyan cing dril bu 'gram par 'dril/ /lus ni snum gyis gsar du byugs shing khrag dang zhag mang 'dzag pa'i thig

les tshom bur bris/ /mi ro'i sha la so yis chem chem gcod byed thod pa can ni bdag la skyong gyur cig /drag pa'i drag mo mi bzad mi sha kha na thogs pa snga na ma byung khyod mthong na/ /ma mo rnams kyang skrag cing rtabs la rngam pa 'thon

cing mig rtsa rig rig khyod la 'dud/ /nag mo bzang mo lus mdog gnag cing bzod par dka' ba khyod la brgya byin la sogs kyang / /nyin gcig bzhin du bstod par byed cing gshin rje nyid kyang 'dar bzhin rtag tu 'dud par byed/ /mi rnams

dang ni 'gro ba ma lus pa dag mjug btul bas ni rna ba ya gcig la/ /brang gis 'gro ba'i mgo bos gdengs ka stong dang ldan pa khyab gnas rgyan tu byas/ /ya gcig la ni seng ge mtshungs med thogs shing rgya mtshos bskor ba'i sa

gzhi non/ /steng nas rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer stong ldan khyod kyis lte ba'i phyogs su bzhag /rgya mtsho'i klong nas me 'bar khyod/ /chu rnams skems par nus pa ste/ /bud med thams cad zhi mdzad phyir/ /lha chen skra yi phyed du

bzhugs/ /rdzongs dang dka' bzlog nam mo che/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /mi nad gang yin khyod kyis shes/ /de la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i lcam mo bdud kyi yum/ /'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug
ma/ /nad do cog gi bdag mo ste/ /lha mo chen mo la bstod pa brgyad pa/ bram ze mchog sred kyis byas pa rdzogs s+ho// // lha mo nam gru la bstod pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /'phags pa dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo chen mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nam gru dag gi cho 'brang dang / /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na/ /nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus/ /rgyab ni

'dzam bu chu bo'i gser/ /khyod kyi gdong ni dngul yin te/ /lto ba'i ngos ni rdo rjes bltam/ /ming po mdzod dang mdzod bdag po/ /khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma/ /khyod kyi pha ni rlung zhes bya/ /skal ldan shing rta khyod kyi rus/ /

lha yul dag tu grags pa yin/ /na mo badzra pA Ni s+ye/ tsi li tsi li/ b+hin d+hi b+hin d+hi/ mun tsa mun tsa mun tsa hi ba la ka na swA hA/ badzra pA Ni rA dz+nyA pA ya ti swA hA/ de ba sa mA da nya pA ya ti swA hA/ ri Sha ya sa mA da

nyabA ya ti swA hA/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ ru ru b+hi tiSh+Ta bad d+ho si swA hA/ 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug ma/ bdud kyi yum chen mo/ lha mo chen mo re ma ti'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// //
dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur/ /mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/ /shes rab
dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi/ /phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can la/ /'jig rten khams 'dir smra la dbang brnyes shes/ /drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs/ /

de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung / /sems can don phyir phrin las chen po'i khur/ /spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad/ /sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas/ /dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid
bzhin lus su bsgyur/ /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ /thugs rje'i spyan gsal 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa/ /dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs/ /de la lha dbang tshangs
tshogs shin tu 'dud/ /byams shing bsod nams snying rje bskyed pa'i ma/ /lha mo mchog ste 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes/ /thor tshugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags/ /shes rab zab cing
shes pa'i rten byed kyang / /rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag /'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la/ /sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas/ /mu su
rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud/ /yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa/ /yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings/ /rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pas/ /
blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig /sems can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/ /mi slu mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs/ /thugs dam brtan bcas skul ba rnams la yang / /
dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs/ /'di ltar 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/ /sgra 'joms khyed par tshig gis don mtshon te/ /phan tshun shes shing yang
dag brda sprod pa 'ang / /dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab/ /gzungs dang chos kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/ /dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can/ /lus sems
ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang / /yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /byang chub mchog gi spyod phyir su dag mos/ /bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba'i/ /
lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ /bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol/ /bdag ni dpa' zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / /lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/ /
rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang / /bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub tu gsol/ /rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtog las dben/ /snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i
shugs kyis bskyod/ /mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar/ /mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med/ /na mo b+ha ga ba te/ brah+ma ne/ na maHswa swa te+e de bi sid
d+h+yan bu man tra pA da tam brah+ma nu man tra swA hA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bai shA lI pra be sha ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ sangs rgyas dang /
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer ga la ba der 'dong ngo / /btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang
ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yul 'bri rdzings yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi a mra bsrung
ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong khyer du song la phyin nas/ sgo'i them pa la rkang
pa zhog ste/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smros shig /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis
bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/
nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/
'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams

cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /mun tsa ta/ mun tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig /yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar gyur cig /

nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams

dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems

can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ khyed rnams la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha ta/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan

pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / nyes pa mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis

bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/

mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru rI ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/

rI rI rI rI rI rI/ ti mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri ti/ ha si mi ri/ mI rI ti/ mi ti/ si sI si mI/ kang ka ra/ ka ra ka ta/ kang ka rA/ kang ka tsa/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/

kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka ro tI ti/ ku ri/ sho kang ka ra/ kang ka ri shi/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ ti ri te phu swa/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu/ nA thA nA nA thA tha/ ri pu ri pu/ nA thA tha/

nir gad tsha ta/ ri pu ri pu/ nir gad tsha ta/ pa yA tha/ ri pU ri pU/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can/ sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs

rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nir gad tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags

gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam 'joms dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig

'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /

khyed la bde legs mdzed par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /sems

can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad

par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas pa rab g.yos shing / /

sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi

'khor lo bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs byed par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /

khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin lha bcas bde legs dang / /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis ni

bsams pa yis/ /khyed rnams don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de di ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /

nyin mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma gung la 'ang bde legs shog /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems

ldan pa rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun

dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' zhig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags

gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /de skad bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/

bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yangs pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so/ /bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas

'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/

nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/

lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/

sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to/ /mun tsa ta/ mun tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig /yams kyi nad zhi bar gyur cig /nir gad tsha da/ nir gad tsha da/ nir gad tsha da/ nir gad tsha da/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha/

lha'i bla ma gshegs shing / lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha stong phrag

du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ongs te/ de dag khyed la gnod pa chen

po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nir gad tsha ta/ nir gad tsha da/ nir gad tsha da/ nir gad tsha da/ myur du byer cig /khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig /gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi

'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig /lus la yang 'jug par gyis shig /sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ su mu su mu su mu su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/

su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/

mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu rU ri ti/ ri ri ri ri ri ri/ rI rI rI rI rI rI ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri/ mi rI ti/ ha si mi mi/ rI ti/ sI si mi/ kang ka rA/ ka ra ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ ka tsa

kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kang ka ro tI ti/ ku ri sho/ kang ka rA/ kang ka rI/ shi ri ri ri ri ri ri rI te/ ri phu swa/ ri phu ri phu/

ri phu ri phu/ ri phu ri phu/ ri phu/ na thA/ nA na thA/ ri pU ri pU/ na thA thA/ nir gad tsha ta/ ri pu ri pu/ nir gad tsha ta/ pa la yA tra/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la ya ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs

pa dang ldan pa byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran nir gad tsha ta swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams

cad la bka' stsal pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o/ /gang la ser sna rnam chags pa/ /rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing / /thugs zhi gnod pa mi mnga' de/ /khyod la bde legs mdzad par

'gyur/ /'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams/ /thar pa'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing / /chos rnams thams cad ston pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten/ /sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ /gang gis

bde ba mnga' mdzad de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /skyob pa gang zhig byams pa yi/ /thugs kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun/ /bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi/ /

sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing / /gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig chos kun mngon sum gyur/ /gtsang zhing slu ba mi mnga' la/ /gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa de/ /khyed la bde legs

mdzad par 'gyur/ /dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pa/ /phun sum tshogs don 'byor gyur cing / /don grub tshogs kyang grub pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /gang zhig skyes pas sa rnams ni/ /nags tshal bcas par rab g.yos shing / /

sems can thams cad rab dga' de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /byang chub snying por gang zhig gis/ /sa dag rnam drug g.yos gyur cing / /bdud yid mi bder gyur pa de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo

bskor ba na/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnam gsung ba/ /thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung de/ /khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /yid 'phrog gang gis mu stegs byed/ /thams cad chos kyis pham mdzad cing / /tshogs kun dbang du mdzad pa de/ /

khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas khyed la bde legs mdzad/ /brgya byin bcas lha bde legs mdzad/ /'byung po kun gyi bde legs ni/ /khyed la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig /sangs rgyas bsod nams mthu dag dang / /lha rnams kyis

ni bsams pa yi/ /khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa/ /don de de ring grub gyur cig /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs gyur/ /khyed cag lam 'gro bde legs shog /phyir ldog dag kyang bde gyur cig /nyin mo

bde legs mtshan bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis/ /yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis/ /sdang sems ldan pa

rnams byer cig /snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod/ /sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / /dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis/ /'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams/ /grong khyer 'dir ni gtong gyur cig /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /

'byung po kun dang khyed cag kun/ /bde ba 'ba' shig ldan gyur cig /thams cad nad rnams med par shog /kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur cing / /sa dang bar snang dag la

gnas pa rnams/ /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig /'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po/ rdzogs s+ho// // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rtog pa las smon lam 'byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol/ 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang

phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa thams cad zhi zhing rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad rgyun chad par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang /

bdud kyi las skyes pa thams cad byang zhing grol bar gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/

bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal rtag tu mthong zhing smon lam ji skad btab pa thams cad kyang myur du thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang

ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'phags pa gang dag zhal mngon sum du lta zhing dam pa mchog gsol

ba thams cad kyang de bzhin du grub par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems

can kyi 'jig rten dag na phongs shing nyam thag pa thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar bgyid pa la mthu chen po thob par gyur cig /btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang

phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ 'jig rten dag na mu ge'i dgon pa chen po dang / me dang / chu dang / rlung la sogs pa'i gnod pa gang dag byung bas skye bo mang po nyam thag pa de dag zhi ba dang ma mchis par bgyid par gyur cig /

btsun pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug bdag gis rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ bdag dang sems can gang dag 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu 'chi

'pho ba'i 'jig rten chen po nye bar gnas pa na yang 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug khyod zhal mngon sum du mthong zhing dbugs 'byin pa chen po mdzad par gyur cig /bdag dang sems can gzhan 'chi 'pho ba dag gis kyang nyon mongs pa dag gis ma

spros pa chos bdag med pa dran pa dang ldan pa byang chub kyi sems tshad med par brtan pa/ sems ma zhum pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad nye bar zhi zhing dran pa nye bar bzhag bzhin du 'chi 'pho

bar gyur cig /tshe rabs thams cad du yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs drung du skye zhing tshe rabs rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub kyi sems phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug la sogs pa mnyes par bgyid

cing ji skad bstan pa bzhin du grub pa'i mthu dang ldan par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i dbang phyug des thugs rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lhun gyis grub pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rje dang ro gcig par gyur cig /ji ltar thugs rje'i

dbang phyug gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag dang sems can thams cad kyis kyang sems can thams cad yongs

su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi

thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod pas/ dus gsum gyi rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi mtshan nas brjod cing bsnyen bkur bgyis par gyur cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi

rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa thams cad kyi thugs rje'i rang bzhin 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de rjes su dran pa dang mtshan nas brjod cing / mchod pa bgyis pas/ thugs rje chen po'i yul du gyur pa sems can thams cad la yang snying

rje chen po'i thabs kyi sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar gyur cig /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /de snyed bdag ni lus skyes par/ /de srid mgon po mchod bgyid cing / /de snyed lus sbyor tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba'i tshe/ /

ji skad bdag gis ngag skyes par/ /de srid mgon po'i mtshan brjod cing / /ngag gis sbyor ba tshogs bgyid shog /ji srid bdag ni 'khor ba na/ /de snyed bdag gi yid 'byung ba/ /de snyed mgon po rjes dran zhing / /yid sbyor tshogs par bgyid gyur cig /

de ltar lus dang ngag yid kyis/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug rten bgyis pas/ /lus dang ngag yid skyon bral zhing / /yon tan phun sum tshogs gyur cig /de ltar lus ngag yid kyis su/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs/ /rtag tu sbyor

bar bgyid pas na/ /thugs rje'i dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs/ /srid gsum re ba'i gnas gcig po/ /de 'drar bdag kyang grub gyur te/ /srid gsum re rdzogs bgyid gyur cig /na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mo Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twA ya/ ma hA sa twA

ya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ o~M` tsakra pa ti/ tsin da ma Ni ma hA pa du me ru ru tiSh+Ta/ dz+wa la A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags/ rdzogs s+ho// //oM pa du me tsin da ma Ni dz+wa la hU~M/ snying po'o/ /oM b+ha ra da pa du me hU~M/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /

oM ma Ni badzre ni hU~M/ gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sngags snying 'byung smon lam dang tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags su bcas pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya b+ha dra tsAr+ya pra Ni d+hA na rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bzang po

spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge kun/ /bdag gis ma lus de dag thams cad la/ /lus dang ngag yid

dang bas phyag bgyi'o/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du/ /zhing gis rdul snyed lus rab btud pa yis/ /rgyal ba kun la rab tu phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed sangs rgyas rnams/ /

sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa dag /de ltar chos kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /thams cad rgyal ba dag gis gang bar mos/ /de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra kun gyis/ /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan

rab brjod cing / /bde bar gshegs pa thams cad bdag gis bstod/ /me tog dam pa phreng ba dam pa dang / /sil snyan rnams dang byug pa gdugs mchog dang / /mar me mchog dang bdug pa dam pa yis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyi/ /na bza' dam pa

rnams dang dri mchog dang / /phye ma'i phur ma ri rab mnyam pa dang / /bkod pa'i khyad par 'phags pa mchog kun gyis/ /rgyal ba de dag la ni mchod par bgyid/ /mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/ /de dag rgyal ba thams cad la yang mos/ /bzang po spyod la dad

pa'i stobs dag gis/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dbang gis na/ /lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa bdag gis bgyis pa ci mchis pa/ /de dag thams cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /

phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba kun dang sangs rgyas sras/ /rang rgyal rnams dang slob dang mi slob dang / /'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gang la yang / /de dag kun gyi rjes su bdag yi rang / /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sgron ma dag /byang chub rim par

sangs rgyas ma chags brnyes/ /mgon po de dag bdag gis thams cad la/ /'khor lo bla na med pa bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan 'das ston gang bzhed de dag la/ /'gro ba kun la phan zhing bde ba'i phyir/ /bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed bzhugs par yang / /

bdag gis thal mo rab sbyar gsol bar bgyi/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod cing bshags pa dang / /rjes su yi rang bskul zhing gsol ba yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /thams cad bdag gis byang chub phyir bsngo'o/ /'das pa'i

sangs rgyas rnams dang phyogs bcu yi/ /'jig rten dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/ /gang yang ma byon de dag rab myur bar/ /bsam rdzogs byang chub rim par sangs rgyas spyon/ /phyogs bcu ga la'i zhing rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rgya cher yongs su

dag par gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung gshegs rgyal ba dang / /sangs rgyas sras kyis rab tu gang bar shog /phyogs bcu'i sems can gang rnams ji snyed pa/ /de dag rtag tu nad med bde bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyi chos kyis don rnams ni/ /'thun par

gyur cing re ba 'ang 'grub par shog /byang chub spyod pa dag ni bdag spyod cing / /'gro ba kun tu skye ba dran par 'gyur/ /tshe rabs kun tu 'chi 'pho skye ba na/ /rtag tu bdag ni rab tu 'byung bar shog /rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su slob gyur te/ /bzang po spyod pa

yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /tshul khrims spyod pa dri med yongs dag par/ /rtag tu ma nyams skyon med spyod par shog /lha yi skad dang klu dang gnod sbyin skad/ /grul bum dag dang mi yi skad rnams dang / /'gro ba kun gyi sgra rnams ji tsam par/ /thams

cad skad du bdag gis chos bstan to/ /des shing pha rol phyin la rab brtson te/ /byang chub sems ni nam yang rjed ma gyur/ /sdig pa gang rnams sgrib par gyur pa dag /de dag ma lus yongs su byang bar shog /las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi las rnams las/ /

grol zhing 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams su yang / /ji ltar pad ma chus mi chags pa bzhin/ /nyi zla nam mkha' thogs pa med ltar spyad/ /zhing gi khyon dang phyogs rnams ji tsam par/ /ngan song sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed/ /bde ba dag la 'gro ba kun 'god cing / /

'gro ba thams cad la ni phan par spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byed cing / /sems can rnams kyi spyod dang 'thun par 'jug /bzang po spyod pa dag ni rab ston cing / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyod par gyur/ /bdag gis spyod dang 'thun par gang

spyod pa/ /de dag dang ni rtag tu 'grogs par shog /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems kyis kyang / /spyod pa dag dang smon lam gcig tu spyad/ /bdag la phan par 'dod pa'i grogs po dag /bzang po spyod pa rab tu ston pa rnams/ /de dag dang yang rtag tu phrad

par shog /de dag bdag gis nam yang yid mi dbyung / /sangs rgyas sras kyis bskor ba'i mgon po rnams/ /mngon sum rtag tu bdag gis rgyal ba blta/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /de dag la yang mchod pa rgya cher bgyi/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi dam

pa'i chos 'dzin cing / /byang chub spyod pa kun tu snang bar byed/ /bzang po spyod pa rnam par spyad pa yang / /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu spyad par bgyi/ /srid pa thams cad du ni 'khor ba na/ /bsod nams ye shes dag ni mi zad rnyed/ /thabs dang shes

rab ting 'dzin rnam thar dang / /yon tan kun gyi mi zad mdzod du gyur/ /rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed zhing rnams te/ /zhing der bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas rnams/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi dbus na bzhugs pa la/ /byang chub spyad pa spyod

cing blta bar bgyi/ /de ltar ma lus thams cad phyogs su yang / /skra tsam khyon la dus gsum tshad snyed kyis/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho zhing rnams rgya mtsho dang / /bskal pa rgya mtshor spyod cing rab tu 'jug /gsung gcig yan lag rgya mtsho'i sgra skad

kyis/ /rgyal ba kun dbyangs yan lag rnam dag pa/ /'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa ji bzhin dbyangs/ /sangs rgyas gsung la rtag tu 'jug par bgyi/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad dag /'khor lo'i tshul rnams rab tu bskor ba yi/ /

de dag gi yang gsung dbyangs mi zad la/ /blo yi stobs kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'jug /ma 'ongs bskal pa thams cad 'jug par yang / /skad cig gcig gis bdag kyang 'jug par bgyi/ /gang yang bskal pa dus gsum tshad de dag /skad cig cha

shas kyis ni zhugs par spyad/ /dus gsum gshegs pa mi yi seng ge gang / /de dag skad cig gcig la bdag gis blta/ /rtag tu de dag gi ni spyod yul la/ /sgyu mar gyur pa'i rnam thar stobs kyis 'jug /gang yang dus gsum dag gi zhing bkod

pa/ /de dag rdul gcig steng du mngon par bsgrub/ /de ltar ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rgyal ba dag gi zhing rnams bkod la 'jug /gang yang ma byon 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/ /de dag rim par 'tshang rgya 'khor lo bskor/ /mya ngan 'das pa

rab tu zhi mtha' ston/ /mgon po kun gyi drung du bdag mchi'o/ /kun tu myur ba'i rdzu 'phrul stobs rnams dang / /kun nas sgo yi theg pa'i stobs dag dang / /kun tu yon tan spyod pa'i stobs rnams dang / /kun tu khyab pa byams pa dag gi stobs/ /

kun nas dge ba'i bsod nams stobs rnams dang / /chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes stobs/ /shes rab thabs dang ting 'dzin stobs dag gis/ /byang chub stobs rnams yang dag sgrub par byed/ /las kyi stobs rnams yongs su dag byed cing / /

nyon mongs stobs rnams kun tu 'joms par byed/ /bdud kyi stobs rnams stobs med rab byed cing / /bzang po spyod pa'i stobs ni rdzogs par bgyi/ /zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / /sems can rgya mtsho dag ni rnam par 'grol/ /

chos rnams rgya mtsho rab tu mthong byed cing / /ye shes rgya mtsho rab tu rtogs par byed/ /spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par dag byed cing / /smon lam rgya mtsho rab tu rdzogs par byed/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rab tu mchod byed cing / /bskal pa rgya mtshor mi

skyo spyad par bgyi/ /gang yang dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba yi/ /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam bye brag rnams/ /bzang po spyod pas byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /de kun ma lus bdag gis rdzogs par bgyi/ /rgyal ba kun gyi sras kyi thu bo pa/ /gang

gi ming ni kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /mkhas pa de dang mtshungs par spyod pa'i phyir/ /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam dag cing / /spyod pa rnam dag zhing rnams yongs dag dang / /bsngo ba'ang bzang po mkhas pa ci 'dra bar/ /

de 'drar bdag kyang de dang mtshungs par shog /kun nas dge ba bzang po spyad pa'i phyir/ /'jam dpal gyi ni smon lam spyad par bgyi/ /ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu mi skyo bar/ /de yi bya ba ma lus rdzogs par bgyi/ /spyod pa dag ni tshad yod ma gyur cig /yon

tan rnams kyang tshad gzung med par shog /spyod pa tshad med pa la gnas nas kyang / /de dag 'phrul pa thams cad 'tshal bar bgyi/ /nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/ /sems can ma lus mtha' yang de bzhin te/ /ji tsam las dang nyon

mongs mthar gyur pa/ /bdag gi smon lam mtha' yang de tsam mo/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mtha' yas pa/ /rin chen brgyan te rgyal ba rnams la phul/ /lha dang mi yi bde ba mchog rnams kyang / /zhing gi rdul snyed bskal par phul ba bas/ /

gang gis bsngo ba'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/ /byang chub mchog gis rjes su rab mos shing / /lan cig tsam yang dad pa skyed pa ni/ /bsod nams dam pa'i mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro/ /gang gis bzang spyod smon lam 'di btab pa/ /des ni ngan song thams

cad spangs par 'gyur/ /des ni grogs po ngan pa spangs pa yin/ /snang ba mtha' yas de yang des myur mthong / /de dag rnyed pa rab rnyed bde bar 'tsho/ /mi tshe 'dir yang de dag legs par 'ongs/ /kun tu bzang po de yang ci 'dra bar/ /de dag ring por mi

thogs de bzhin 'gyur/ /mtshams med lnga po dag gi sdig pa rnams/ /gang gis mi shes dbang gis byas pa dag /de yis bzang po spyod pa 'di brjod na/ /myur du ma lus yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ /ye shes dang ni gzugs dang mtshan rnams dang / /

rigs dang kha dog rnams dang ldan par 'gyur/ /bdud dang mu stegs mang pos de mi thub/ /'jig rten gsum po kun la'ang mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub shing dbang drung du de myur 'gro/ /song nas sems can phan phyir der 'dug ste/ /byang chub sangs

rgyas 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa thams cad 'dul/ /gang yang bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam 'di/ /'chang ba dang ni ston tam klog pa yi/ /de yi rnam par smin pa sangs rgyas mkhyen/ /byang chub mchog la som nyi ma byed cig /

'jam dpal ji ltar mkhyen cing dpa' ba dang / /kun tu bzang po de yang de bzhin te/ /de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing / /dge ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu bsngo/ /dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/ /bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags

pa des/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di kun kyang / /bzang po spyod phyir rab tu bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byed gyur pa na/ /sgrib pa thams cad dag ni phyir bsal te/ /mngon sum snang ba mtha' yas de mthong nas/ /bde ba can gyi zhing der rab tu 'gro/ /

des song nas ni smon lam 'di dag kyang / /thams cad ma lus mngon sum 'gyur bar shog /de dag ma lus bdag gis yongs su bkang / /'jig rten ji srid sems can phan par bgyi/ /rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzang zhing dga' ba der/ /pad ma dam pa

shin tu mdzes las skyes/ /snang ba mtha' yas rgyal las mngon sum du/ /lung bstan pa yang bdag gis der thob shog /der ni bdag gis lung bstan rab thob nas/ /sprul pa mang po bye ba phrag brgya yis/ /blo yi stobs kyis phyogs bcu rnams

su yang / /sems can rnams la phan pa mang po bgyi/ /bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam btab pa yis/ /dge ba cung zad bdag gis ci bsags pa/ /des ni 'gro ba'i dge ba'i smon lam rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis thams cad 'byor par shog /

bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam bsngos pa yis/ /bsod nams dam pa mtha' yas gang thob des/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal chu bor bying ba rnams/ /'od dpag med pa'i gnas rab thob par shog /smon lam rgyal po 'di mchog gtso des ni/ /

'gro ba mtha' yas kun la phan byed cing / /kun tu bzang pos brgyan pa'i gzhung grub cing / /ngan song rgyud gsum ma lus stongs par shog /'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po/ rdzogs s+ho// //

'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong lha mig ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang yang / /nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngan 'gro thams cad zlog bgyid cing / /mtho ris lam

ni rab ston la/ /rga shi med par 'dren bgyid pa/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems kyi dbang du gyur pas na/ /bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis pa/ /sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas su/ /bdag gis de dag bshags par bgyi/ /bdag

las rnam pa gsum gang gis/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bskyed pa de/ /bdag gi kun mkhyen sa bon te/ /bdag gi byang chub mi zad shog /phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa gang byung ba/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i

yi rang bas/ /de la bdag ni yi rang ngo / /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo / /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag ni ye shes mchog thob shog /phyogs bcu dag gi phyogs rnams na/ /sa bcu dag la

gnas pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mchog /'tshang rgya bgyid par skul ma 'debs/ /byang chub dam par sangs rgyas shing / /sde dang bcas pa'i bdud btul nas/ /srog chags kun la sman slad du/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor gyur cig /

chos rnga chen po'i sgra yis ni/ /sdug bsngal sems can thar bgyid shog /bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/ /chos ston mdzad cing bzhugs gyur cig /'dod pa'i 'dam du bying gyur cing / /srid pa'i srad bus dam bcings pa/ /'ching ba kun

gyis bcings bdag la/ /rkang gnyis mchog rnams gzigs su gsol/ /sems kyis dri mar bgyis pa la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni dmod mi mdzad/ /sems can rnams la byams thugs ldan/ /srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog /rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas gang bzhugs dang / /gang dag 'das dang ma byon pa/ /de dag rjes su bdag slob cing / /byang chub spyad pa spyod gyur cig /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs bgyis nas/ /'gro drug sems can thar bgyid shog /mngon shes drug po mngon bgyis nas/ /

bla med byang chub reg gyur cig /ma skyes pa dang mi 'byung dang / /rang bzhin ma mchis gnas ma mchis/ /rnam rig ma mchis dngos ma mchis/ /stong pa'i chos ni rtogs par shog /sangs rgyas drang srong chen po ltar/ /sems can ma mchis srog ma mchis/ /

gang zag ma mchis gso ma mchis/ /bdag ma mchis pa'i chos rtogs shog /bdag 'dzin bdag gir 'dzin par ni/ /dngos po kun la mi gnas par/ /sems can kun la bde slad du/ /ser sna ma mchis sbyin gtong shog /dngos po dngos po ma

mchis pas/ /bdag gi longs spyod lhun grub shog /dngos po thams cad rnam 'jig pas/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /khrims kyi tshul khrims skyon med cing / /tshul khrims rnam par dag dang ldan/ /rlom sems med pa'i tshul khrims

kyis/ /tshul khrims pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sa 'am yang na chu 'am me/ /rlung gi khams ltar mi gnas shing / /bzod pa'am khro ba ma mchis par/ /bzod pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /brtson 'grus brtsoms pa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /

brtan spro le lo ma mchis shing / /stobs dang ldan pa'i lus sems kyis/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / /dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin dang / /rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis/ /bsam gtan pha rol

phyin rdzogs shog /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang yang / /rig gsum mngon sum bgyis pa yis/ /shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs shog /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa dang / /'od dang gzi brjid 'bar

ba dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyis/ /bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig /de ltar spyad pa spyod byed cing / /byams pa grags dang ldan pa yis/ /pha rol phyin drug rdzogs byas nas/ /sa bcu po la rab tu gnas/ /

'phags pa byams pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ a gra tsAr+ya pra Ni d+hA na/ bod skad du/ mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye dgu

kun la sman dang bde slad du/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas rnams la 'dud/ /de dag la ni rjed cing mchod par bgyi/ /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /byams pa dang ni 'jam dpal mnga' bdag rtog /chos kyi blo

gros dpa' bo bdud rtsi gsung / /dpa' bo de dag phyag 'tshal mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang mi dbang rnams la 'dud/ /thugs rje ldan zhing 'jig rten don mdzad pa'i/ /rgyal ba mi mkhyen mi gzigs mi mnga' ba/ /mi dbang thugs brtse

byams la gnas pa yi/ /rgyal ba de kun bdag la dgongs su gsol/ /sngon gyi srid pa dag tu bdag nyid kyis/ /sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyis bdag gis bshags/ /de bzhin lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams/ /de dag thams

cad bdag gis so sor bshags/ /shAkya thub dang mi 'khrugs 'od dpag med/ /de dag gis ni phrin las yongs sbyangs dang / /'chags dang bshags pa mkhyen cing rtogs gyur ltar/ /de bzhin bdag gis sdig pa bshags par bgyi/ /

thams cad dga' mdzad skyes bu dam pa gang / /byang chub zhugs pa kun la gsol ba dang / /ngan song bzhi po myur du zhi gyur cig /mi khom 'joms par bgyid cing rgyu bar shog /sangs rgyas bzang spyod dri med mnga' bdag dang / /de bzhin lhun po'i

dpal dang nyi ma'i sgron/ /de dag bsod nams yi rang mkhyen pa ltar/ /de bzhin bdag kyang bsod nams rjes yi rang / /phyogs bcu dag na sbyin pa spyod pa gang / /de bzhin tshul khrims ting 'dzin spyod rnams dang / /shes rab sgom dang bsod nams

stobs kun la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo / /rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas dang / /chos bstan byang chub 'jog bgyid thams cad la/ /byang chub yon tan don du yi rang ngo / /'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /'jig

rten rgyal ba gang bzhugs kun la bskul/ /phyogs bcu dag na byang chub brnyes pa gang / /de dag tshangs pas ji ltar gsol ba ltar/ /rgyal rnams bzhugs shing chos mchog ston gyur cig /rgyal kun bskal pa mang por bzhugs par shog /

'gro kun byang chub mchog la reg gyur cig /mi rnams thams cad mchog dang bla med pa/ /'jig rten sgron ma bde gshegs myur gyur cig /sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal mchod gang dang / /las dge rnams la yi rang gang lags dang / /

sdig pa'i las rnams bshags pa gang lags dang / /rgyal ba rkang gnyis dbang rnams mthong gang dag /bdag gis dge ba cung zad ci bgyis pa/ /lus dang ngag dang sems las byung yang rung / /bdag gis bgyis dang bgyid dang bgyid 'gyur

gang / /thams cad skye dgu sman slad stsal bar bgyi/ /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas/ /stsal ba legs par stsal cing legs rgyas pa/ /de bzhin bdag gis skye dgu sman slad stsal/ /'gro kun byang chub mchog la

reg gyur cig /bdag gis 'gro la stsal pa gang lags pa'i/ /bsod nams 'bras bu bla med ci mchis pa/ /theg pa chen por yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/ /bdag la byang chub 'bras bu grub par shog /mtshungs pa ma mchis kun nas sgo

mo rnams/ /'gro ba'i don du bdag la mngon sum shog /'jam dpal gyi ni rjes su slob bgyid cing / /byang chub spyod pa'i smon lam gdab par bgyi/ /mi gcig tsam gyi ched du'ang mnar med pa'i/ /tshor ba thams cad bdag gis

myong 'gyur bar/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar bgyi/ /'gro ba thams cad mya ngan med par shog /sems dmyal gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdug bsngal dang / /dud 'gro rnams dang mi yi sdug bsngal dang / /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal phung

po mtha' yas dag /bdag la bab gyur 'gro ba bde bar shog /rgyal ba rnams kyi zhing ni rnam dag dang / /sems can rnam dag ye shes rnam dag dang / /rgyal ba rnams kyi smon lam mtha' yas gang / /smon lam de kun bdag la grub par

shog /bdag gi smon lam nyams par ma gyur cig /bdag ni nam yang skyo bar mi 'gyur shog /byang chub mchog ni bdag gis thob bar du/ /bskal pa du mar bdag ni spro bar shog /mchog gi spyod pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA war+m+ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di 'am yang dag 'das pa dang / /mtho ris dag na rin

chen mchog yod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa lha yi lhar gyur pa/ /mi yi mchog dang 'dir ni mtshungs pa med/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /zad pa chags bral bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas/ /

shes pas shAkya thub des rab tu phye/ /bdud rtsi zhi ba 'dus byas ma yin pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa gang yang med/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /mchog tu gang 'dod tshul bzhin rab

bstan pa/ /ston pa'i rnal 'byor bla med rtag sgrub pa/ /rdo rje lta bu'i mig gnyis lam mthong ba/ /ting 'dzin de dang mnyam pa yod ma yin/ /de bas 'di ni rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang zag chen po

brgyad po rab bsngags shing / /gang zag zung bzhir brjod pa de dag ni/ /drang srong chen po gang zag mtshungs med pa/ /bde bar gshegs pas sbyin pa'i gnas shes gsungs/ /de la byin na 'bras bu cher 'gyur te/ /zhing rab bshin la sa bon

btab pa bzhin/ /'di ni dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /gang dag brtan pa'i yid kyis rab brtson zhing / /gau ta ma'i bstan la 'jug byed pa/ /de dag thob nas bdud rtsi 'jug thob ste/ /

mun pa bsal nas mya ngan 'das thob pa/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lta ba 'di la sbyar ma thag tu ni/ /'jig tshogs lta dang tshul khrims brtul zhugs dang / /the tshom dang ni nyon mongs

gsum po dag /cig char spangs te 'phags pa'i bden mthong ba/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /lus sam ngag gam 'on te yid kyis kyang / /sdig pa rnam gsum nam yang mi byed cing / /

glo bur byas na'ang 'chab par mi byed la/ /de ltar de dag lta bas 'dzin mi byed/ /de bas dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar dbang po'i sdong po sar btsugs pa/ /phyogs bzhi'i rlung rnams kyis ni

mi g.yo ltar/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi dam pa mthong ba yi/ /gang zag 'phags pa'i dge 'dun de bzhin no/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /shes rab zab mos shin tu bstan pa yi/ /

'phags pa'i bden pa su dag rnam sgom zhing / /lus kyang sbyin par yid la byas pa ni/ /de dag 'jigs pa brgyad dang phrad mi 'gyur/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /ci ltar me ni rlung gis

rab gtor ba/ /lag tu blangs te bgrang du med pa nyid/ /de ltar kun tu sbyor ba rab btang ba/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams bstan du med par 'gro/ /des na dge 'dun rin chen mchog tu gsungs/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /sems

can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /ston mchog lha dang mis ni mchod 'os pa/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder

gyur cig /zhi ba chags bral lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /chos la phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /sems can gang dag 'gro dang mi 'gro ba/ /de dag thams cad 'dir ni bder gyur cig /tshogs kyi dam pa lha mis mchod 'os pa/ /dge 'dun

phyag 'tshal deng 'dir dge bar shog /'byung po gang dag 'dir ni lhags gyur te/ /sa 'am 'on te bar snang 'khod pa dag /skye dgu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog /nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod par shog /'dir ni rgyal ba

dgra rgyal bden gang gis/ /shin tu bden pa gsung zhing brdzun med pa/ /bden pa de yis 'dir ni dge bar shog /de kun 'jigs pa che las thar gyur cig /sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid dang / /rang rgyal dag gi gzi brjid dang / /dgra bcom dag gi

mthu dag dang / /gsang sngags 'dzin pa thams cad dang / /shA ri'i bu yi shes rab dang / /maud gal bu yi rdzu 'phrul dang / /ma 'gags pa yi mig dang ni/ /'od srung sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / /kau di n+ya yi sngar thob dang / /kun dga' bo yi thos pa dang / /

tshangs pa yi ni byams pa dang / /brgya byin gyi ni dbang rnams dang / /'jig rten skyong ba'i yul rnams dang / /dbang phyug chen po'i stobs dag dang / /sde dpon rnams kyi mthu dag dang / /'phrog ma'i gzi brjid rdzu 'phrul dang / /de dag rnams kyi mthu dang

gzis/ /bdag gi dug ni dug med shog /stong chen mo rab tu 'joms pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam/ rdzogs s+ho/ // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la

gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad ma dkar po'i drung / /thams cad skyob pa sa la'i drung na gnas/ /bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung / /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum ba ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha yi drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog

khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub thob gyur gau ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos/ /

sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed rnams bde legs shog /rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog /lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /

nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa

med/ /bden pa'i tshig gis kun tu bde legs shog /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ de ba pa ri pri ts+tsha ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ lhas

zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gzhan gyis mi thub rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /mgon po phyogs gcig bzhugs pa na/ /lha gcig dpa' bo chen po la/ /phyag 'tshal 'di skad tshig gsol to/ /

dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis dag ni brjod bgyis na/ /bkra shis dam pa gang zhig lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /dge ba don du gnyer ba na/ /lha dang mi rnams so so nas/ /bkra shis rnams ni

rjod byed pa/ /de dag bkra shis brjod par bya/ /yul bzang gnas dang grogs mchog dang / /sngon chad bsod nams byas pa dang / /sems ni legs par gtad byas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sbyin dang shin tu snyan smra dang / /yang dag don la rnam

nges dang / /khrims ldan rnams dang mtshungs sbyor ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /byis pa rnams la mi sten dang / /mkhas pa rnams la sten pa dang / /mchod 'os rnams la mchod byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /pha ma bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / /

zhi dang tshangs par spyod pa dang / /'byung po kun la snying brtse ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /sdig pa'i las las ldog pa dang / /dge ba'i las la brten pa dang / /bag yod pa dang rtag mkhas pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /nga rgyal med dang khengs med dang / /

chog shes 'thun pas 'tsho ba dang / /rtag tu byas pa gzo byed pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /mi dmod de bzhin bzod pa dang / /'phags pa rnams dang 'thun sbyor dang / /dus skabs su ni chos nyan pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /le lo med dang mang thos

dang / /chos la legs par rnam nges dang / /de bzhin sems la rnyog med pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems ni rab sgom zhing / /dpag tu med de mi 'khrugs pa/ /de ni bkra

shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'phags pa'i bden rnams la/ /shes rab mig ni rnam sbyangs dang / /tshul khrims nongs par ma gyur pa/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'phags pa'i bden pa mthong ba dang / /tshangs par spyod pa sgom pa dang / /mya ngan

'das pa 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /ma rig pa yang rnam spangs dang / /shes pa mi 'khrugs skye 'gyur ba/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /'jig rten chos rnams kyis bskyod kyang / /gang gi

sems ni mi g.yo dang / /dri med zhi dang mya ngan med/ /de ni bkra shis dam pa yin/ /de dang 'di ni ci rigs par/ /'di la bkra shis de dag ni/ /mkhas pa gang zhig stod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu bkra shis 'gyur/ /lhas zhus pa'i bkra shis kyi tshigs su

bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar skad du/ swa sti gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha gcig nye bar song nas su/ /lhas mchod pa la zhus byas te/ /sangs rgyas chen

po thub pa che/ /ci zhig smras na bde legs 'gyur/ /des ni tshig 'di gsan gyur nas/ /'jig rten rtsa lag bka' stsal pa/ /gang zhig rtag tu rjod byed pa/ /nga yi bde legs 'gyur de nyon/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dang mtho ris na/ /rin chen

rgya chen mchog ni gang yod pa/ /des ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen la/ /cis kyang grangs dang bgrang dang char mi phod/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden

mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /zhi 'gog bdud rtsi shin tu gya nom gang / /shAkya thub pas mnyam bzhag thugs chud pa/ /chos de dang ni mtshungs pa yod min te/ /de mngon byas na phyin chad mya ngan med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung

dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /rgyal bas gang dag gang zag brgyad gsungs pa/ /de dag rnams ni skyes bu zung bzhi ste/ /sbyin gnas

de dag sa stengs shin tu dkon/ /de dag rnams la byin na dpag med 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /

dam pa gtso bo mchog sbyin gya nom pa/ /'od mchog dpa' bo dam pa mchog gi gnas/ /shes rab dam pa mchog gi dam pa mchog /mchog min mchog mkhyen 'di ni bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin

chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /ting 'dzin dam pa bar chad med pa gang / /mtha' yas blo ldan de bzhin gshegs gsungs pa/ /ting 'dzin de brtan rdo rje dper byas pa/ /

ting 'dzin de dang mtshungs pa'i ting 'dzin med/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /ting nge 'dzin gyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /ji ltar sgo gtan dam zhing rab dam

ste/ /stobs chen rlung bzhi dag gis mi bskyod pa/ /de ltar mkhas pa bden bzhi mthong gnas pa/ /'jig rten smra ba rnams kyis 'dir mi g.yo/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di

de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /thams cad zil gnon kun mkhyen thams cad gzigs/ /thams cad mkhyen pa stobs rnams kun dang ldan/ /kun gyi dam pa 'dzin pa kun dang bral/ /bsam pa kun mkhyen 'di ni

bcom ldan gcig /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /srid pa 'gog cing mi g.yo 'gyur ba med/ /

skyon med 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /shin tu 'gag cing gya nom nges par 'byung / /shin tu dri med zhi ba blos mi 'phrogs/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de

bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /shin tu sdug bsngal ston cing bde sbyin pa'i/ /bden rnams mthong ste gang dag bag yod pa/ /bden pa rin chen rnams la dogs bral ba/ /de dag skye ba brgyad pa phyis mi len/ /ngo mtshar shin

tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /dam pa rnams kyis dam pa don dam mkhyen/ /mchog dang mchog min mkhyen cing don dam

brtson/ /gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs dam pa thugs chud rtogs/ /shin tu sdug bsngal rnams kyi dpung gnyen mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /

bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /'dun pa bskyed nas rnal 'byor ldan gyur cing / /gau tam bstan la rtag brtson rab grol zhi/ /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dag zhi der reg /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /

dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /bden pa mthong bas brjed pas brgya lam na/ /gal te sdig pa 'ga' zhig byas gyur kyang / /de ni de 'chal pa yi 'os min te/ /

chos nyid 'di ni mi g.yo gnas phyir ro/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams

cad na/ /sangs rgyas dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /lha dang mi yi ston pa bla na med/ /ston pa ded dpon sman pa rnams kyi mchog /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin

bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /so ga'i zla ba dang por thub pa yi/ /nags khrod chos kyi dam pa rab brnyes pa/ /chos de dang ni lhag pa 'am mtshungs pa med/ /'di la de reg grangs su phyin mi 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag

med de/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rin chen 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /sdig pa rnying zad gsar du byas med la/ /rims nad med pas 'jigs med mya ngan bral/ /rtsa ba 'gags pas srid

pa mi skyed pa/ /bstan pa mar me bzhin du 'bar bar 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar shin tu rmad byung dpag med de/ /dge 'dun rin chen gang zhig 'jig rten mchog /ji ltar nga'i 'di de bzhin bden mchog na/ /bden pa 'dis ni shin tu bde legs shog /bde legs

kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ swa s+t+ya ya na gA thA/ bod skad du/ bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'dren pa'i drung du ni/ /lha zhig nye bar song

nas su/ /gang gis rtag tu bde legs pa/ /bdag gis zhu yis bcom ldan gsungs/ /dam pas de dag gsan pa dang / /'jig rten 'dren pas lung bstan pa/ /gang gis kun tu bde legs su/ /'gyur ba lha khyod legs par nyon/ /gang zhig de bzhin

gshegs pa la/ /dad pa mi g.yo legs rab brtan/ /gang zhig dge ba tshul khrims can/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig pha dang ma dag dang / /bu dang bu mo bran dag la/ /rtag tu legs par bsnyen bkur ba/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /

gang zhig dgra bcom grags pa la/ /legs par rab dad yon 'bul dang / /lha yi bka' bzhin byed pa dag /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni/ /yid la nyes byas med pa dang / /gang zhig rnam gsum rab bsdams pa/ /

de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'byung po thams cad la/ /tshad med kun tu mi 'khrugs pa/ /byams pa'i sems ni sgom byed pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig sdug bsngal kun spangs phyir/ /'phags pa'i lam gyi yan

lag brgyad/ /bde ba 'dren pa legs bsgom pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dus byas thams cad kyi/ /stong nyid rtag tu legs mthong zhing / /de ni sems la gnas gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /

gang gis lus kyi dri med chos/ /mngon sum byas nas rgyu ba dang / /dgra bcom rnam grol sems ldan pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang gis 'dod chags zhe sdang dang / /gti mug rnams dang chags bral zhing / /ye shes 'khrug med skyes gyur

pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /gang zhig lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi/ /mgon po yang srid spangs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas khong du chud gyur pa/ /de dag kun tu bde legs 'gyur/ /bde legs su 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
