rgya gar skad du/ ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po dri ma gsum spangs pa/ /sangs rgyas pad

ma rgyas pa'i mdab 'dra'i spyan mnga' ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu zhi byed dang po'o/ /de yis nye bar bstan pa'i mchog rab mi g.yo ba/ /'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa/ /chos kyi dam pa skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa/ /de ni 'jig

rten dge ba'i bkra shis gnyis pa'o/ /dge 'dun dam pa'i chos ldan thos pa'i bkra shis phyug /mi dang lha dang lha ma yin gyis mchod pa'i gnas/ /tshogs kyi mchog rab ngo tsha shes dang dpal gyi gzhi/ /de ni 'jig rten dge ba'i bkra shis gsum pa

'o/ /sems can kun la phan phyir byang chub mnga' ba po/ /don rnams thams cad 'grub par brtul ba yongs ldan pa/ /tshogs kyi lam dgyes thub pa'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir de bzhin

gshegs pa dga' ldan lha'i/ /gzhal med khang gi snying po nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /dbang bcas lha yis bskor ba'i bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lo ma me tog 'od 'bar nyams dga' lum bi'i tshal/ /

lha mang dag gis bstan par mgon po bltam pa na/ /srid pa'i mthar phyin pa yi bkra shis gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer ser skya'i gnas nas rgyal po'i pho brang du/ /lhums nas bltam pa ston pa bde gshegs

zas gtsang sras/ /myur bskrun bdud rtsi'i chus gtor ba yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer dam pa ser skya'i gnas zhes bya bar ni/ /rmad du grags pa che ba'i lha yis mngon bstod pa/ /bsam yas dge

bsgrubs bsod nams phung po'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dgyes shing nam phyed grong khyer mchog nas mngon byung ste/ /dka' thub tshal du mngon par gshegs shing tshangs la sogs/ /lha yi tshogs kyis yongs

su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /rab tu 'od 'bar gser dang 'dra ba'i sku mnga' zhing / /bai dUr+ya ltar sngo ba'i rtswa bting steng bzhugs te/ /dkyil mo dkrung bcas mi g.yo mchog gi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis

des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /chu bo'i 'gram na tsa sha'i phreng gis yongs bskor ba/ /shin tu rmad du byung ba'i srid pa sel mdzad pa/ /klu yi rgyal pos phyag byas pa yi bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /shing rgyal

drung gshegs byams pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi phyogs/ /mang po btul te sa steng dang ni nam mkha' la/ /bcom ldan bkra shis rnam pa sna tshogs gang byung ba/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sdug bsngal mtha' dag gzhig phyir rdo rje'i

gdan bzhugs te/ /nam gyi tho rangs bdud bzhi po dag rnam btul ba/ /ston pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /grong khyer bA rA Na sIr drang srong mchog bzhugs nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo mchog

bstan pa yi bkra shis gang / /lha yul dang 'dir shin tu rmad du byung gyur pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa dag byed pa/ /bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bstod pa/ /bcom ldan shAkya thub

pa'i seng ges gang gsungs pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mu stegs byed pa kun gyi nga rgyal gzhom pa dang / /'gro la bde ba bskyed phyir cho 'phrul dam pa dag /nye bar ston pa rgyal ba'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /

bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /'gro la phan phyir mtho ris nas ni 'dir gshegs te/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha tshogs lag na rnga yab gdugs/ /sna tshogs thogs pas yongs su bskor ba'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams

la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba mchog tu nyer gshegs pa/ /man dA ra ba'i me tog mang pos mngon mchod pa/ /lha mchog rnams kyis mngon par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /lha dbang klu dang mi yi dbang

pos phyag byas pa/ /mkha' lding gnod sbyin dri za'i dbang pos mchod gyur pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ldan pa'i bkra shis gang / /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /dkon mchog gsum dang mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi bkra shis kyi

tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ bud d+ha ka ma las p+ta ma~M ga la gA thA/

bod skad du/ sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can/ /tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /

shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can/ /tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du/ /shing mchog sun d+ha'i shing drung

mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can/ /tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du/ /shing mchog sa la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /

shing mchog sa'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du/ /shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs

rgyas pa/ / deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs/ /tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du/ /u dum ba ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde

gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can/ /tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na bA rA Na sI ru/ /n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /

'gro mgon shAkya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can/ /tshe lo brgya pa'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du/ /a shwa tha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun

bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang / /phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba/ /chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba/ /deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /sangs rgyas rabs bdun

gyi bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta ma~M ga la gA thA/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par snang mdzad

ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan/ /zla ba nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa/ /dgongs pa mtha' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /mi 'khrugs rgyal po srid dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba/ /

mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa/ /dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing / /yang dag bden

pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba/ /rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /ye shes pad ma'i steng bzhugs dpag

med tshe ldan zhing / /tshe grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /sems can don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad cing / /'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa/ /

thub mchog don yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog /de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ tri ku la ma~M ga la/ bod skad du/ rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/

dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan gser mdog ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i sku/ /bde gshegs sku yi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan dung mdog ri yi rgyal

po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang / /bde gshegs gsung gi bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /bcom ldan ljang ser ri yi rgyal po 'dra/ /'jig rten gsum mgon phyag na rdo rje ste/ /bde gshegs thugs kyi

bkra shis gang yin pa/ /bkra shis des ni deng 'dir bde legs shog /dpal rigs gsum gyi bkra shis/ rdzogs s+ho/ // shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha yi bkra shis don sgrub cing / /phyogs rnams

bkra shis byed pa des/ /khyod kyi don rnams grub gyur cig /thams cad myur du 'thun par shog /phreng ba mgo la 'dug pa ltar/ /lag pa g.yas na dpal yod shog /g.yon na'ang dpal ni gnas gyur cig /yan lag kun na'ang dpal yod shog /tshong pa dag ni nor

tshol zhing / /phyogs bcu dag tu 'gro ba rnams/ /rnyed pa chen po rnyed gyur cing / /de dag bde ba skyid par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /shar phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /smyin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /

mgo dang lag dang nam so dang / /rgyal dang skag ces bya ba ste/ /de dag rnams ni shar phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /shar phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyod la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /yul

'khor srung zhes grags pa ste/ /de ni dri za kun gyi bdag /nyi ma lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par

skyong gyur cig /shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / /don grub ma dang mi pham dang / /dga' mchog ma dang dga' sde dang / /dga' can ma dang dga' 'phel ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag

par skyong bar shog /shar phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /gzhi 'dzin ces bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rgyal ba skyob pa dgra bcom pa/ /de rnams kyis ni bzhugs shing mkhyen/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar

shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mchu dang gre dang dbo dang

ni/ /me bzhi nag pa lnga pa yin/ /sa ri dang ni sa ga ste/ /de dag rnams ni lho phyogs pa/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /lho phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /'phags skyes

po zhes bya bar brjod/ /de ni grul bum kun gyi bdag /gshin rje lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgu cig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de rnams khyed la nad med cing / /shis par

lhag par skyong gyur cig /lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /dpal ldan ma dang grags ldan ma/ /grags pa thob dang grags 'dzin dang / /legs par langs dang rab snga dang / /legs par sad dang bde sgrub ma/ /de dag khyed la nad

med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /lho phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /pad ma zhes bya'i mchod rten yod/ /rtag tu gzi brjid kyis kyang 'bar/ /rtag tu thams cad gsal byed pa/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur

cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /nub phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /gang dag phyogs der gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar

khyed la skyong gyur cig /lha mtshams dang ni snron dang yang / /brtson 'grus brtan ldan snums dang ni/ /chu stod chu smad byi bzhin dang / /gro bzhin de ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /nub phyogs logs na yod ces bstan/ /

de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mig mi bzang zhes bya bar shes/ /de ni klu rnams kun gyi bdag /chu lha lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes

bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rna cha skra 'dres ma dang ni/ /pad ma dkar dang skya reng dang / /cha med gcig dang dgu pa dang / /rol dang gnag dang

stabs myur srid/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /nub phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /nub ces bya ba'i ri bo yod/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyis ka'ang nub/ /nub pa'ang khyed la nor sbyin 'gyur/ /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis

par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /dgos pa la la gang gi phyir/ /byang phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ / gang dag phyogs der

gnas pa yi/ /rgyu skar khyed la skyong gyur cig /mon gru~M dang ni mon gre dang / /khrums stod dang ni khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye ste ni bdun pa yin/ /rgyu skar bdun po de dag ni/ /'jig rten skyong ba grags ldan pa/ /byang phyogs logs

na yod ces bstan/ /de dag khyed la kun tu srungs/ /de dag bdag po rgyal po ni/ /mi la zhon pa lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin kun gyi bdag po ste/ /nor bzangs lhan cig srung bar shog /de la bu ni mang yod la/ /mkhas shing ming yang 'thun pa ste/ /dgu bcu

rtsa gcig zad par yang / /dbang po zhes bya stobs po che/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /lha mo gzhon nu brgyad yod de/ /rab chags lha mo gtong lha mo/ /sa dang de bzhin pad ma

can/ /rgyal po che la nyer gnas dang / /re dang khrel yod dpal ldan ma/ /de dag khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong bar shog /byang phyogs logs kyi phyogs cha na/ /spos ngad ldang ba'i ri bo yod/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyi gnas/ /

rtse mo sna tshogs blta na sdug /de yang khyed la nad med cing / /shis par lhag par skyong gyur cig /phyogs na khyed cag bde bar shog /khyed cag sdig par ma gyur cig /lha rnams kun gyis rab bsrungs nas/ /nor rnams rnyed de ldog par shog /rgyu skar nyi

shu rtsa brgyad po/ /phyogs bzhi dag na bdun bdun gnas/ /lha yi bu mo sum bcu gnyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag na brgyad brgyad gnas/ /dge sbyong brgyad dang bram ze brgyad/ /yul rnams na ni grong rdal brgyad/ /dbang por bcas pa'i lha brgyad rnams/ /de dag khyed la

kun tu srungs/ /khyed cag 'gro na'ang bkra shis gyur/ /ldog pa na yang bkra shis shog /gnyen la lta ba bkra shis shog /gnyen gyis lta ba'ang bkra shis shog /dbang bcas gnod sbyin rgyal chen dang / /dgra bcom pa dag snying brtse bas/ /thams cad du

ni bkra shis dang / /bdud rtsi shis pa thob par shog /tshangs pa dang ni de bzhin nor rgyas dang / /zag pa med pa rnam par grol rnams dang / /klu dang gnod sbyin rtag tu snying rjes srungs/ /ston brgya mtshungs par tshe ni skyong bar shog /'phags pa rgya cher
rol ba'i mdo'i tshong dpon ga gon dang bzang po'i le'u las 'byung ba shis par brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //
rgya gar skad du/ rad na tri swasti gA thA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /che ba'i che mchog ston mchog bla na med/ /

chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin brlabs kyis/ /bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med/ /dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /

nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnam 'phel ba/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba/ /rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi

ste/ /rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog /tshangs dang lha dbang srungs ma'i byin brlabs kyis/ /phan mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te/ /bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang / /tshe ring nad med bde skyid ldan par
shog /dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des pa la gsungs pa/ rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzi na mi tra dang /
zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // dge'o//
rdo rje theg ba'i gru brdzings la brten nas/ /dpag yas srid pa'i mtsho las legs sgrol te/ /zung 'jug yid bzhin nor bu'i dga' ston gyis/ /'gro kun yid kyi re ba skong bar shog /
